description.hltext_display: Physical Therapist Reveals 3 Simple Secrets to Staying Healthy
description.author: McGovern Physical Therapy Associates
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Physical therapists from the American Physical Therapy Association (APTA) are encouraging people to make the commitment to stay healthy by establishing good physical activity habits. But many people are likely to drop a health and fitness program because they are too busy or dont have time. Dr. Kevin McGovern, Founder of McGovern Physical Therapy Associates and Game 7 Sports Training TM has been educating individuals on body awareness and mechanical awareness for 10 years at his practice. He reveals his simple secrets for restoring your health and increasing your chances of longevity.ExerciseSee a professional. Exercises must be done faithfully and with good form in order to prevent injury. If you dont know what good form is, see a professional. If you dont want to have a trainer, you should at least see a professional to get evaluated and to receive a personalized program.Remember to vary different exercises instead of doing the same thing all the time. Many people get caught up in doing cardio exercises, such as running. However, the body has to be challenged by varying intensity and what is done otherwise, the body will get used to the activity. Essentially, one has to confuse the body by doing different things.NutritionDrink a lot of water. Intake should be 8 to 10 glasses a day.Take vitamins and supplements including a general vitamin to make sure you are getting all the basic vitamins.Eat 4 to 6 small meals a day instead of large meals to rev up your metabolic rate.Limit fat intake and fried foods.Eat plenty of fresh vegetables, lean beef, and chicken.Limit intake of processed foods such as fast foods and prepared frozen meals at the supermarket.Maintaining good overall health doesnt have to be time consuming. If someone just did these alone, they would see huge difference, says Dr. McGovern.Maintain Your GainsIf you are seeing a physical therapist, continue the same frequency and intensity as you are doing in physical therapy.For example, if someone is coming to physical therapy 3 times a week and exercising for 30 to 40 minutes, they have gotten their gains by exercising 3 times a week for 30 to 40 minutes. To maintain their gains, they have to do at least that amount.About Dr. Kevin McGovernDr. McGovern is the founder 3 growing companies: McGovern Physical Therapy Associates, one of the fastest-growing privately-owned companies in the U.S. recognized by Inc. Magazine; Game 7 Sports Training TM, a physical-therapy-designed strength and conditioning company; and Velocity Rx, a physical-therapy designed rehabilitation & instruction program for athletes.Dr. McGovern is also the inventor of the McGovern Movement Score (MMS), which measures the quality of basic human movements and can score how well one moves to help predict possible future injury.Dr. McGovern has been analyzing the biomechanics of golfers and baseball pitchers for over 15 years in order to improve athletic results. As a sports enthusiast and athlete himself, his passion is helping people get in the best possible shape for a healthier, happier life. Visit www.mcgovernpt.com.About McGovern Physical Therapy Associates:Combining innovation, experience and excellence, McGovern Physical Therapy Associates has been a leading provider of outpatient physical therapy care for over 10 years, providing customized treatment programs designed to fit each patients needs in an optimal healthcare environment where true patient recovery exists.McGovern Physical Therapy Associates is a 2010 recipient of the Inc. Magazine 5000, a list of the 5000 top growing companies, and was voted Best Physical Therapy Practice by ADVANCE magazine. Visit them at www.mcgovernpt.com.About Game 7 Sports Training (TM):Founded by McGovern Physical Therapy Associates, Game 7 Sports Training (TM)is a physical-therapy-designed fitness center with programs customized for individual needs. Through an innovative and scientific manner, Game 7 is an effective method for preventative-injury care and maintaining overall optimum health for any fitness or age level. Visit www.game7sportstraining.com.###Physical therapists are urging families and individuals to prevent and combat obesity and its consequences without risking injury.

description.hltext_display: 《毛泽东最后七年风雨路》北京图书大厦签售会
description.content:
《毛泽东最后七年风雨路12月26日《毛泽东最后七年风雨路》真实再现了1970年到1976年共和国一系列重大历史事件，生动讲述了林彪事件前后我国的内政外交，也反映了毛泽东晚年的思想轨迹。
特别值得说明的是，《毛泽东最后七年风雨路》中首次收入近二百幅珍贵的历史照片，全部由中南海摄影师杜修贤欢迎读者朋友们积极参加！
时间：12月26日（本周日）15:30-17:00
地点：北京图书大厦一层东厅
作者简介：
顾保孜 1957年生，江苏兴化人。中国作家协会会员。现任第二炮兵政治部文艺创作室正师职创作员，国家一级作家。
著有《红墙里的瞬间》、《样板戏出台内幕》、《铁血N4A先后获得全国优秀畅销图书奖、全国图书金钥匙奖、当代军人最喜爱军版图书一等奖、“五个一”图书工程奖、中国图书奖、解放军图书奖、中国电影“华表奖”优秀编剧奖、“五个一”电影工程奖等全国性的奖项。杜修贤 1926年生，陕西米脂人。1940年参加革命，1945年在延安八路军电影团学习摄影，从师吴印咸曾出版《访问十四国》、《人民的总理》、《杜修贤摄影选》、《红镜头》、《红墙聚焦》、《最后的传奇》等多部摄影画册与专著。
多次获国内外新闻摄影作品奖。其中“周恩来与尼克松握手”被中国文化部评为“二十一世纪华人摄影经典作品。

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Bank muss Millionen zahlen
description.content: New York/Frankfurt - Die USA haben die Deutsche Bank für ihre Beteiligung an illegalen Steuersparmodellen zur Rechenschaft gezogen. Das Frankfurter Geldhaus willigte ein, knapp 554 Millionen Dollar an den amerikanischen Fiskus zu zahlen.

description.hltext_display: Video-game review: EA Sports Active 2
description.author: BILLY O'KEEFE
description.content:
EA Sports Active 2
Reviewed for: Playstation 3
Also available for: Xbox 360 (Kinect required), Wii
From: EA Sports
ESRB Rating: Everyone
Video games may be the new fitness gimmick battleground, but the old truths remain true: If the equipment is a pain to use, it simply won't be used.
"EA Sports Active 2" is exhibit A. As fitness interfaces go, it bleeds promise, with a polished arrangement of tools and a suite of online features that completely outclass those of its competitors. But the actual act of working out - both in terms of preparing for it and the diminished returns from that preparation - provide too much aggravation and not enough upside to make the year's most expensive exercise video game ($100, regardless of system) also the year's best.
The price tag reflects what's inside the box, because in addition to the game, "Active" ships with three motion-tracking bands (one for each arm, one for the right leg), a stock-quality resistance band and a USB receiver that reads your motions as well as the heart monitor readings provided by one of the arm bands. Each tracking band requires two AAA batteries, and while the box comes with six freebies, those investing in "Active" might find this as good a time as any to invest in a rechargeable battery system as well. (Note: The Xbox 360 version of "Active" ditches two of the sensors in favor of Kinect compatibility, but includes the heart monitor band.)
In terms of interface, "Active" is awesome. The main menu offers a clear breakdown of calories burned, workout details and other information about your progress, and you can reference your history and graph your progress with a few button presses. The game's preset workout programs offer up to nine weeks of scheduled workouts and structure it like an actual video game, with goals and progress bars in clear view to touch the same motivational nerves most traditional games tap. Throughout the entirety of the game, the heart rate monitor gives an onscreen readout - not necessarily crucial information while you're flipping through menus, but enlightening nonetheless.
"Active's" community features are similarly comprehensive - to a fault if you aren't interested in them. The game tracks a ton of stats across its entire community, and if you join a workout group with some friends, it provides stats and updates on that front as well. The upside is obvious, but if your interest in "Active" is strictly on a personal level, the constant interruptions while the game connects to its online server become annoying in a hurry.
Unfortunately, everything good and bad about the interface kneels at the mercy of the actual workout, and this is where "Active" stumbles. The three-sensor system is a clear improvement over the original, Wii-only "Active's" motion recognition capabilities. But it's still unequipped to discern whether you're really doing an exercise properly or using form that's poor but close enough to trick it. Your onscreen character tries his or her best to mimic your movements, but it's clear the game is guessing to some extent, and when games like "The Biggest Loser Ultimate Workout" and "Your Shape Fitness Evolved" are using the Kinect to demonstrate 1:1 fidelity, "Active's" educated guesswork feels obsolete out of the gate.
If and when EA Sports applies the same interface to a game that's otherwise built from the ground up to capitalize on the Kinect and Playstation Move hardware, it'll have the best fitness game on the market. So keep an eye out for "Active 3," but put your money elsewhere until then.

description.hltext_display: Former Belmont coach praises president's anti-bias statement
description.content:
She's out of a job, with a baby on the way and Christmas just around the corner.
So why is former Belmont soccer coach Lisa Howe feeling grateful?
"I thought yesterday was a great day, when (Belmont University President Bob) Fisher started putting a new policy in place to not discriminate based on sexual orientation. I praise him for that," Howe said Thursday.Related After six years at the university, where she coached the soccer team to a conference championship, Howe found herself abruptly out of a job last week, shortly after she informed her students of her sexual orientation and the fact that she and her pregnant partner are expecting their first child this spring.
"It was long overdue for me to be honest with my team," said Howe, noting that impending motherhood led to "a lot of soul-searching" about how she wanted to present herself to the world.
"I was just worried about the message I was continuing to send to my team by not being honest with them and the message I was sending really to anyone and everyone who knew I was hiding. I just felt that telling my team was long overdue."
Neither Howe nor Fisher will talk directly about the circumstances that led to her departure from the university, but Howe's players told the news media that she had been fired for violating the Christian school's "don't ask, don't tell" policy on sexual orientation.
On Wednesday, amid a firestorm of criticism and unflattering national headlines, a public statement, saying that the private Christian university welcomes gay and lesbian students and faculty and does not base its hiring and firing decisions on sexual orientation.
Howe said Fisher's announcement gave her hope and could even encourage her to reapply for her old job.
"A few days ago, one of my goals was just to (make sure) my next job was in a place where I felt welcome and I felt safe," she said. "With sexual orientation in a nondiscrimination clause, I would definitely consider reapplying to Belmont." (2 of 3)Outpouring of support
Fisher's announcement came after days of protests, including sit-ins and marches around the campus. Howe's departure drew national headlines and criticism from high-octane university supporters , who has raised millions for Belmont. Howe said the outpouring of support from students, alumni and strangers including members of the community who have stepped forward to offer to host baby showers for the expectant couple has been overwhelming. The controversy, she said, has given her an opportunity to raise awareness about gays and lesbians, particularly those who, like her, are parents and faithful Christians.
"I definitely want (people) to know that gays and lesbians can live according to good Christian tenets," she said. "I want them to know that I was well respected in my profession, and coaching soccer is my passion."
Soccer has been Howe's life. Growing up in Houston, she went to soccer camp with future Olympian Mia Hamm, played throughout college and has coached throughout her professional life, first at Berry College, then Jacksonville State where she found herself putting together a Division I team from scratch at age 25 and finally to Belmont, where she has been since 2005.Related Belmont, she said, had attracted her attention even when it was still one of her athletic rivals. In the decade since Fisher took over as president, the school has doubled in size, hosted and with the Tennessee Baptist Convention. And it's still growing, adding a law school and a pharmacy school.
It was that sense of energy and potential that drew Howe in the first place.
"I was coaching against Belmont, and every time I would bring a team to the campus at Belmont, there was something new. There was a new building or there was a new academic program or there was a new facility. It was a growing university, and I could see that as an outsider. It felt like the potential was there to build a new women's soccer program." (3 of 3)Baby due in May
The fact that it was a Christian university, she said, did not give her pause. "Being a Christian, I did not see that as being a problem," she said.
She says she tried to coach the soccer team on Christian principles: do unto others as you would have them do unto you; don't judge; be accepting and forgiving. Last week, when her distressed athletes skipped out on a morning workout in the weight room to ask her about her apparent dismissal, she ordered them out on a brisk morning run.
Then, she said, she started working the phones, calling the high school athletes she'd spent the past few months recruiting to come to Belmont and urging them to come anyway, even though she wouldn't be there.Related The baby her first child and her parents' first grandchild is due in May. For now, she said, things are so overwhelming, it's difficult to focus on things such as the upcoming holiday, or what color to paint the nursery.
"We plan to raise our baby in a Christian home," Howe said. "I think you can be gay or lesbian and be a Christian. I think I've showed that every day of my life."
She prefers not to identify her partner, who she said is under enough stress with the pregnancy and the loss of Howe's paycheck. The two have been together for eight years and recently celebrated a commitment ceremony.
"We'll find out the (baby's) sex next week," she said. "Maybe that'll be an early Christmas present."

description.hltext_display: TripAdvisor Launches FacebookÂ® Integration, Making Travel Planning More Social for Millions
description.content:
TripAdvisor Launches Facebook® Integration, Making Travel Planning More Social for Millions
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE TripAdvisor
Travel Site Instantly Surfaces Personalized Reviews and Activities From Friends
NEWTON, Mass., Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- TripAdvisor®, the world's largest travel site*, today launched an integration with Facebook that instantly personalizes the site for each person who visits, surfacing trusted reviews from friends, most popular destinations among friends, and an interactive social map. The integration is the next step in making travel planning even more fun, relevant, and social for travelers.
To view the multimedia assets associated with this release, please click: http://multivu.prnewswire.com/mnr/tripadvisor/42938/
(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20101221/MM20436 )
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20080902/TRIPADVISORLOGO )
"Earlier this year, we thought, how cool would it be if travelers could automatically see travel reviews written by their friends while researching their vacations on TripAdvisor? Fast forward to today and we're thrilled to have brought it to life with Facebook," said Steve Kaufer, founder and CEO of TripAdvisor. "More than half of TripAdvisor users have a Facebook account, and we wanted to make it easier for them to find the most relevant and social content quickly and share the experience with their friends. Today's launch is an evolution of TripAdvisor's social integrations with Facebook, from the Cities I've Visited app to the Trip Friends feature, and we look forward to seeing even more trips planned with friends on the site."
Social Travel Planning in an Instant
Now when travelers come to TripAdvisor.com, while logged into Facebook, they will see the activities their friends have shared first, helping them to make more informed decisions when planning their own trip.
There are three levels of travel inspiration with this integration. First, travelers can see a map on the homepage revealing where their friends have been, to inspire them to visit a new destination. Travelers can also visit a destination's tourism page on TripAdvisor to uncover all the valuable, insightful comments written by people they know. And if travelers are researching a particular hotel, restaurant, or attraction, they will first see reviews written by their friends about that place. Through Facebook, people will also have the power to control how and which information is shared.
"TripAdvisor's integration with Facebook demonstrates the power of incorporating social context into online activities, as well as the enormous value of advice from trusted friends," said Ethan Beard, director of Facebook Developer Network.
Making "Trip Friends" Even Friendlier
When TripAdvisor unveiled the groundbreaking Trip Friends feature in June, it allowed travelers to connect to Facebook on TripAdvisor and see where their friends have visited and ask them questions about their trips. This latest integration takes the social experience of TripAdvisor one step further by allowing travelers to instantly see their friends' reviews and activities.
Travelers will only see the advice of their Facebook friends that permit TripAdvisor and Facebook to show their reviews on TripAdvisor. Travelers that do not want access to their friends’ travel advice, or don’t want their reviews to be seen by their friends, can simply choose to opt-out of this feature.
"The combination of the world's largest travel community and the world's largest social site represents a dynamic new vehicle that will help revolutionize the way travelers plan their trips," said Kaufer.
The new Facebook integration has begun rolling out and will be live to all .com users by the end of the day. To learn more, go to: www.tripadvisor.com/instantpersonalization.
About TripAdvisor
TripAdvisor® is the world's largest travel site, enabling travelers to plan and have the perfect trip. TripAdvisor offers trusted advice from real travelers and a wide variety of travel choices and planning features (including Flights search, TripAdvisor Mobile and TripAdvisor Trip Friends) with seamless links to booking tools.
TripAdvisor® Media Group, operated by TripAdvisor LLC, attracts more than 50 million unique monthly visitors* across 17 popular travel brands**. TripAdvisor-branded sites make up the largest travel community in the world, with more than 40 million unique monthly visitors***, 20 million members, and over 40 million reviews and opinions. The sites operate in 26 countries worldwide****, including China under daodao.com. TripAdvisor also operates TripAdvisor for Business, a dedicated division that provides the tourism industry access to TripAdvisor's millions of monthly visitors. The division includes Business Listings, which allows hoteliers to connect directly to millions of researching travelers, and Vacation Rentals, which helps property managers and individual home owners list their properties and showcase hotel alternatives.
TripAdvisor Media Group websites have been recognized as top travel resources in 2010 by Condé Nast Traveller, Good Housekeeping, TIME magazine and Travel + Leisure.
TripAdvisor and the sites comprising the TripAdvisor Media Group are operating companies of Expedia, Inc. (Nasdaq: EXPE).
TripAdvisor and the TripAdvisor logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of TripAdvisor LLC in the U.S. and/or other countries. Other logos or product and company names mentioned herein may be the property of their respective owners.
©2010 TripAdvisor LLC. All rights reserved.
*Source: comScore Media Metrix for TripAdvisor Media Group Sites, Worldwide, August 2010
** In addition to TripAdvisor, The TripAdvisor Media Group of websites includes: www.airfarewatchdog.com, www.bookingbuddy.com, www.cruisecritic.com, www.familyvacationcritic.com, www.flipkey.com, www.holidaylettings.co.uk, www.holidaywatchdog.com, www.independenttraveler.com, www.onetime.com, www.seatguru.com, www.sniqueaway.com, www.smartertravel.com, www.travel-library.com, www.travelpod.com, www.virtualtourist.com and www.kuxun.cn.

description.hltext_display: Regala diversión, no peligro
Foco de inversionistas en déficit fiscal podría trasladarse a EE.UU. en 2011
description.content:
la brecha de presupuesto llegó a US$ 1,29 billón en el año fiscal 2010
El foco de atención de los inversionistas en bonos podría trasladarse desde la crisis de deuda soberana en la eurozona al alto nivel de déficit de Estados Unidos el próximo año, en especial si los conflictos políticos frustran los esfuerzos por reducir la brecha presupuestaria.
El déficit de presupuesto de Estados Unidos llegó a US$ 1,29 billón (millón de millones), un nivel cercano a récord, en el año fiscal 2011, y aún no hay voluntad política para tomar medidas que permitan contener la brecha.
Según el Departamento del Tesoro, la posición financiera neta del gobierno se deterioró a un déficit de
US$ 13,5 billones el año pasado, desde US$ 11,5 billones en 2009.
"Debemos equilibrar nuestros esfuerzos para acelerar la recuperación económica en el corto plazo con los esfuerzos continuos para enfrentar los desafíos que genera el panorama de déficit en el largo plazo", dijo el secretario del Tesoro, Timothy Geithner, al presentar ayer el informe, que da cuenta de los activos y pasivos del gobierno.
Voluntad política
A diferencia de Europa, Estados Unidos tiene la ventaja de poseer la moneda de reserva mundial y la capacidad de imprimirla. En parte por eso, las perspectivas de que Estados Unidos se declare en default son remotas, pero eso no significa que la mayor economía mundial pueda endeudarse siempre a menos de 3% por diez años, como puede hacerlo ahora.
El lunes, dos senadores se comprometieron a proponer un proyecto de ley bipartidista para reducir el déficit. La iniciativa, que sería presentada el próximo año, reflejaría las propuestas para reducir la brecha que realizó una comisión presidencial este mes.
La comisión, establecida por el presidente Barack Obama, propuso a principios de diciembre reformar el sistema tributario, eliminando o reduciendo varios beneficios tributarios, y reducir el déficit en casi US$ 4 billones en la próxima década. Sin embargo, la comisión no logró apoyo para impulsar el plan en el Congreso.
Por eso, la propuesta del senador demócrata Mark Warner y de su colega republicano Saxby Chambliss se enfrentará a un Capitol Hill cuesta arriba. La oposición republicana, que controla el Senado, está a favor de reducir los gastos para diminuir la brecha fiscal, pero los demócratas no están a favor de las medidas de austeridad, al menos no hasta que la recuperación económica se agilice.
La debilidad de la recuperación impulsó al presidente Obama a negociar con los republicanos para prolongar por dos años las rebajas de impuestos de la era Bush, incluyendo además medios para que los estadounidenses usen los dineros que ahorren con esta medida para estimular el crecimiento. El acuerdo, por US$ 858 mil millones, fue aprobado la semana pasada por el Congreso, sumando presión al presupuesto.
En el corto plazo, uno de los temas que se tomará la discusión parlamentaria será el aumento al límite de deuda del gobierno, lo que sería necesario en el primer o segundo trimestre de 2011.

description.hltext_display: Восстановление частного жилья в Южной Осетии планируют завершить в начале 2011 года
description.content:
Восстановление частного жилья в Южной Осетии, полностью или частично разрушенного во время августовской войны 2008 года, завершится первом квартале следующего года. Об этом корреспонденту ИА REGNUM сообщил гендиректор государственного унитарного предприятия (ГУП) "Дирекция по реализации приоритетных национальных проектов" Сослан Бекоев, комментируя итоги за 2010 год в возглавляемом им предприятии.
"На данный момент в производстве ГУП находятся 411 объектов индивидуального жилья. 45 объектов индивидуального жилья подлежат капитальному ремонту - эти дома были сожжены, и лишь по просьбе хозяев они не снесены и восстанавливаются в прежних рамках", - сообщил Бекоев.
Он отметил,что работа на нескольких объектах не начата по вине хозяев домовладений, которые не согласны с предложенными им проектами. Также, по его словам, в силу объективных причин строительство не ведется на некоторых объектах в центре Цхинвала (Еврейский квартал).
В целом, по словам Бекоева, практически на всех объектах нового строительства индивидуального жилья работа идет активно. "До выделения из бюджета Южной Осетии средств на восстановление частного сектора было сдано 109 домов, на сегодняшний день сдано еще 168. 111 домов планируется сдать в декабре. В январе и феврале 2011 года будут сданы 52 и 20 объектов соответственно", - сказал Бекоев.
Он сообщил, что капитальный ремонт индивидуального и новое строительство муниципального жилья будут завершены также в первом квартале следующего года. "Что касается муниципального жилья, что в производстве ГУП находятся 17 многоквартирных домов, общей площадью более 11 тысяч квадратных метров - 147 квартир. Ведутся работы по восстановлению частично поврежденных муниципальных домовладений, дошкольных учреждений и спортивной школы. Порядка 16 объектов уже сдано в эксплуатацию. К концу года все работы будут завершены в рамках определенного финансирования", - сообщил директор ГУП.
Отметим, что ГУП "Дирекция по реализации приоритетных национальных проектов" был создан в 2009 году в качестве генерального подрядчика по восстановлению частного жилья и капитального ремонта муниципальных объектов.

description.hltext_display: Minibuss og personbil har kollidert i Iveland
description.author: Elling Svela
description.content:
Elling Svela Mads Ommundsen IVELAND: Ulykken skjedde på riksvei 403 mellom Samkom og Skaiå like før klokken 08.30.
Luftambulanse, tre ambulanser og politiet ble sendt til stedet. Til legevakt - Ulykken var ikke så alvorlig som først antatt, sier operasjonsleder Per Lauvnes ved Agder politidistrikt til fvn.no.
En mann, en kvinne og et barn satt i personbilen, mens den 64 år gamle føreren av minibussen var alene.
- En lege på stedet undersøkte de involverte. En gravid kvinne ønsket kontroll på legevakten. I tillegg ble barnet tatt med for kontroll. Begge satt i personbilen, opplyser operasjonslederen. Uklar årsak Det var en 38 år gammel mann som kjørte personbilen.
Politiet fikk melding om ulykken fra AMK klokken 08.33.
- Vi har foreløpig ikke oversikt over hendelsesforeløpet. Begge bilene fikk materielle skader, sa Lauvnes til fvn.no klokken 09.30.
Saken oppdateres.

description.hltext_display: Concern Over UK Cancer Survival Rates
description.content:
Britain has the worst survival rate for cancer among similarly developed nations, according to scientists.
Research partly funded by the Department of Health took data from England, Wales and Northern Ireland and compared it to five other countries.
In some cases, survival rates in the UK were more than 10% lower than those elsewhere in Europe, Australia and Canada, according to the International Cancer Benchmarking Partnership.
The study authors, including the Government's cancer tsar Professor Sir Michael Richards, said the findings are consistent with differences in time of diagnosis and treatment.
The scientists analysed data on 2.4 million cancer patients in the UK (not including Scotland) along with Australia, Canada, Denmark, Norway and Sweden.
They focused on four of the most important cancers - breast, bowel, lung and ovarian - looking at survival rates at one and five years between 1995 and 2007.
The results showed life expectancy of cancer patients in the UK was consistently shorter than in other countries.
Only Denmark had a similarly poor record, though generally its outcomes were not as bad as the UK's.
The findings were divided across three periods: 1995 to 1999, 2000 to 2002 and 2005 to 2007.
For the most recent period up to 2007, the UK had the worst bowel, lung and breast cancer five-year survival rates of any of the six countries.
During this period, 53.6% of UK bowel cancer patients were alive five years after diagnosis compared with 65.9% in Australia - a difference of 12.3%.
For lung cancer, 8.8% of patients survived five years in the UK and 18.4% in the best performing country, Canada.
The trend was repeated in breast cancer cases. Some 81.6% of women with breast cancer survived five years in the UK compared with 88.5% in Sweden.
Denmark's five-year survival rate for ovarian cancer was marginally lower than the UK's - 36.1% compared with 36.4%

event_or_fact.property: the findings are consistent with differences in time of diagnosis and treatment

description.hltext_display: "한반도 유사시 후방 맡겠다" 日, 40년전에…
description.content:
일본의 사토 에이사쿠(佐藤榮作) 전 총리가 미국과의 오키나와(沖繩) 반환 협상 당시인 1969년 한반도 유사시 후방을 맡겠다고 미국에 자청한 것으로 밝혀졌다고 요미우리신문이 외무성의 외교문서를 인용해 보도했다.
일본 외무성이 22일 공개한 오키나와 반환 협상 당시의 외교문서에 따르면 사토 총리는 1969년 7월 31일 관저에서 윌리엄 로저스 미 국무장관과 회담하면서 한반도 유사시의 대응과 관련 "후방을 맡겠다"고 말했다.
사토 총리는 "만약 한국으로부터 이 문제(후방 지원)에 대한 정식 요청이 있을 경우 (미국으로부터 반환받은) 오키나와뿐 아니라 본토의 기지에서도 후방지원을 맡겠다고 말하겠다"고 밝혔다.
당시 미국 정부는 주일 미군이 일본외 지역의 유사시 출격할 경우 사전협의를 일본 측과 어떻게 하느냐에 큰 관심을 갖고 있었다.
사토 총리는 1969년 11월 리처드 닉슨 미국 대통령과의 회담후 발표한 공동성명에서도 "한국의 안전은 일본의 안전에 매우 긴요하다"고 밝혔으며, 같은 날 연설에서는 주일 미군의 출격과 관련한 사전협의에 대해 "전향적으로, 신속하게 태도를 결정할 방침이다"고 말했다.
미국은 당시 한반도와 대만 외에 베트남으로의 군 출격 때에도 오키나와 기지를 사용할 수 있도록 해 달라고 요구했고 일본은 이를 용인했다.
한편 미국은 오키나와 반환 협정에서 반환대상으로 센카쿠(尖閣: 중국명 댜오위다오)를 명기하는데 난색을 표해 지도상의 경위도선으로 둘러싸는 방식으로 센카쿠 제도가 반환지역에 포함된 형태로 합의의사록에 명시됐다.
당시는 닉슨 정부가 중국과의 화해를 추진하던 시기여서 센카쿠 영유권을 주장하기 시작한 중국과 대만을 의식했기 때문으로 보인다.

description.hltext_display: Les subventions passées au crible par la Communauté de communes
description.content:
lu 11 fois
Bien qu'ayant une excellente gestion associative, le multi-accueil n'a pas obtenu de subvention complémentaire en 2010, tandis que la Lumière des Tours est pris à la gorge par les retards de versements d'aides.
Parmi les dossiers ayant été les plus débattus au cours de cette dernière séance annuelle du 13 décembre du conseil de la communauté de communes du Pays de Saint-Yrieix (ComComPSY), il y eut également celui du multi-accueil.
« Pomme de Reinette ». L'assemblée a décidé de ne pas attribuer de subvention (32.000 euros sollicitée) à Pomme de Reinette cette année aux vues de ses résultats.
En effet, très bien gérée, cette association parentale présente en 2009 un résultat important soit 64.835 euros (contre 7.447 euros en 2008, 11.266 euros en 2007 et 1.024 euros en 2006).
Dans l'attente de subventions régionales et européennes (18.000 euros environ), Pomme de Reinette avait dû solliciter le soutien de la ComCom PSY, avec des subventions annuelles variant de 26.000 à 31.000 euros, entre 2006 et 2009, et une avance de 2.000 euros sur 2010.
Pomme de Reinette a finalement réceptionné ces aides au cours de 2009. L'association a aussi pu compter sur la CAF a toujours versé annuellement entre 36.202 euros à 33.628 euros (plafond actuel).
A noter que, le multi-accueil réalise une importante progression dans ce service tourné vers le public, et les familles en particulier.
Le taux de fréquentation est passé de 40% il y a quelques années contre 80% pratiquement aujourd'hui, dont 72% des enfants résidant sur la ComCom PSY.
Malgré la décision de ne pas attribuer de nouvelle aide financière au multi-accueil parentale de Saint-Yrieix, le président Daniel Boisserie rappelle « l'engagement de la ComCom PSY en cas de difficultés financières éventuelles, puisqu'il s'agit de l'accueil de nos enfants et petits-enfants ».
« La Lumière des Tours ». L'association de Coussac Bonneval « La Lumière des Tours » connait actuellement la même problématique d'attente de versements des subventions attribuées les années précédentes par les mêmes institutionnels (Europe), et sollicite de ce fait une subvention complémentaire de 5.000 euros en cette fin d'année, afin d'honorer ses factures 2010 : cette aide financière lui fut accordée.
A La Roche-l'Abeille.
Avis favorable pour l'étude du dossier d'aménagement d'un local, l'ancienne poste, afin de faciliter l'implantation d'une boulangerie, aujourd'hui manquante sur cette commune.
La ComCom PSY ayant compétence dans les actions de développement dans les domaines artisanaux, commerciaux et industriels.
Réparation des vitraux de l'église – Accord pour demander tous les devis nécessaires et solliciter toutes subventions possibles.
Le Chalard.
Aménagement de la traversée du bourg, avec l'accord d'une subvention de 40% du Conseil général pour la réalisation de cette étude, la consultation pour cette étude sera donc lancée.
Une commission intercommunale pour l'accessibilité aux personnes handicapées doit faire un rapport d'accessibilité des établissements communaux et intercommunaux recevant du public.
La ComCom PSY sera le coordonnateur du groupement de commandes avec les communes. Il est aujourd'hui nécessaire de réaliser ce diagnostic, chaque commune membre supportant les frais lui incombant.
Amortissement des Immobilisations Corporelles achetées par la ComCom PSY :
Au complexe Villa Sport :d'un montant d'environ 20.500 euros HT, le matériel sera amorti sur 1 ans (sauf les rideaux d'occultation sur 5 ans) .
A l'Unité de conditionnement de marrons et châtaignes de Bourdelas - en tant que biens productifs de revenus, ces biens seront amortis sur 15 ans et l'équipement sur 5 ans.
Au niveau du personnel, création d'un emploi à temps complet en tant qu'adjoint d'animation 2e classe.

description.hltext_display: Autoilijoita muistutetaan sumuvaloista ja hätävilkuista
description.content: Ulkomaalaisia autoilijoita muistutetaan hätävilkkujen ja sumuvalojen käytöstä. Kaakkois-Suomen rajavartiosto ja liikkuvan poliisin Kouvolan yksikkö ovat laatineet asiasta venäjänkielisen tiedotteen Kaakkois-Suomen rajanylityspaikoilla jaettavaksi.Sumuvaloja saa käyttää vain sumun tai rankan vesi- tai lumisateen aikana. Takasumuvaloa saa lisäksi käyttää, kun ajoviiman tiestä nostama lumi, pöly tai loka oleellisesti rajoittaa ajoneuvon näkymistä taaksepäin. Pimeys ei ole käytön peruste.Hätävilkkuja saa käyttää vain, jos ajoneuvo on onnettomuuden, vaurion tai muun pakottavan syyn johdosta jouduttu pysäyttämään paikkaan, jossa se voi aiheuttaa erityistä vaaraa muulle liikenteelle. Itse aiheutettu tilanne, kuten kartan lukeminen, ei oikeuta hätävilkkujen käyttöön.Virheellinen sumuvalojen tai hätävilkkujen käyttö on rangaistava teko.

description.hltext_display: Direto ao ponto: destaque da sessão fica com revisão do PIB dos EUA do terceiro tri
description.author: Tainara Machado
description.content:
SÃO PAULO - O Dow Jones e o S&P 500 atingiram na véspera os patamares mais altos em cerca de dois anos, mesmo com avanços modestos, e contribuíram também com a melhora de humor por aqui. Assim, o Ibovespa avançou 1,41%, retomando a casa dos 68 mil pontos e revertendo a baixa auferida na véspera. Além das blue chips, as ações ligadas a companhias do setor imobiliário colaboraram com o avanço.
Para Eduardo Dias, analista da PAX Corretora, além do cenário externo favorável, o pregão foi favorecido pelo arrefecimento do IPCA-15 (Índice de Preços ao Consumidor Amplo), que mostrou desaceleração em relação ao mês passado e ficou abaixo das expectativas do mercado, ao subir 0,69% em dezembro.
Como os investidores estão de olho no que fará o Copom (Comitê de Política Monetária) em reunião marcada para janeiro, o índice foi um bom sinal, mostrando inclusive pressão menor dos preços dos alimentos. No entanto, nesta quarta-feira (22), a avaliação de Dias é que o mercado voltará a observar com maior atenção os eventos externos.
Destaque para dados nos EUA
O destaque fica com a revisão do PIB (Produto Interno Bruto) norte-americano para o terceiro trimestre. A prévia havia mostrado um crescimento de 2,5%, mas a perspectiva é que o número revisado mostre tendência um pouco mais positiva, com expansão de 2,7% da economia norte-americana entre julho e setembro deste ano.
Além disso, outro dado em destaque será as vendas de imóveis existentes, cuja expectativa, de acordo com as estimativas compiladas pelo site Briefing.com, é de que passem de 4,43 milhões de casas vendidas na medição anualizada de outubro para 4,65 milhões em novembro. De acordo com Eduardo Dias, da PAX, se os dados não decepcionarem e mostrarem números em linha com as estimativas, não há motivos para que o Ibovespa não continue a subir neste pregão.

description.hltext_display: Stunt goes wrong as Spider-Man actor plunges to stage
description.content:
A stuntman playing Spider-Man in Broadway's most expensive show ever plunged to the stage in front of a horrified audience, dealing the troubled production yet another setback.
The accident occurred near the end of a dress rehearsal late on Monday for Spider-Man Turn Off The Dark, the repeatedly delayed $US65 million spectacular, which features music by Bono and U2 guitarist the Edge.
Mobile phone video taken by a theatregoer shows Christopher Tierney, stunt double for the lead actor, falling as he attempts a high-wire rescue of the Mary Jane character.
Plunged to the stage ... Christopher Tierney falls during an aerial stunt Photo: AP
Screams can be heard as he plunges headfirst towards the stage, which appears to be about six metres below, and reports said that he continued right into the orchestra pit, for a fall of some nine metres.
The show is built around stunning acrobatics in which actors and stunt doubles swoop high over the stage and audience.
One New Zealander who was in the audience told CNN that he knew something was wrong when Spider-Man fell.
Christopher Tierney is taken to hospital. Photo: AP
"The whole show, whenever they fell it was slow," he said. "This time he fell down quick, so you knew it was different."
Another audience member wrote on Twitter: "Someone took nasty fall. Screaming. 911 called. No idea what happened, kicked audience out."
A spokesman for the production suggested the actor was not badly hurt.
"An actor sustained an injury at tonight's performance,'" Rick Miramontez said.
"He fell several feet from a platform approximately seven minutes before the end of the performance, and the show was stopped. All signs were good as he was taken to the hospital for observation. We will have more news shortly."
But the accident was the fourth cast member injury in the increasingly ill-fated show, whose latest opening delay of four weeks pushed the new first night to February 7.
Blogs and online comment boards filled with calls for the show to be yanked.
"This is just getting silly. Time to shut this down," one contributor to the New York Times website said.
"Pathetic indifference to the safety and well being of actors," another said. "This show should be performed by stunt performers in Las Vegas, not on Broadway with union represented actors."
Embattled director Julie Taymor said the show's ambition meant it was never going to be easy.
"I don't think what's truly creative can be done without danger and risk," she said.
Spider-Man, born four decades ago as a Marvel comic books story, tells how geeky teenager Peter Parker develops superhero powers after being bitten by a genetically altered spider.
But the humans reprising the role are proving more vulnerable.
Natalie Mendoza, the actress playing spider goddess Arachne in the show, Tweeted: "Please pray with me for my friend Chris, my superhero who quietly inspires me everyday with his spirit."

event_or_fact.property: the show's ambition meant it was never going to be easy
I don't think what's truly creative can be done without danger and risk
The whole show, whenever they fell it was slow; This time he fell down quick, so you knew it was different.

description.hltext_display: stern TV am 22.12.2010
description.content:
Köln (ots) - stern TV - Mittwoch 22. Dezember 2010, 23:15 Uhr -
bei RTL Moderation: Günther Jauch
Schiff Ahoi - Die Beutelspacher-Fünflinge auf großer Fahrt
Esther, Silvana, Daniel, Christian und Johannes sind die
bekanntesten Fünflinge Deutschlands. Seit ihrer Geburt vor elf Jahren
begleitet stern TV die quirlige Rasselbande mit der Kamera. Immer
dabei die tapferen Eltern Ursula und Markus Beutelspacher. Auch im
vergangenen Jahr ging es in der Großfamilie hoch her: Schule, Sport-
und Musikunterricht bestimmten den Alltag. Grund genug, um sich auch
mal ein paar Tage Erholung zu gönnen: Familienurlaub auf dem
Hausboot. Ob Papa Markus seine Crew im Griff hatte und was dieses
Jahr sonst noch bei den Beutelspachers passiert ist, erzählen sie bei
Günther Jauch im Studio.
Geschenke-Bingo: Wohin mit den scheußlichen Geschenken?
Weihnachtszeit ist Geschenkezeit. Jedes Jahr aufs Neue steigt die
Spannung: Was haben sich Oma oder Tante wohl dieses Jahr wieder
einfallen lassen? Oft folgt Ernüchterung. Selbstgestrickte Socken,
kitschige Kerzenhalter und wild gemusterte Krawatten - vor nichts
macht die liebe Familie halt. Doch wohin mit diesen Scheußlichkeiten?
Thorsten Schorn will Abhilfe schaffen! Er besucht ahnungslose
Menschen als stern TV-Weihnachtsmann und sorgt für eine schöne
Bescherung. Das große Geschenke-Bingo - bei stern TV.
Originaltext: STERN TV
Digitale Pressemappe: http://www.presseportal.de/pm/6514
Pressemappe via RSS : http://www.presseportal.de/rss/pm_6514.rss2

description.hltext_display: Etelä-Korea järjestää jälleen isot sotaharjoitukset
description.content:
Etelä-Korea järjestää huomenna maan kaikkien aikojen suurimmat ampumaharjoitukset.
Harjoitukset pidetään mantereella Pohjois-Korean rajan tuntumassa. Mukana on tykistöä ja hävittäjiä.
Maanantaina Etelä-Korea piti ampumaharjoitukset saarella lähellä maiden välistä merirajaa. Pohjois-Korea ei ennakkopeloista poiketen vastannut harjoitukseen mitenkään.
Koreat ajautuivat sodan partaalle viime kuussa, kun Pohjois-Korea tulitti maiden rajan tuntumassa olevaa saarta.

description.hltext_display: PORTI: GENOVA; ACCORDO CALVINI-MERLO SU SESTO BACINO
description.content:
(AGI) - Genova, 21 dic. - Realizzare il sesto bacino di carenaggio al Molo Giano: e' la proposta presentata oggi, presso la sede di Confindustria Genova, dal Presidente dell'Autorita' Portuale Luigi Merlo alle aziende del comparto delle Riparazioni Navali dell'Associazione.
"Tale soluzione - si legge in una nota di Confindustria - comporterebbe la revisione del Piano Regolatore Portuale vigente e pertanto, qualora le relative autorizzazioni dovessero richiedere un tempo superiore a quello necessario alla costruzione del bacino stesso, si dovrebbe ipotizzare una fase transitoria di collocamento della vasca presso il pontile "ex super bacino".
Confindustria Genova concorda con la proposta del presidente Merlo - che di fatto riprende il progetto presentato alcuni mesi fa dalle aziende di riparazione navale - e, in accordo con il numero uno dell'Authority, individua nell'Accordo di programma lo strumento a tutela dello sviluppo delle realta' esistenti e, in particolare, del Cantiere Amico, accanto al quale sarebbe posizionato transitoriamente il sesto bacino con il rischio di comprometterne l'attivita'.
Confindustria Genova - conclude la nota dell'Associazione - ha ribadito il proprio impegno a sostenere l'azione del presidente Merlo volta al rilancio del comparto delle riparazioni navali.

description.hltext_display: Konstanz bereits schneefrei
description.content: Offenbach/Konstanz (dpa) - Konstanz am Bodensee ist der einzige Ort ohne Schnee in den bundesweiten Messungen des Deutschen Wetterdienstes DWD. Die Stadt im äußersten Süden Deutschlands war mit Stand vom Dienstagabend schneefrei und verzeichnete in der Nacht zum Mittwoch mit plus drei Grad eine in diesen Tagen milde Temperatur. Alle übrigen über ganz Deutschland verteilten...

description.hltext_display: Worlds first glasses-free 3D TV hits stores
description.content:
Toshiba on Wednesday launched in Japan what it calls the world’s first television that allows viewers to see 3D images without the need to wear special glasses.
Curious shoppers stopped to test out the screen at an electronics store in central Tokyo as the 12-inch model of Regza GL1 Series went on sale.
The new model with a liquid crystal display carries a price tag of 119,800 yen (1,400 dollars). A 20-inch model will be released on Saturday.
The new 3D TV does not require users to wear special glasses, whereas other 3D-capable models require glasses that act as filters to separate images to each eye to create the illusion of depth.
Toshiba’s screens use processing technology to create depth-filled images and the Regza GL1 Series allow users to switch between 2D and 3D on normal TV programmes.
Kazuhito Gunji, a public relations official at electronics retailer Bic Camera, said the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product.
Electronics stores are hoping that the release of the latest technology will help offset declining sales as government incentives for purchasing environment-friendly home appliances were reduced this month.
The hugely competitive TV sector is a challenge for many electronics makers given that customers are increasingly accustomed to declining prices, making it difficult for the industry to generate profits.
Sony on Monday said it may fall short of its sales goal of 25 million liquid crystal display TV sets this fiscal year as it struggles to be profitable in the sector, and has also embraced 3D TV technology.
Most shoppers were curious but also cautious about the new device on Wednesday, however.
“I want to watch on a big screen,” said a 47-year-old man who has a 37-inch TV at home. “I’ll wait for another year before buying,” he said.
Another customer, 33, said: “It’s great that we don’t have to wear glasses, which is a nuisance.”
“But I didn’t feel images were flying out of the screen on some programmes,” he added.
Toshiba says images on the 12-inch screen are best viewed from the front and some 65 centimetres (26 inches) away.
“Customers currently think of 3D images as just an add-on function... but 3D is expected to become a standard eventually” with 3D films and video titles increasing, said Toshiba sales official Eiichi Matsuzawa.
Rival Sharp earlier this year unveiled a small glasses-free LCD touch screen that shows 3D images for use in mobile phones, digital cameras and games consoles such as Nintendo’s 3DS, to be released in Japan in February 2011.

event_or_fact.property: the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product

description.hltext_display: Pinlig teaterduo taler ud om sex- og lokumsliv Han Hun Vov & Pelsen
description.content:
Siden 1997 tilknyttet Det Kgl. Teater.
Modtog i november Danske Teaterjournalisters største pris Teaterpokalen for rollen som tobakshandlersken i ’Wienerballader’ sidste sæson.
Hun kan virkelig trykke på en kontakt, der når den højeste komedie og rækker til den dybeste tragedie.
På film står hendes præstation i Lars von Triers ’Idioterne’ (1998) som et særligt højdepunkt. Og så kan man også møde hende som sønderjyde i DR 2’s ’Rytteriet’.
Jens Jacob Tychsen
Født 1975 og uddannet fra Skuespillerskolen ved Aarhus Teater 1998.
Klassisk på den moderne måde, med et tvist af noget romantisk eller aristokratisk.
Roller på bl.a. Det Kgl. Teater, Grønnegårds Teatret og Aarhus Teater. Horace i ’Fruentimmerskolen’, prinsen i ’Den dobbelte troløshed’, Jean i ’Jean de France’.
To biroller i ’Don Juan’ i Grønnegården denne sommer, hvor han viste sin uovertruffent komiske side.
Stemmen bag utallige figurer i tegnefilm. Han elsker at imitere – og kan det. Medvirkede i Det Kgl. Teaters to sommerrevyer 2008 og 2009.
Annonce
Annonce
Få det bedste fra IBYEN på mail
Tilmeld mig også
Politiken Middag
Politiken Film
Politiken Kultur
Tjek
Pinlig teaterduo taler ud om sex- og lokumsliv
Bodil Jørgensen og Jens Jacob Tychsen serverer mesterlig nonsens på Caféteatret.
Om vi kommer i julestemning på CaféTeatret? Ja, hvis man vel at mærke er til lyden af den helt særlige bjældeklang, der sidder mellem benene.
Ding, dong, kling, klang, som det lyder i Jens Jacob Tychsens nummer efter pausen, hvor han giver den som en nøgen Jesper Fårekylling. Eller er det Klokkeblomst?
Før pausen har Bodil Jørgensen svævet rundt på scenen som Mary Poppins og sunget »leverpostej«. Ganske vist i en overlegent klodset fremførelse (opførelsen af musicalen på Det Ny Teater var bare klodset), men alligevel.
Det rene nonsens
Sagt ligeud: Bodil Jørgensens og Jens Jacob Tychsens show på CaféTeatret handler ikke om noget. Det vil os intet. Det rene og skære nonsens. Og det er jo ikke meget.
Det er på den anden side alt rigeligt, eftersom vi taler om det helt rigtige. Ikke fordi alle teksterne er lige holdbare – heller ikke når pointen er, at de ikke skal være det – men fordi showet har fundet sin egen stil.
En stil, som – ud over at beherske det meningsløse – i bund og grund beror på de to skuespilleres talent og især personlighed. Der er noget herligt gammeldags over dem begge, hvad der kommer til udtryk i en usigelig kærlighed til ikke mindst teatrets fortid.
Taler ud om sex- og lokumsliv
Et højdepunkt er, hvor vi hører en frustreret Jørgensen stå bag tæppet og opfordre Tychsen til sex – hun beklager dybt, at skuespillere ikke længere sønderknepper hinanden i teatergarderoben!
Samtidig er begge skuespillere forlenet med noget barnligt – en særlig glæde i alt fald ved at sige alt det forbudte og helst gøre det så pinligt som muligt. Som når de gentagne gange leger par og sætter sig ned blandt publikum og taler ud om deres sex- og lokumsliv.
LÆS OGSÅ Bodil Jørgensen løber med teaterpokal
Pinligheden som et nummer er de selvfølgelig ikke ene om. Den behersker både Frank Hvam og Bertel Haarder – i hver sit medieshow for tiden. Ligesom pikken ikke er noget fremmedlegeme på scenen.
Her forvaltes begge dele dog netop med en stil, som jeg i mangel af bedre ville kalde for: sjæl. Ud over at det i al sin rablende absurditet er legende mesterligt fremført.
To originaler
En kongelig revy? Det er lige før. Hvad der indtil videre ikke er lykkedes for Det Kgl. Teater – nemlig at skabe en kongelig sommerrevy, der fungerer – lykkes her på CaféTeatret, bare under navn af julekabaret, eller som de selv skriver: et sketch- eller comedyshow.
To kongelige skuespillere – Bodil Jørgensen med et ben i ’Rytteriet’, Jens Jacob Tychsen med et ben i revyen på nationalscenen – har fundet hinanden. To originaler, der tilsammen giver den højere mening, som showet som sagt ikke i sig selv har.
LÆS ANMELDELSE Rytteriet kører den lige ind med penis
Videoscenerne, hvor blandt andre Nicolas Bro og Trine Dyrholm medvirker, forhøjer indsatsen.
Bornholmernummeret til slut fuldender vanviddet.
Og undervejs er der så faktisk lidt satire: Tychsens deklamationer af ’Se og Hør’ er et godt eksempel. Sangen ’Vi sidder alle og bliver lidt våd” er et andet: Med hilsen til Carl-Mar Møller får diverse dyr og mennesker stukket noget op.
Publikum griner og må lige tørre øjnene – så blev det alligevel en våd jul! Uden at man i øvrigt skal lægge for meget i det med julen.
En velsignet stemning
Kabareten er i Niclas Bendixens iscenesættelse fra først til sidst en sindssygt velsignet stemning i sig selv – et show, som man ret beset ikke ved, man har savnet, før man ser det.
Showet både løfter og løsner op. God mod diverse forfrysninger. Og især perfekt til alle dem, der hænger ekstra meget med hovedet – eller bare med bjælderne – i januar.
Der leges videre ind i det nye år.

description.hltext_display: 2PM 탈퇴 배경, 재범이 직접 밝히면 어떨까?
description.content:
[OSEN=이혜린 기자]재범의 2PM 탈퇴 배경을 두고 현 소속사 싸이더스HQ가 전 소속사 JYP엔터테인먼트를 향해 “사실을 밝혀라”고 22일 초강수를 두면서, 사태의 추이가 관심을 모으고 있다. 오랫동안 ‘판도라의 상자’로 봉인돼왔던 재범의 탈퇴 배경이 또 한번 관심을 얻게 됐기 때문.
정작 당사자인 재범은 옆으로 빠지고, 전-현 소속사끼리 얼굴을 붉히고 있는 상태다.
싸이더스HQ는 22일 “박진영의 발언에 유감을 표하는 바”라면서 “‘진실을 밝히면, 이 친구가 다친다. 보호하기 위해 밝히지 않는다’는 뉘앙스의 이야기를 전해, 오히려 확인되지 않는 온갖 추측을 양산해내고 있다. 싸이더스HQ는 ‘밝히면 다친다’는 박재범의 일이 오히려 궁금하다. 재범이 다칠까봐 밝히지 않는 그 일이 무엇인지 JYP는 당당하고 속시원히 밝혀주시길 바라는 바”라고 밝혔다.
그러나 그동안 숱한 위기를 겪으면서도 재범의 탈퇴 배경을 함구해왔던 JYP가 이번 일로 비하인드 스토리를 밝힐 가능성은 낮은 상태다. 싸이더스HQ 역시 이같은 JYP의 사정을 알고, 더 이상 언급하지 말라는 ‘선전포고’를 보낸 것으로 해석된다.
정말 재범의 일이 깔끔하게 공개되길 바란다면, 싸이더스HQ가 재범에게 직접 묻고, 재범의 입을 통해 공식화할 수도 있기 때문. 당시 일을 구체적으로 밝히지않고 함구중인 재범이나, 재범에 관해 계속 '뭔가 있는데 말할수는 없다'면 변죽을 올리는 박진영도 마찬가지다.
두 소속사가 자신으로 인해 연이어 논란에 휘말리고 있는 가운데, 이번 사태의 키를 쥔 재범이 나서서 상황을 정리할 것인지, 아니면 여전히 침묵을 지키며 이 상태로 사태를 덮어버릴 것인지 관심을 모으는 대목이다.
이날 싸이더스HQ의 유감 표명은 지난 21일 박진영이 KBS ‘승승장구’에 출연해 재범과 관련한 질문을 받고 대답을 한 것 때문에 촉발됐다. 그는 “어렸을 때는 실수를 한다. 나 역시 그랬다. 그런데 요새는 어릴 때 데뷔하니까 문제가 되는 것 같다. 어린 나이에 부와 인기와 명예를 얻은 상태에서 (문제가) 터지니 용서가 안 되는 것”이라며 “사소하면 내가 덮을 수 있는데 너무 커서 아이를 보호하는 것과 대중을 기만하는 것 사이에서 갈등했다”고 밝혔다.
싸이더스HQ는 박진영이 이같은 녹화를 한 사실이 밝혀졌을 때부터 대표가 트위터에 박진영을 향해 원색적인 욕설을 남기는 등 격앙된 분위기였으며, 박진영은 공식 홈페이지를 통해 여러 사람이 상처 받은 일이 자신으로 인해 또 한번 언급되게 해 죄송하다고 사과의 글을 남겼다.
rinny@osen.co.kr

description.hltext_display: Ezentis se adjudica dos contratos en Rumanía por 9,46 millones de euros
description.author: EUROPA PRESS
description.content:
EUROPA PRESS La división de infraestructuras del Grupo Ezentis se ha adjudicado dos contratos en Rumanía por un importe global de 9,46 millones de euros, según ha informado la compañía. La división de infraestructuras del Grupo Ezentis se ha adjudicado dos contratos en Rumanía por un importe global de 9,46 millones de euros, según ha informado la compañía.
En concreto, Ezentis se ha adjudicado, en consorcio con la rumana Complis, las obras de remodelación de la zona industrial de la localidad de Moreni, a 90 kilómetros al Norte de Bucarest, por valor de 8,8 millones de euros.
El otro contrato, adjudicado por la sociedad gestora de aguas de Bucarest, consiste en la renovación, ampliación y mantenimiento de la red de abastecimiento de aguas y saneamiento de varias calles de la ciudad. Este contrato, ganado por Ezentis en consorcio con Triada Prod Impex, está valorado en 660.000 euros.
El primer proyecto, el de Moreni, incluye la renovación de las infraestructuras viarias, la red de abastecimiento de aguas y saneamiento, el suministro de electricidad y gas, y el sistema de telefonía y acceso a Internet.
Los trabajos de esta localidad rumana supondrán asimismo la construcción de 13 naves industriales y un nuevo edificio y la eliminación de varias infraestructuras existentes. Con esta inversión, que se enmarca en el programa operativo regional 2007-2013 de la UE, se pretende crear un nuevo polo de desarrollo económico e industrial en la región.
Por su parte, el contrato para el abastecimiento de agua en Bucarest comprende la revisión de las canalizaciones existentes y la instalación de más de 100.000 metros lineales de tubería en varias calles de la capital.
Ezentis finalizó a principios de este año en Rumanía la remodelación de otra zona industrial en Priboiu-Branesti, también en los alrededores de Bucarest. El Grupo también ha llevado a cabo en el país otras obras de renovación en entornos urbanos como las rehabilitaciones de los centros históricos de Bucarest y Braila.

description.hltext_display: Stor satsning på forskning i billigere effektelektronik
description.content:
22. december 2010 kl. 9:30 / Indland / Af Jakob Povl Holck jph@jernindustri.dk
Et nyt strategisk forskningscenter ledet af Aalborg Universitet skal udvikle billigere elektroniske apparater og mere effektive systemer, som fremskynder overgangen til vedvarende energikilder. Det Strategiske Forskningsråd har netop bevilget 40 millioner kroner til centret, og med støtte fra Det Obelske Familiefond og medfinansiering fra danske og internationale virksomheder og universiteter bliver den samlede satsning på over 90 millioner kroner.
Forskerne i det nye center CORPE (Center Of Reliable Power Electronics) skal beskæftige sig med pålidelig effektelektronik. Resultatet af deres arbejde vil både havne i vindmøller, solceller og brændselsceller samt i forbrugerudstyr af enhver art.
Effektelektronik er en nøgleteknologi i overgangen til bæredygtig energiproduktion, fordi den bruges til at omsætte elektrisk energi fra én form til en anden. Det er afgørende i forbindelse med energiproduktion fra solceller og vindmøller, men teknologien kan også bruges til at hente store energibesparelser i elektriske forbrugerapparater.
- Vores mål er at gøre det nemmere at integrere vedvarende energi fra sol og vind i energisystemet ved hjælp af mere pålidelige og prisbillige produkter.
Samtidig kan vi bane vej for billigere og mere effektive energibesparende produkter, der får en hurtigere indtrængning på markedet, fortæller professor Frede Blaabjerg fra Aalborg Universitets Institut for Energiteknik, som skal stå i spidsen for det nye center i samarbejde med forskere fra AAU's Institut for Fysik og Nano og Institut for Fysik og Astronomi ved Århus Universitet. Sammensætningen sikrer, at gruppen både kan håndtere store systemer og komponenter helt ned på nano-niveau.

description.hltext_display: Pedophilia Guide Author Denies Book Is Obscene
description.content:
BARTOW, Fla. -- A Colorado man who wrote a how-to guide for pedophiles said Tuesday that his book is not obscene.
Phillip Greaves, 47, of Pueblo, Colo., arrived at the Polk County jail in central Florida on Tuesday morning and is due in court Wednesday afternoon, officials said.
He was arrested Monday in Colorado and charged with violating Florida's obscenity law, a third-degree felony. If convicted, he faces a maximum of five years in state prison.
Speaking to reporters outside the jail Tuesday, Greaves denied the book is obscene and said he plans to fight the charge.
"I characterize it as a book of showing people who have been improperly represented," he said. "And also telling people how they can go about to improve their own lives and so that these people that are being incarcerated now can possibly be rehabilitated."
Polk County Sheriff Grady Judd claims jurisdiction because Greaves sold and mailed the book to undercover deputies who had written him requesting a copy.
Florida's obscenity law prohibits the "distribution of obscene material depicting minors engaged in conduct harmful to minors."
The book was briefly for sale on Amazon.com but was yanked in November after it prompted online outrage.

description.content:
A la suite de nombreux commentaires récents, Ingenico tient à rappeler qu'aucune offre ferme n'a été déposée. Aucune discussion portant sur le capital de la société n'est en cours avec Ingenico.
A propos d'Ingenico (Euronext: FR0000125346 - ING)
Avec plus de 15 millions de terminaux en activité dans plus de 125 pays, Ingenico est un acteur majeur des solutions de paiement. Ses 3000 collaborateurs accompagnent les commerçants, les banques et les fournisseurs de services dans l'optimisation et la sécurisation de leur solution monétique, le développement de leur offre de services et l'accroissement de leurs revenus au point de vente.
Pour plus d'information : www.ingenico.com.

description.hltext_display: Пшонка прислал в Раду рассказывать о драке своего заместителя
description.content:
Вместо Генерального прокурора Виктора Пшонки в Верховную � аду пришел его заместитель Евгений Блаживский. Такое решение было принято Генпрокуратурой.
Как передает корреспондент ЛІГАБізнесІнформ, возмутившимся по данному поводу нардепам от БЮТ Владимир Литвин напомнил, что вчера парламент принял решение о том, чтобы заслушать информацию ГПУ, а не ее руководителя.
Фракция БЮТ пришла сегодня в сессионный зал и разложила на своих рабочих местах плакаты: "Преступников из Партии регионов - за решетку", "� уки прочь от Тимошенко", "Прекратить политические репрессии".
Напомним, вчера прокуратура Киева возбудила уголовное дело по материалам доследственной проверки событий, имевших место в Верховной � аде 16 декабря. Евгений Блаживский: биография и подборка новостейВерховная � ада VI созыва: подборка новостей Ирина ШЕВЧЕНКО

GORILLAZ LA TRACKLIST
description.content: I Gorillaz hanno annunciato la tracklist del loro album gratuito The Fall in uscita il giorno di Natale. Il nuovo disco sar disponibile per i membri del fan club della band. Damon Albarn ha descritto il set registrato sul suo iPad durante i 32 giorni di tour americano del gruppo come distrazione dalla monotonia della vita da tour. E´ stato un modo straordinario per stare bene con me stesso. Lavoravo durante il giorno, in hotel, nelle venue...in ogni momento e ovunque ha detto Albarn. L´artista ha anche aggiunto che la collection potrebbe avere anche una release fisica alla fine del 2011. The Fall tracklist: ´Phoner To Arizona´ ´Revolving Doors´ ´HillBilly Man´ ´Detroit´ ´Shy-town´ ´Little Pink Plastic Bags´ ´The Joplin Spider´ ´The Parish Of Space Dust´ ´The Snake In Dallas´ ´Amarillo´ ´The Speak It Mountains´ ´Aspen Forest´ ´Bobby In Phoenix´ ´California And The Slipping Of The Sun´ ´Seattle Yodel´ (c.c.) (22 dicembre 2010)

description.hltext_display: Kinderliebe 22.12.2010 10:05
description.content:
Weihnachten ist eine so schöne Angelegenheit, dass auch mein Neffe uns jedes Jahr zwingt, eine Tanne aufzustellen. Und bloß nicht die Geschenke darunter vergessen. Was man nicht den Kindern zu liebe alles tut, meckert meine Tante. Den Kindern zu liebe... Da könnten sich viele eine Scheibe von abschneiden.
Im ICE sitzen vor mir letztens ein Vater mit seinem 10-jährigen Sohn, der lustlos seine Matheaufgaben zu lösen versucht. Tja, jetzt ist Sonntag, denke ich. Hausaufgaben auf den letzten Drücker sind bei meinem Neffen normal. "Das Kind soll sich mal erholen, ist doch Wochenende. Minister wird er ja sowieso nicht," sagt meine Tante dann immer. Doch da murmelt der Junge plötzlich, er hätte doch nun genug geübt. Keine Hausaufgaben, Übungsaufgaben. Am heiligen Sonntag. Der arme Junge verspricht sogar, dieses Jahr eine 2 in Mathe zu bekommen. Der Vater tippt nur schweigend mit seinem Finger auf das Übungsheft.
Als der Kinderschreck kurz auf Klo ist, biete ich dem Kleinen an, die Aufgaben schnell für ihn zu lösen und ernte nur einen leeren Blick. Wahrscheinlich wurde er eindringlich davor gewarnt, sich nicht von Fremden ansprechen zu lassen. Bei den ganzen Pädophilen da draußen! Deswegen spielen bei uns in Neukölln auch so wenige Kinder auf den Straßen. Naja, außer den Kanaken-Kids natürlich, die Passanten mit Schneebällen bewerfen. Deren Eltern lassen sich anscheinend nicht von den ganzen Horrormeldungen abschrecken. Vielleicht verstehen sie die auch gar nicht. Vielleicht sind Deutschkenntnisse doch nicht immer von Vorteil. Und Bildungsgrad vielleicht auch nicht, wenn es um Brutpflege geht.
Ich will letztens Eis im Supermarkt kaufen und neben mir ist ein kleines Mädchen, das auch Eis will. Statt Eis zu bekommen, muss die Kleine runterbeten, welche Schäden Zucker für ihre Gesundheit hat. An der Kasse streichelt die Mutter zaghaft und in regelmäßigen Bewegungen den Kopf des Mädchens. Wenn ich mal kein Eis bekommen habe, dann wurde ich aber umso mehr geküsst, gedrückt, gezwickt und gekitzelt. Denn überschwängliche Liebesbeweise sind manchmal das schönste Geschenk auf Erden.
Eine Glosse von Dilan Polat.

description.hltext_display: "Chancen"-Heft "Gesundheitswesen: Medizinische Technik und Therapie"
description.content:
Umschlagbild der aktualisierten "Chancen"-Ausgabe "Gesundheitswesen: Medizinische Technik und Therapie".
Mit Begriffen wie «Medizin» oder «Gesundheitsberufe» werden zunächst ärztliche Funktionen und Pflegeberufe assoziiert. Die Berufspalette ist jedoch sehr breit, sie reicht vom berufsbegleitenden Kurs bis zum hoch spezialisierten universitären Nachdiplomstudium. Das vorliegende Heft konzentriert sich auf die vier Subbranchen «Medizinaltechnik und medizinische Assistenz», «Medizinisches Handwerk», «Medizinische Therapie und Gesundheitsberatung» und auf «Ärztliche und wissenschaftliche Funktionen».
Laufbahnbeispiele mit 15 Porträts
Die aktualisierte «Chancen»-Ausgabe informiert über die aktuelle Entwicklung des Arbeitsmarktes, Berufsmöglichkeiten und Zukunftsperspektiven im Bereich Gesundheitswesen. Die Rubrik «Laufbahnbeispiele» vermittelt in 15 Porträts, welche Aus- und Weiterbildungen Berufsleute absolviert und wie ihre berufliche Karriere verlaufen ist. In der Rubrik «Aus- und Weiterbildungen» zeigt eine Zusammenstellung in Tabellenform die verschiedenen Möglichkeiten für Berufsleute, Quereinsteigende, Mittelschülerinnen und Mittelschüler auf und in «Berufe und Funktionen» werden die wichtigsten beruflichen Tätigkeiten kurz beschrieben. Die laufend aktualisierten Informationen dazu finden Sie unter www.berufsberatung.ch in der Rubrik «Laufbahn». Die Serviceseiten mit Hinweisen zur Berufslaufbahn, Tipps zu weiteren Informationsmöglichkeiten und nützlichen Internetangeboten und ein Index, der alle beruflichen Funktionen auflistet, die in diesem Heft beschrieben sind, runden das Angebot ab. (chancen.ch/mc/ps)
Informationen
Aktualisierte Ausgabe: «Gesundheitswesen: Medizinische Technik und Therapie», Heftreihe 2010, 88 Seiten, A4, 4-farbig, CHF 15.-, Art.-Nr. CH1-2022

description.hltext_display: Markt-Experte Klinzing: "Same Procedure as Every Year!"
description.content: Ohne neue Impulse wird der deutsche Aktienmarkt am Mittwoch kaum verändert erwartet. Der X-Dax stand gegen 8.10 Uhr bei 7.081 Punkten um 0,04 Prozent über dem Xetra-Daxschluss vom Vortag. Er ist ein außerbörslicher Indikator für den Dax. Der deutsche Leitindex hatte am Vortag bei 7.087,84 Punkten den höchsten Stand seit Anfang Juni 2008 erreicht und seine Bestmarke vom Wochenstart um weitere 20 Punkte nach oben geschraubt. Die Nachrichtenlage bleibe dünn und auch die Vorgabe der Börsen in Übersee gebe keine klare Richtung vor, begründeten Börsianer die kaum veränderte Tendenz. Der Future auf den US-Leitindex Dow Jones gewann 0,05 Prozent seit dem Xetra-Schluss am Vortag. Auch die Agenda verspricht kaum neue Impulse für den Aktienmarkt. Laut Börsianern dürfte aber das &#34; Window-Dressing &#34; im Zuge der Weihnachtsrally weiter das Geschehen bestimmen, wobei mit weiter abnehmenden Umsätzen zu rechnen sei. Am Nachmittag könnten neue Daten vom US-Immobilienmarkt kleinere Impulse geben, darüber hinaus steht die finale Schätzung des US-BIP für das dritte Quartal auf der Agenda. SCHLECHTE NIKE-ZAHLEN BELASTEN ADIDAS UND PUMA Adidas-Aktien standen nach schlechten Nike-Zahlen <NKE.NYS ><NKE.FSE >und einem Interview im vorbörslichen Handel bei Lang &amp; Schwarz unter Druck. Der weltgrößte Hersteller von Sportartikeln verbuchte im zweiten Geschäftsquartal (Ende November) einen Umsatzanstieg um 10 Prozent und einen um 22 Prozent höheren Gewinn im Vergleich zum Vorjahreszeitraum. Nike-Aktien rutschten aber nachbörslich um 5,73 Prozent, was Börsianer auf einen enttäuschenden Bestelleingang für Dezember bis April schoben. Entsprechend sieht ein Händler negative Vorgaben für Adidas-und Puma-Papiere. Der in einem Interview mit der &#34; Börsen-Zeitung &#34;zum Ausdruck gekommene Optimismus von Adidas-Chef Herbert Hainer trete wohl in den Hintergrund. Wesentlich neue Erkenntnisse habe das Interview ohnehin nicht gebracht, meinte der Händler. Im TecDax könnten Aktien der Software AG <SOW.ETR >,die mit einem Plus von mehr als 40 Prozent zu den Favoriten im bald endenden Jahr zählten, aus Sicht eines Händlers von positiv aufgenommenen Zahlen des US-Wettbewerbers Tibco Software <TIBX.NAS >aus den USA profitieren. Der US-Wettbewerber hat seine Bilanz nach Börsenschluss vorgelegt und die Aktie legte im nachbörslichen Handel in Reaktion auf diese Zahlen fünf Prozent zu. Bei Lang &amp;Schwarz reagierten Software-Aktien allerdings mit leichterer Tendenz noch nicht. PFLEIDERER PROFITIEREN VON VEREINBARUNG MIT BANKEN Pfleiderer-Aktien <PFD4.ETR >sprangen nach dem Abschluss einer Vereinbarung mit Banken vorbörslich fast zehn Prozent hoch. Der angeschlagene Bau- und Möbelzulieferer muss bis Ende März 2011 seine Bankkredite nicht zurückzahlen. Mit dieser Vereinbarung will sich das Unternehmen Luft verschaffen, um ein neues Konzept für die Zukunft zu entwickeln. Ein Börsianer sagte: &#34;Pfleiderer gewinnt zusätzliche Zeit für sein Restrukturierungskonzept und das sollte den Aktien Platz für eine weitere Erholung schaffen -das Überleben ist damit aber noch nicht gesichert. &#34;Die Aktien waren bis Ende November stark unter Druck geraten und auf 1,702 Euro abgerutscht, erholten sich dann aber etwas.

description.hltext_display: Ljubo: Musky Feud Over
description.content:
Tweet
Comment Now Email Print
RELATED COVERAGE
Aidan Ormond
Dec 22 2010 17:30
Get more on: ljubo | milicevic | newcastle | nujets
EXCLUSIVE: Newcastle Jets defensive leader Ljubo Milicevic says the feud between Melbourne Victory skipper Kevin Muscat and him is over - but says the Victorian two-time champions are tactically naïve.
To see the Jets in training on Tuesday...
"They've got a few boys who I've got respect for but in general tactically they are inept. That comes from their coaching," Milicevic told au.fourfourtwo.com ahead of the two sides' Boxing Day blockbuster in Melbourne.
But Milicevic believes the coaching at Victory has let the side down this season resulting in a porous defensive record.
"It's not worked on at training so they don't do it in the games," he said. "They're very open and easy to breakdown and I think their goals against, their defensive record, shows that.
"Speaking to Musky the other week - we've kissed and made up - and even he admits that they are tactically naïve."
Victory will be without a number of key players including in-form Archie Thompson as well as a suspended Grant Brebner for the Jets game.
Milicevic added: "They've been lucky over the years because they've been so good in an attacking sense. But anyone will tell you defences win championships. Defensively as a unit, they're pretty poor."
Newcastle for their part are set to be strengthened with the return of a core of the team in Milicevic, Jobe Wheelhouse, Kasey Wehrman, Ben Kennedy and Ruben Zadkovich.
It should be more like the team that has many tipping them for a finals berth rather than the depleted version that succumbed to Phoenix 4-0 last weekend.
"They'll [Victory] score three but they're still drawing games. So they'll be worried because I've no doubt we'll score against them," added the Jets skipper.
"When you've got guys like Kasey in your side and the others coming back they can intimidate any opposition. I don't think we've lost the midfield when all of those three have been playing."
Milicevic, capped six times by the Socceroos and a former European Champions League player with Swiss club FC Thun, returned to his hometown club Victory for season three of the A-League.
However, Muscat and Milicevic - two strong characters - clashed. The club backed Muscat and Milicevic left the then-reigning champions.
The former Perth Glory star - and one-time captain of both the national U/20 and U/23s - has since returned stronger than ever at Newcastle Jets over the last two seasons. And he says the feud between him and the Victory legend is over.
The two sides meet in a Christmas cracker in Melbourne on December 27 and Milicevic believes Victory's backline is a clear weakness.
This season Victory have scored 29 times in 20 games but have the worst goals conceded of any team in the six with 26.
In comparison, the Milicevic-led Jets defence along with fellow central stopper Nikolai Topor-Stanley have conceded just 16 in 19 games - equal best in the A-League.
And when you consider four of those goals were conceded last week when a depleted Jets lost 4-0 in New Zealand, it speaks volumes for the Jets' personnel.
The Jets have recovered from an ordinary start to the season to now sit sixth on 25 points - one point less than fifth placed Victory (who've played one extra game). It all points to a quality game full of goals and just a bit of bite.
Milicevic added: "I don't worry about any team we play. I think we're better than all of them. If you look at our team position by position we've got amazing depth.
"We've turned our season around and we're proving that in the last two months - other than the game against Wellington, which I discard.
"In total, if you also include Michael Bridges, Ben Kantarovski, Jeremy Brockie, we were missing seven or eight regulars against Phoenix.
"4-0 last week was an aberration but we've moved on.
"No-one's come close to outplaying us. Not Brisbane, not Adelaide and not Gold Coast or Central Coast.
"I don't think it will be any different against Victory."
To see the Jets in training on Tuesday...

description.hltext_display: Ferrari, hasta un músico para el motor
description.author: ORIOL PUIGDEMONT
description.content:
Cualquier amante del automovilismo identifica un Ferrari con solo oír su motor. No se trata de una exageración ni tampoco de una forma de hablar, sino que es un hecho lógico, fruto de la minuciosidad con que los responsables de la marca miman cualquier detalle que afecte a sus coches. Tratándose del corazón, o sea, del motor, el esmero aún es más exagerado. "Cada uno de nuestros modelos suena distinto. Antes de llevarlo a la serie, un músico se reúne con los técnicos y juntos deciden cómo debe rugir el modelo en cuestión", relata Stefano Lai, el director de Comunicación de Ferrari, que ejerce de cicerone en una visita a la sede de los bólidos de Il Cavallino Rampante.
Como no podía ser de otra forma, todo en Maranello huele a carreras y eso también lo perciben los operarios de la fábrica, que producen una media de 30 vehículos al día. La avenida que atraviesa longitudinalmente el complejo es la vía Enzo, el fundador. Las demás calles que la cruzan llevan nombres de pilotos que han ganado al menos un título al volante de un Ferrari -Schumacher, Raikkonen, Lauda...-. "La de Alonso la teníamos preparada, advierte Lai.
En 1991, cuando Gianni Agnelli nombró a Luca Cordero di Montezemolo, el presidente de la compañía su principal obsesión fue que los trabajadores tuvieran plena consciencia de dónde trabajaban y lo que significaba formar parte de este sello. Montezemolo, cree que la experiencia vital que genera ponerse al volante de un Ferrari es única y pretende hacer extensiva esa sensación también a los operarios.
"Montezemolo cree que tiene a los mejores hombres y que estos deben trabajar en las mejores condiciones", explica el responsable de comunicación. Eso va desde el punto de vista arquitectónico -los tres edificios principales llevan la firma de Marco Visconti, Massimiliano Fuksas y Jean Nouvel- hasta el social, ya que la firma ofrece a su personal prestaciones como seguro médico para sus familias y colegio gratuito para sus hijos.
La planta de motores se asemeja más a un inmenso quirófano esterilizado que a un taller. En el medio hay un enorme parterre con un jardín: "Trabajamos a la micronésima y necesitamos unas condiciones de temperatura y humedad concretas. Las plantas son más sensibles que las personas y gracias a ellas sabemos cuándo hay algún componente que no se encuentra en las proporciones adecuadas", puntualiza Lai.
Al final de esta inmensa nave hay un pequeño museo que consta de 18 coches -"es importante que los chicos sepan dónde trabajan y cuál es nuestra esencia", ahonda Lai-. Está el Ferrari 308 GTB, que se hizo famoso con la serie Magnum, al lado de un 360 Barchetta descapotable de color gris. "Es un ejemplar único que Agnelli mandó construir para Montezemolo como regalo de boda", relata Francesca, una de las empleadas que acompaña en la visita. El único monoplaza que hay en el grupo nunca salió de Maranello.
Se diseñó en 1984 y es algo así como el órdago que Henzo Ferrari planteó a Jean-Marie Valestre, presidente de la Fédération Internationale du Sport Automobile (FISA), al que amenazó con dejar la F-1 para correr en Indianápolis. "Enzo reunió a toda la prensa en Fiorano e hizo que el coche diera dos vueltas al circuito", recuerda Lai; "con eso fue suficiente". Para suerte de Ferrari y de la F-1, que parecen condenadas a entenderse.Ferrari cuida cada detalle en Maranello, la sede en la que todo huele a carreras
