description.hltext_display: Venezuela: aprueban las leyes que amplían el control sobre los medios
description.author: CARACAS. ESPECIAL PARA CLARIN
description.content:
La Asamblea Nacional, el parlamento unicameral venezolano, aprobó finalmente y contra reloj las dos reformas jurídicas impulsadas por el Presidente Hugo Chávez para amplificar la regulación de los medios y que instaura un avance sin precedentes sobre los contenidos en Internet.
El apuro se debió a que el oficialismo tiene mayoría absoluta en el Congreso, pero esa ventaja acaba el 5 de enero cuando se integrarán nuevos legisladores opositores con lo que los representantes del partido de Chávez pasarán a ser la primera minoría.
Las reformas involucran a la Ley de Telecomunicaciones y la de Responsabilidad Social de Radio y Televisión, conocida por sus siglas Ley Resorte, que ahora se amplía a Internet y las redes sociales.
Chávez ha radicalizado su proyecto que el presidente describe como izquierdista o socialista, imponiendo estas normas que buscan recortar las críticas al gobierno. También, debido a los cambios en el Congreso, el presidente logró autorización para legislador por decreto durante los próximos 18 meses y eludir así a la Cámara.
Fernando Egaña, ex ministro de Información durante la presidencia de Rafael Caldera, calificó como censura en Internet y las redes sociales. Y ase guró que es una ofensiva "habilidosa", es decir, se permite el acceso general pero "se restringen, limitan y criminalizan los contenidos y el libre intercambio de la información".
En Venezuela hay diez millones de internautas, que en caso de ser sancionados enfrentarán el "bloqueo de aplicaciones, la censura de la prensa digital, entre otros", añade. Las faltas tienen un lenguaje premeditadamente impreciso: castigarán la apología del delito; el fomento de zozobra en la ciudadanía o el desconocimiento de las autoridades. La Asamblea oficialista eliminó a última hora la propuesta de punto único de Internet, permitiendo que los canales de señal abierta puedan seguir en cable.
La nueva norma declara, además, a las empresas de telecomunicaciones como servicio público y prohíbe la inversión extranjera en radio y televisión. El Consejo Nacional de Telecomunicaciones y el Ministerio de Adscripción establecerán las habilitaciones. Se legisla que una empresa de telecomunicaciones "deberá ceder a título gratuito al Estado la totalidad de los bie nes utilizados para la prestación de los servicios al momento de finalizar la habilitación administrativa o concesión" después de 15 años de operaciones. También el Estado puede revocar la licencia por razones de "interés general".
La reforma, asimismo, establece que "el Presidente adoptará los estándares de televisión y radio digital y el Ministerio de Comunicaciones desarrollará la normativa aplicable para su implementación". Los títulos de las licencias deben ser transformados o actualizados con la nueva ley. La presentación deberá ser realizada personalmente por los socios y no se admiten poderes. La última disposición afecta directamente al canal informativo Globovisión, cuyo socio principal, Guillermo Zuloaga, se encuentra refugiado en EE.UU. tras la orden de captura emitida por el chavismo en su contra.

description.hltext_display: Предприниматель из Лаишевского района РТ планирует открыть семейную робото-ферму
'NDRANGHETA: ARRESTATO A GENOVA LATITANTE GARCEA
description.content: (AGI) - Genova, 22 dic. - I carabinieri di Genova hanno arrestato ieri il latitante Onofrio Garcea, colpito da ordinanza di custodia cautelare in carcere per associazione per delinquere finalizzata all'usura e latitante da luglio. Garcea e' considerato un esponente di spicco della 'ndrangheta a Genova. Secondo quanto si e' appreso e' stato arrestato mentre faceva shopping a Pegli, sotto casa, in vista del Natale. La notizia e' stata diffusa solo questa mattina. (AGI) Ge1/Mav

description.hltext_display: Fire postpones Kings Of Leon show
description.content:
Kings Of Leon's final show of the year at London's The O2 venue has been postponed. The London fire brigade were called at around 08.30am this morning and 60 fire fighters were needed to quell the blaze.
However, following the incident the venue had to take an assessment to see if there was any water damage, as the hall's sprinkler system was triggered by the fire - which left the crew without enough time to complete setting up the show.
A statement from the venue read: "Unfortunately, due to this morning's fire on board one of the tour buses at The O2, tonight's Kings of Leon concert will now be postponed. Whilst there is no damage to The O2 there is now insufficient time to rig the arena for tonight's performance. We are sorry for the inconvenience. "Whilst a lot of people have been working very hard and every attempt was made to go ahead with tonightâs show, thorough assessments had to be carried out as a matter of procedure. Unfortunately, once the assessments were completed in full, there was not enough time to set up the show for tonightâs performance." Nobody was injured in the blaze, which only affected the venue's loading bay, not the stage or seating areas.
Earlier in the day drummer Nathan Followill has tweeted to say of his excitement at finishing off the group's year in style. It is not yet known what when the rescheduled show will take place.

event_or_fact.property: left the crew without enough time to complete

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Aktien starten kaum verändert
description.content:
Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - Der deutsche Aktienmarkt ist am Mittwoch kaum verändert gestartet. Der Dax stieg in den ersten Minuten um 0,05 Prozent auf 7082 Punkte. Der deutsche Leitindex hatte am Vortag bei mehr als 7087 Punkten den höchsten Stand seit Anfang Juni 2008 erreicht.
Damit hatte er seine Bestmarke vom Wochenbeginn um rund 20 Punkte nach oben geschraubt. Der MDax rückte um 0,27 Prozent auf 10 101 Punkte vor, nachdem der Index mittelgroßer Werte am Vortag erstmals seit gut zweieinhalb Jahren über die Marke von 10 000 Punkten geklettert war. Der Technologiewerteindex TecDax gab dagegen um 0,05 Prozent auf 843 Punkte nach.

description.hltext_display: CARBURANTI: QE, ENI AUMENTA DI UN CENTESIMO. VERSO ONDATA RINCARI
description.content: (ASCA) - Roma, 22 dic - Tornano a rincarare i prezzi raccomandati sulla rete carburanti. A muoversi e' stata Eni, con un centesimo su tutti i prodotti (benzina, diesel e gpl). Piccolo ritocco ma sempre in aumento per TotalErg. Gli altri per ora aspettano ma l'attesa non dovrebbe durare a lungo. Quanto ai prezzi praticati sul territorio, inevitabile anche in questo caso una tendenza all'aumento, con particolare riguardo al diesel e al gpl. E' quanto emerge dal monitoraggio di quotidianoenergia.it effettuato in un campione di stazioni di servizio rappresentativo della situazione nazionale per la rubrica Check-Up Prezzi QE. Nel dettaglio, oggi la media nazionale dei prezzi praticati della benzina (in modalita' servito) va dall'1,441 euro/litro degli impianti Esso all'1,461 euro/litro dei p.v. Tamoil passando per 1,450 del market leader. Le no-logo sono a 1,368 euro/litro. Per il diesel si passa dall'1,330 euro/litro riscontrato nei p.v. Eni ed Esso all'1,343 euro/litro rilevato in media negli impianti Tamoil. No-logo a 1,255 euro/litro. Punte, come di consueto, al Sud ormai a 1,47 in media sulla benzina e 1,35 per il diesel (poco al di sotto al Centro). Il Gpl, infine, si posiziona tra lo 0,734 euro/litro rilevato nei p.v. Eni allo 0,744 degli impianti Q8 (0,706 Euro/l le no-logo).

description.hltext_display: Schweizer Risikomanagement auf Basis österreichischer Standards
description.content:
Bundespräsidentin Doris Leuthard.
Diese Schritte des Regelwerks, das weltweit als "State of the Art" gilt, reichen von der Risikoerkennung bis zur Ausbildung hochqualifizierter Risikomanager und Risikomanagerinnen. An seiner Entstehung haben seit 2004 unter österreichischer Federführung mehr als 100 Experten und Expertinnen aus nahezu 50 Nationen mitgewirkt.
Schweiz: Risikopolitik bringt Sicherheit
"Die ONR 49000 ist für uns eine wertvolle Leitplanke, wir müssen die Themen nicht neu erfinden", umreisst Nicole Heynen, die das Risikomanagement der Schweizer Bundesregierung koordiniert, den grossen Vorteil des Systems, das nun sukzessive in der Bundeskanzlei, den sieben Departementen, die in etwa unseren Ministerien entsprechen, und den rund 60 Bundesämtern eingeführt wird. Insgesamt sind 36.000 Mitarbeiter und Mitarbeiterinnen des Bundes involviert.
"Grossartige Anerkennung unserer Arbeit"
Dass die Schweizer Regierung die ONR 49000 übernommen hat, sieht man bei Austrian Standards als wichtiges Signal mit Vorbildwirkung und ist zuversichtlich, dass sich viele Unternehmer und öffentliche Stellen daran orientieren. Austrian-Standards-Geschäftsführer Ing. Gerhard Hartmann: "Die Implementierung des Regelwerks durch die Schweizer Regierung ist eine grossartige Anerkennung der Arbeit, die bei uns geleistet wurde, und bestätigt, dass der Weg, eine Grundlage auf Konsens aller Beteiligten zu schaffen, richtig war." (Austrian Standards Institute/mc/ps)
• Austrian Standards Institute

description.hltext_display: 軍, 북한 해안포 날려버릴 엄청난 무기를…
description.content:
군 당국이 북한의 추가 도발에 대비해 연평도에 정밀타격 미사일인 '스파이크'를 배치하기로 했다.
군 소식통은 22일 "정밀타격 능력을 보강하기 위해 연평도에 스파이크를 배치하기로 했다"며 "가능한 이른 시일 내에 전력보강이 이루어질 것"이라고 밝혔다.
이스라엘제인 스파이크는 사거리 25km로 적외선 유도를 받아 은닉된 갱도 속 해안포를 정밀타격하는 성능을 갖춘 것으로 평가받고 있다.
군은 지난달 23일 북한의 포격 도발 이후 연평도에 K-9 자주포를 추가 배치했고 227㎜ 다연장로켓포와 신형 대포병레이더인 '아서'도 신규 투입했다.

description.content: Хлеб из пшеничной муки первого сорта подорожал на 11,2 процента.

description.hltext_display: TakĂ© druhou Ĺˇtafetu SP v bÄ›hu na lyĹľĂ­ch vyhrĂˇly Norky
description.content:
Suverénně vedoucí žena SP Björgenová tak vyhrála při všech svých startech ve Světovém poháru od skvělého představení na olympijských hrách ve Vancouveru a Whistleru, kde získala tři zlaté medaile a po jednom stříbru a bronzu.
České závodnice štafetu znovu nepostavily. Ve 14:30 začne štafetový závod mužů na 4x10 km i s českou čtveřicí Martin Jakš, Lukáš Bauer, Petr Novák a Martin Koukal.
Běžci bez Magála skončili sedmí, vyhráli nečekaně Švýcaři
Česká štafeta běžců na lyžích skončila na Světovém poháru ve francouzském La Clusaz na sedmém místě. Oproti bronzové sestavě z olympijských her ve Whistleru nahradil zraněného Jiřího Magála specialista na dálkové běhy Petr Novák a předával jako čtvrtý v kontaktu se silnými Nory. Finišman Martin Koukal ale tempo neudržel. Z nečekaného vítězství se radovali Švýcaři.
Magál sice v sobotní volné třicítce zaznamenal osmnáctým místem nejlepší výsledek v sezoně, ale odřený kotník ho dnes na start nepustil. Na prvním úseku Jakš udržel tempo s ostatními a předal jako čtvrtý. Bauer následně vylepšil umístění o jednu příčku a navíc v posledním okruhu "utrhl" Nora Martina Johnsruda Sundbyho, zatímco v čele unikali ostatním Švýcaři a Rusové.
Novák si na svých deseti kilometrech vedl srdnatě a společně s Norem Gjerdalenem a Finem Lallukkou bojovali o bronzovou příčku. Před Koukala se však záhy dostal Švéd Hellner a nakonec i druhá ruská štafeta.
Pro švýcarský triumf doběhl Curdin Perl, zatímco sobotní vítěz Rus Maxim Vylegžanin už neměl síly a v cíli ztratil na nečekaného vítěze půl minuty. Na bronzový stupínek vytáhl norskou štafetu Petter Northug.
Světový pohár v běhu na lyžích v La Clusaz (Francie):
Muži - štafeta 4x10 km:
1. Švýcarsko (Livers, Cologna, Fischer, Perl) 1:42:14,6, 2. Rusko I (Bělov, Legkov, Sedov, Vylegžanin) -30,8, 3. Norsko (Rönning, Johnsrud Sundby, Gjerdalen, Northug) -33,8, 4. Finsko -35,0, 5. Švédsko -36,8, 6. Rusko II -1:28,6, 7. Česko (Jakš, Bauer, Novák, Koukal) -2:28,9.
Ženy - štafeta 4x5 km:
1. Norsko (Skofterudová, Johaugová, Steiraová, Björgenová) 58:38,7, 2. Itálie (De Martinová-Topraninová, Longaová, Rupilová, Follisová) -56,6, 3. Švédsko (Lindborgová, Haagová, Rydqvistová, Kallaová) -1:24,1, 4. Finsko -1:42,5, 5. Japonsko -2:34,2, 6. Polsko -2:51,4.

description.hltext_display: Rechtsanwalt Ralph J.Jurisch von www.123agb.de: Abmahnungen sind nicht immer mit hohen Kosten verbunden!
description.author: Veröffentlicht von Adenion
description.content: Abmahnungen der Fa. ATZ GmbH Zwickau bleiben rechtmissbräuchlich! (firmenpresse) - Der im IT - Recht tätige Rechtsanwalt Ralph J Jurisch, Ascheberg teilt mit, dass nunmehr rechtskräftig feststeht, dass die in der Vergangenheit von der Firma ATZ GmbH, Zwickau, vertreten durch Rechtsanwalt Conrad, Zwickau, ausgesprochenen Abmahnungen und einstweiligen Verfügungen rechtsmissbräuchlich und daher unwirksam sind. Am 2.11.2010 hätten vor dem Oberlandesgericht Dresden mehrere Berufungsverfahren wegen der von der Firma ATZ GmbH ausgesprochenen Abmahnungen und beantragten einstweiligen Verfügungen verhandelt werden sollen. Die Firma ATZ hat nach Informationen des RA Jurisch in allen Verfahren die Zurücknahme der Berufung erklärt und damit die Rechtskraft der in der ersten Instanz von dem Landgericht Leipzig ergangenen Entscheidungen herbeigeführt. Damit steht fest, dass die in der Vergangenheit von der Firma ATZ GmbH ausgesprochenen Abmahnungen und einstweiligen Verfügungen rechtsmissbräuchlich und damit auch rechtswidrig waren. Die Firma ATZ GmbH hat deshalb (mindestens) die für die Rechtsverfolgung angefallenen Kosten in vollem Umfang zu übernehmen. RA Jurisch bietet über die Internetseite www.123-AGB.de Webshopbetreibern AGB, Widerrufsbelehrungen u.a. für den rechtssicheren Betrieb eines Webshops sowie Unterstützung bei allen Problemen des E-Commerce an. Jurisch Langenölser Str. 1 59387 Ascheberg ra.rjurisch(at)123-agb.de 02593 - 20 27 40 http://www.123agb.de Anmerkungen:

description.hltext_display: Росгосстрах провел первую выплату родным погибших в акатастрофе Ту-154
description.content: МОСКВА, 22 дек — РИА Новости. Компания «Росгосстрах», застраховавшая ответственность «Авиалиний Дагестана», чей самолет Ту-154 4 декабря аварийно сел в аэропорту «Домодедово» из-за отказа всех трех двигателей, произвела первую выплату родственникам одного из погибших во время этой авиакатастрофы, которая в соответствии с Воздушным кодексом РФ составила 2,025 миллиона рублей, говорится в сообщении страховщика.

description.hltext_display: Ambtenaar gemeente Aalten wordt eigen baas
description.content:
Ambtenaren die werkzaam zijn voor de Gelderse gemeente Aalten hoeven vanaf volgend jaar niet per se meer van negen tot vijf op het gemeentehuis te zitten. Zij mogen hun uren zelf invullen op een individuele werkkaart. Met de flexibele werktijden wil de gemeente zichzelf presenteren als een aantrekkelijke werkgever.
Zeven tot tien
Het gemeentehuis zal vanaf 1 januari van ’s ochtends zeven tot ’s avonds tien uur geopend zijn voor de medewerkers, om zo het flexibele werken mogelijk te maken. Ambtenaren kunnen naar eigen voorkeur inplannen wanneer zij willen werken. Wie later wil beginnen, omdat bijvoorbeeld de kinderen naar school moeten worden gebracht, kan dat doen. Volgens projectleider Gert-Jan van Vliet hangt de mate van vrijheid echter af van de functie: ‘Een beleidsmedewerker heeft meer vrijheid dan een baliemedewerker’.
Geen Amsterdam
‘Bij ons is het flexibele werken goed in te passen. De gemeente Aalten is geen gemeente Amsterdam’, legt Van Vliet uit. Voor veel beleidsterreinen zijn volgens de projectleider slechts één of twee ambtenaren verantwoordelijk. ‘Deze mensen kunnen makkelijk hun eigen tijd indelen’. Bij het inplannen van vrije tijd moet wel zoveel mogelijk rekening worden gehouden met andere directe collega’s. De hele dag moet er op iedere afdeling tenminste een iemand aanwezig zijn die bereikbaar is. Van Vliet: ‘De dienstverlening mag er niet onder lijden’.
Beloning
Het nieuwe personeelsbeleid kent meer veranderingen. Zo is de gemeente van plan medewerkers die goed presteren hiervoor te belonen. ‘Zij die goed werk leveren krijgen een toelage. Andersom kunnen medewerkers die niet goed functioneren erop achteruit gaan’, vertelt Van Vliet. De gemeente hoopt met dit nieuwe beloningsbeleid haar ambtenaren extra te motiveren.
Breed draagvlak
Volgens André Nijhuis, die namens de ondernemingsraad lid is van de projectgroep, was het voor de meeste medewerkers in het begin de kat uit de boom kijken. ‘Inmiddels is iedereen op de hoogte van de plannen en zijn de reacties positief. Er is een breed draagvlak voor ons nieuwe personeelsbeleid’.
Eigen verantwoordelijkheid
Zowel het flexibele werken, als het belonen naar prestatie past volgens Van Vliet bij hetgeen waar de gemeente Aalten naartoe wil: de eigen verantwoordelijkheid van de ambtenaar. ‘Wij vragen een pro-actieve houding van onze mensen. Waarom zouden we ze nog moeten betuttelen?

description.hltext_display: 슈주 동해, "우리 멤버들 모두 순수, 리더도 잘 만났다"
description.content:
[OSEN=이정아 기자]슈퍼주니어의 동해가 SBS 월화드라마 '괜찮아 아빠딸'에서 첫 연기도전을 한 데 이어 이번에는 마술사로 변신했다.
엘르걸 1월호 화보 촬영을 가진 동해는 ‘마술사’를 모티브로 한 이번 화보에서 마치 연기를 하듯 다양한 표정과 눈빛을 선보여 스태프들을 놀라게 했다.
이어진 인터뷰에서도 새로운 도전 과제인 연기에 대한 열정을 확인할 수 있었다. “너무나 하고 싶었던 일이었기 때문에 드디어 기회를 얻어 기쁘다”고 입을 뗀 그는 첫 배역인 ‘최욱기’에 대해서 “나랑 비슷한 면들이 많았다. 공감되는 부분이 많지만 그래도 물론 연기는 어렵다”며 연기 도전에 대한 소감을 밝혔다.
올해 데뷔 5주년을 맞은 슈퍼주니어에 대한 애정과 자부심 또한 여러 차례 드러냈다. “무엇보다 멤버들끼리 재미있게 팀 활동을 하는 걸 우선으로 여기고 있다. 멤버들이 없으면, 나는 안된다. 멤버들과 어울리는 게 가장 재미있다”고 밝히기도 했다.
슈퍼주니어의 단결력의 비결에 대해서는 가장 먼저 리더인 이특의 공을 꼽았다. “리더를 잘 만났다. 이특 형은 정말 훌륭한 리더다. 다른 멤버들도 모두 순수하고 서로의 이야기를 들을 줄 아는 사람들이다. 잘못된 점을 말해주면 누구도 반박하지 않고 수긍한다”고 전했다.
happy@osen.co.kr사진엘르걸, 프레인 제공.

description.hltext_display: 女教师下班时遇车祸骨折 单腿跪凳坚持上课(图)
description.content:
昨日，新洲辛冲二中九(5)班数学课上，梅玉玲老师单膝跪在椅子上(如图)，给学生上完了“二次函数的性质”。
据介绍，梅玉玲老师是上月12日下班途中遇车祸，导致左脚趾骨骨折。
伤筋动骨100天，医生告诫梅玉玲老师至少要休养100天，左脚才能下地走路。可是，梅玉玲放心不下自己即将毕业的学生，住院3天后，她就返回学校上课。
该校钟小平校长告诉记者，梅玉玲老师带伤上课，学校也劝了她多次，不奏效。梅老师说：“现在，正是九年级的关键时期，突然换个老师，学生可能很难适应，会影响到学生的成绩。”
每天，梅玉玲老师的丈夫提前1小时把她送到学校，然后再背到四楼的教室去上课。学校的同事和学生看到这种情况，纷纷主动过来帮忙。
“每天被人扶着走上讲台，一条腿跪在椅子上给学生讲课。梅玉玲老师感动了我们身边每一个人。”刘建国老师告诉记者，一些平时不爱听讲的学生，每天都争着帮梅老师拿教具，听讲也认真多了。
“梅老师这么吃亏，还坚持给我们上课，我们哪还好意思不听讲呢？”一向调皮的刘微(化名)同学说。

description.hltext_display: 北 대응공격 않은 ‘3가지 이유’…핵사찰 허용 속셈은…
description.content:
북한은 남한이 연평도에서 해안사격훈련을 재개하더라도 3가지 측면에서 대응공격을 하지 않을 것이라는 분석이 제기됐던 것으로 21일 나타났다.
미국의 전략정보 분석전문업체인 ‘스트랫포(www.stratfor.com)’는 사격훈련이 있기 사흘 전인 지난 17일 홈페이지를 통해 이 같은 내용이 담긴 ‘사격훈련과 한반도의 새로운 긴장’이라는 보고서를 실은 것으로 확인됐다.
스트랫포는 우선 대응공격을 하지 않는 데 대한 근거로 지난 3월 천안함 사태나 지난달 23일 연평도 도발에서 나타난 것처럼 북한은 불시에 공격하려는 경향이 있기 때문이라고 주장했다. ▲ 시민들도 긴장연평도 사격훈련이 실시된 20일 오후 걱정스러운 표정의 시민들이 서울역 대합실에서 대형 텔레비전을 통해 사격훈련 관련 뉴스속보를 시청하고 있다.
정연호기자 tpgod@seoul.co.kr ▲ 휴전선 야간경계
연평도 해상에서 사격훈련이 실시된 20일 중부전선 최전방 청성부대 장병들이 야간 경계근무를 서고 있다.
철원 이종원 선임기자 jongwon@seoul.co.kr 남한이 이미 몇 주 동안 사격훈련을 실시한다고 공언함에 따라 한반도의 긴장감이 최고점에 달했고 전 세계가 주목하고 있는 상황에서 북한은 불만을 표시하는 상징적 수준을 넘어서 공격을 취하지 않을 것이라는 얘기다.
또한 6자회담을 재개하기 위한 외교적 움직임이 진행 중인 상황이 작용할 것이라고 관측했다.
스트랫포는 빌 리처드슨 미국 뉴멕시코 주지사가 평양을,성 김 미국 6자회담 특사와 제임스 스타인버그 미 국무부 부장관이 각각 한국과 중국을 방문하는 등 지난 몇 주 동안 6자회담국간에 일련의 대화가 진행 중이라는 점을 주목했다.
마지막으로 북한은 남한이 공격을 받을 경우 이번에는 반격할 것을 예상하고 있다는 점도 도발하지 않는 이유라고 꼽았다.
그러나 이 업체는 북한은 여전히 예측불가능하고,비이성적이며 파괴적이라고 지적했다.그러면서 오로지 북한 지휘부에서만 공격 결정이 내려지고 집행되기 때문에 공격 가능성은 여전히 두고 봐야 한다는 점을 시사했다. ●北 ‘대화카드’…미묘해지는 한반도 정세
북한이 국제원자력기구(IAEA) 핵사찰단 복귀 허용 카드를 꺼내들면서 한반도 정세에 미묘한 기류가 생성되고 있다.
연평도 사격훈련을 둘러싼 군사.외교적 대치국면의 한복판에서 대화를 겨냥한 새로운 흐름이 불쑥 등장한 셈이다.
특히 북한이 꺼내든 ‘패키지 제안’은 6자회담 재개에 적극적인 중국.러시아의 행보와 맞물리면서 외교적 동력을 얻어나갈 가능성이 적지 않아 보인다.
북한의 이번 대화카드는 대화국면으로의 조속한 전환을 겨냥한 고도의 계산된 행보로 보인다.특히 북한의 IAEA 사찰단 복귀 카드가 지난 9일 김정일 북한 국방위원장이 중국 다이빙궈(戴秉國) 외교담당 국무위원에게 사찰단 복귀허용을 검토할 수 있다고 발언한 이후에 나왔다는 점이 주목된다.
6자회담 재개의 중재역에 나선 중국의 주문에 따라 북한이 미국에게 비핵화의 ‘일정한 성의’를 보여주는 모양새가 만들어진 셈이기 때문이다.
이는 중국의 ‘체면’을 세워주면서 미국과의 대화 길을 터보려는 전략적 포석이라는 풀이가 나온다.
이와 동시에 선제적으로 대화카드를 던져 한.미.일을 중심으로 6자회담 재개의 5대 전제조건을 구축하려는 흐름을 무력화하는 의도도 내포된 것으로 볼 수 있다.
앞으로의 관전 포인트는 북한의 이번 대화카드에 대한 관련국들의 반응이다.우선 북한의 이번 대화카드는 중국과의 긴밀한 조율과 러시아와의 공감대에 터잡고 있다는 점에서 중.러 양국의 지지 행보가 예상되고 있다.
문제는 대북압박 공조를 형성해온 한.미.일이 북한의 대화제안을 어떻게 평가하고 반응하느냐이다.특히 한.미가 어떤 식으로 입장을 정리하느냐가 전반적인 정세전환의 키를 쥐고 있다는게 분석이 나온다.
일단 우리 정부는 북한의 ‘진정성’에 의구심을 표하며 평가절하하는 분위기다.특히 IAEA 사찰단 복귀허용은 오히려 북한의 핵활동을 외부에 선전해줌으로써 핵개발을 정당화하려는 속셈이라는게 정부의 시각이다.이에 따라 핵시설 가동중단이 선행되고 이어 핵사찰이 뒤따라야 한다는게 정부 당국자들의 지적이다.
정부 고위당국자는 21일 “진짜 사찰을 받으려면 그 전에 핵무기비확산조약(NPT)에 다시 들어와야 하며 NPT에 돌아오려면 모든 핵 프로그램의 동결과 철회가 있어야 한다”고 말했다.
또 북한이 제안한 미사용 연료봉 1만2천개의 해외판매(외국반출)는 이미 핵문제의 초점이 우라늄 농축 프로그램(UEP)으로 넘어간 현시점에서는 ‘의미없는 낡은 카드’라고 정부 당국자들은 설명하고 있다.
미 국무부는 원칙적 대응기조를 견지하면서도 상대적으로 긍정적인 톤을 보이고 있다.“말이 아니라 행동으로 입증하라”는 입장을 고수하면서도 이번 대화제안을 일단 긍정적 조치로 평가하고 있기 때문이다.
필립 크롤리 공보담당 차관보는 21일 정례브리핑에서 “긍정적인 조치가 될 것”이라고 평가하면서도 “우리는 북한이 어떤 조건에서 무엇을 할 수 있다는 말 보다는 행동에 의해 우리의 정책을 결정하게 될 것”이라고 말했다.
그러나 미국의 원칙적 입장표명은 어디까지 일차적 반응이며 앞으로 리처드슨 주지사의 사후설명과 평가과정에서 미 행정부의 대북 대응기조가 새롭게 설정될 가능성이 있다는 관측이 제기되고 있다.
물론 연평도 사격훈련을 둘러싼 군사적 긴장의 여진이 이어지고 있는 현 국면에서 당장 대화의 여건이 조성되기는 어려워보인다.
하지만 연말 연초의 ‘조정기’를 거치면서 북한의 성의있는 행동표시 여부와 관련국들의 반응에 따라 정세의 틀이 변화될 가능성이 제기되고 있다.
특히 다음달 중순 미국 워싱턴 D.C에서 열릴 것으로 예상되는 미.중 정상회담은 국면전환의 중요한 분수령이 될 가능성이 있다는 관측이 나오고 있다.
이 같은 미.중의 전략적 모색 흐름 속에서 대화와 압박의 투트랙 기조를 유지하고 있는 우리 정부의 입장도 유연해질 가능성이 있다.
정부의 한 소식통은 “가장 중요한 것은 북한이 추가도발을 하지 않음으로써 여건과 분위기를 만들 수 있다”며 “회담 재개의 조건은 어느정도 유연해질 수도 있다”고 말했다.
한.미.일이 성안한 5대 전제조건이 탄력적으로 조정될 수도 있음을 의미하고 있다는 분석이다. 연합뉴스

description.hltext_display: Nataša Matjašec Rošker: Nagrado moraš ne samo dobiti, ampak tudi nositi
description.content:
Maribor - Igralka Nataša Matjašec Rošker sodi med tiste, ki svoj poklic, njegove svetle in temne plati, vedno znova reflektira. Kot je povedala v pogovoru za STA, se vsake nagrade razveseli, a hkrati prestraši, saj da je zatem vedno bolj pod drobnogledom. Nagrado moraš ne samo dobiti, moraš jo tudi znati nositi, upravičiti in izboljšati, je prepričana.
Top iz rubrike
Zadnje objavljeno
Preberite tudi
Nataša Matjašec Rošker (Foto: Miroslav Slana)
Dokler niste leta 2007 postali stalna članica ansambla Drame SNG Maribor, smo vas poznali kot svobodno umetnico. Zakaj ste se odločili za takšen korak?
Ključni razlog za to odločitev je bilo spoznanje, da so kriteriji in status svobodnega umetnika v Sloveniji zelo nejasni in nedefinirani. Čeprav naj bi pridobitev statusa svobodnega umetnika pomenila priznanje in potrditev, je realnost precej žalostna. Ko sem ugotovila, da me ta status v smislu ustvarjalnega razvoja in možnosti pridobitve dela diskvalificira in omejuje in ne obratno, je bil čas za spremembo nujen.
Glavni razlog je bila torej socialna varnost?
Tudi. Avtorska pogodbena razmerja so zelo enostranska in so predvsem zavezujoča in kruta do izvajalca (igralca), medtem, ko je druga stran takorekoč nedotakljiva, in to kljub priznanjem, ki jih prejmeš za svoje delo. To nenehno in ponavljajoče se zamujanje izplačil in prerekanje glede višine honorarja človeka čez čas začne utrujati in žaliti. Prav tako je večina gledaliških institucij in ansamblov precej zadržana do gostov. Člani ansambla so v brezpogojni prednosti pred slehernim gostom, zato je zasedba gosta v glavni vlogi bolj redka izjema in ne pravilo. Umetniški ansambli so zelo občutljivi in dokaj zaprti organizmi, ki se različno odzivajo na tujke. Moje izkušnje variirajo od zelo dobrih do obupnih. Vse to in tudi slaba postprodukcija neodvisnih predstav je botrovalo odločitvi o stalnem angažmaju.
Kakšna je razlika med delom na svobodi in v instituciji?
V ustvarjalnem in kreativnem prav nobena. V bistvu sem zaradi urejenega delovnega razmerja v ustvarjalnem smislu šele zdaj zares svobodna in to čutim in doživljam kot privilegij in odgovornost. Seveda pa je vprašanje, če bi podobno razmišljala, če ne bi imela za sabo izkušnje neke druge svobode, ki me je dobesedno izklesala.
Torej se ne strinjate s prepričanjem nekaterih, da igralci ne bi smeli biti na rednih plačah, da se ne bi polenili?
Floskule o lačnem, bolnem, nesrečnem in zapitem umetniku, ki se iz pekla vsakdana dviga na krilih umetnostne muze, so skrajno neokusne. Vsi smo radi na toplem in siti. Sploh pa mi gre to splošno natolcevanje o igralski lenobi že prav na živce. Kaj pa režiserji, dramaturgi, gledališki kritiki in njihova intelektualna in ustvarjalna lenoba? In še cel korpus drugih ljudi, ki s svojim delom soustvarjajo in vplivajo na atmosfero v gledališču in izven njega? Leni ljudje v tem poklicu itak ne preživijo, kvečjemu životarijo.
Menite, da lahko še vedno izživite ves svoj kreativni potencial?
Sebe ne doživljam kot zdolgočasene in zbirokratizirane uslužbenke v okosteneli javni ustanovi. Delo, ki ga opravljam, me nenehno sooča z novimi ljudmi, novimi razmisleki, novimi estetikami in poetikami. Sili me v preizpraševanja o vsebini in smislu igranja v kontekstu ostalih umetnostnih zvrsti; od performansa do kiparstva, filma, slike in knjige.
Zakaj Maribor in ne Ljubljana?
Zakaj pa ne? Saj se v Sloveniji, pa če je še tako majhna, kvalitetno gledališče dogaja tudi drugje in ne samo v Ljubljani. Za mariborsko dramo sem se odločila, ker se mi je vizija tega gledališča po pogovorih z umetniškim vodjo mariborske drame Vilijem Ravnjakom in direktorjem gledališča Danilom Roškerjem zdela najbolj objektivna, stvarna in predvsem najbolj zanimiva in drzna.
Mariborsko gledališče se v zadnjih letih ponovno prebuja. Menite, da se odpira svetu?
Mislim, da smo v zelo dobri kondiciji. Kvalitativne spremembe so prav gotovo posledica jasno začrtane vizije, programa, visokih pričakovanj in standardov, ki nam jih nalaga vodstvo. Prišlo je tudi veliko mladih igralcev, tako da smo trenutno zelo živa in zelo ambiciozna ekipa. Pa tudi sicer je zdaj na pohodu zelo močna, avtorsko pestra in prepoznavna srednja generacija režiserjev, ki od nas igralcev pričakuje in zahteva maksimalno angažiranost in pripravljenost. Kako se gledališče lahko umešča v širši globalni kontekst, pa je v veliki meri odvisno tudi od vizije in strategije na ravni države.
Vaša najnovejša vloga je v Antigoni, kjer ste imeli priložnost izkusiti delo z mladim režiserjem, ki je prav gotovo imel nore ideje.
Jaka Andrej Vojevec je iz generacije "najmlajših" režiserjev. Dejstvo, da smo bili skupaj z njim in njegovo avtorsko ekipo soočeni z enim najboljših in hkrati najbolj kontaminiranih slovenskih dramskih besedil, ki je doživelo ogromno interpretacij, je bilo zelo iritantno. In tako je bilo tudi naše sodelovanje iritantno vendar konstruktivno. Sam proces nastajanja predstave je v končni fazi tako ali tako povsem irelevanten, šteje le končni rezultat. Mislim, da smo naredili dobro in zelo iritantno predstavo.
Kot igralka radi vzamete stvari v svoje roke in usmerjate režiserja?
Na kraj pameti mi ne pade, da bi usmerjala režiserja. Verjamem pa, da sem precej naporen in trd sogovornik. Toda v končni fazi bom stala na odru jaz in ne režiser, jaz bom pred publiko izgovarjala in zagovarjala njegova vsebinska in estetska stališča. Zato se mi zdi prav in nujno, da se, preden se z vsem žitjem in bitjem izpostavim in prepustim vlogi ter predstavi, o vsem zelo natančno pogovorimo.
V gledališču je zadnje čase veliko golote. Imate s tem kakšne težave?
Sodobno gledališče se zelo pogosto zgleduje po performativnih umetnostih. Performans prinese s sabo drugačno estetiko, poetiko in predvsem drugačen odnos do telesa. Sama osebno nisem a priori za ali proti goloti. Bolj kot zakaj ne golota, me zanima zakaj golota.
Telo je izpostavljeno tudi v predstavi Veter v vejah borov, ki je prejela pomembno nagrado Uchimura.
Med študijem te predstave sem sama predlagala režiserju, da izpostavim svoje telo. Igram vlogo 100 let stare pesnice Onono Komači, ki se osamljena, zavržena spominja slave in lepote minulih dni. V procesu študija me je spoznanje o lastni minljivosti zmrazilo do te mere, da bi najrajši kar takoj umrla. Zato se mi je zdelo bolje, da svoje zaenkrat še funkcionalno telo dobesedno razstavim in ga ob izgovarjanju besedila umestim v kontekst telesa trupla. V tem kontekstu se mi je golota zdela umestna, celo nujna. Sicer pa je bil ta študij izjemno soočenje s tradicijo no gledališča, ki je umetnost popolnosti. Za naše dojemanje je ta tradicija pripeljana do take popolnosti, da je že na meji resničnega. Nagrada nas je doletela kot popolno presenečenje. Vendar mislim, da je spoštovanje do te stare gledališke tradicije, ki smo ga prepoznali med študijem, povzročilo, da smo do besedila vzpostavili povsem nov odnos in posledično naredili zelo iskreno in nenavadno predstavo.
Trenutno ste torej zavezani SNG Maribor. Ali pripravljate še kakšne druge projekte?
Trenutno igram v štirih živih predstavah, veliko gostujemo, tako da časa nimam ravno na pretek. Se mi pa seveda zmeraj kaj mota po glavi.
Maribor se na veliko pripravlja na evropsko prestolnico kulture. Se tudi vi vidite kot del te zgodbe?
Seveda, saj smo kot gledališče del tega. Sem v pričakovanju, to je velika priložnost ne le za mesto ampak za regijo in državo in resnično si želim, da bi nam uspelo.
Za svoje delo ste prejeli številne nagrade. Kaj pravite na najnovejšo, Severjevo nagrado?
Nagrade doživljam zelo resno. Seveda sem vesela, hkrati pa se tudi zavedam odgovornosti, ki jo nagrade nosijo s sabo. Mislim, da ni pretirano, če rečem, da me zavezujejo v profesionalnem in človeškem smislu. V Sloveniji imamo zelo kvalitetne igralce. Zdaj so na pohodu zelo ambiciozne, radovedne in drzne generacije igralk in igralcev. In v takšnem naboru dobiti nagrado je toliko večje priznanje in zadovoljstvo.
Tudi Borštnikovih nagrad imate že nekaj. Kako komentirate dejstvo, da na letošnjem Borštnikovem srečanju ni bila podeljena glavna nagrada?
Zdelo se mi je nenavadno, da so podelili vse nagrade razen nagrade za predstavo v celoti. Ampak vsaka komisija ima svoje kriterije, ki jih nato tako ali drugače udejanji. Bolj kot razdeljevanje nagrad so me vznemirile izjave in komentarji tujih festivalskih selektorjev in kritikov. Njihova bolj ali manj skupna ocena naše gledališke produkcije je, da je slovensko gledališče zelo agresivno in nasilno in da je to verjetno posledica povojne travme! A to pomeni, da nas tujina še vedno doživlja zgolj in samo kot del balkanske zgodbe? Torej je tu pri Avstriji še vedno neka meja in sprašujem se, ali ni ta naša Evropa popolna utvara.
Kako vas pa sprejemajo na Balkanu? Pred kratkim ste gostovali v Beogradu.
Gostovali smo s predstavo Od blizu. Gledalce je poleg pregovorne naklonjenosti slovenskemu gledališču pritegnil naslov in pa seveda režiser Dino Mustafić, ki ga beograjsko občinstvo dobro pozna in spremlja. Naša predstava je presenečenje za večino gledalcev, tako za tiste, ki poznajo zgodbo zaradi filmske priredbe besedila, kot za tiste, ki so z njo soočeni prvič. Dogajanje je namreč postavljeno v popolnoma izčiščen odrski prostor, ki je osvobojen sleherne dekoracije in ki se v igralskem smislu od začetka proti koncu stopnjuje v boleče resničnem, mestoma duhovitem, psihološkem realizmu.
Je torej razlika med predstavami, ki jih občinstvo pozna po literarni predlogi ali pa po filmu?
Zelo velika. Do predstave Od blizu sem igrala še v dveh predstavah, ki ju večina prej povezuje s filmom kot gledališčem: Mački na vroči pločevinasti strehi (SNG Maribor) in Tramvaju Poželenje (Gledališče Koper). To so kultni filmi, ki so tako globoko zasidrani v zavesti gledalcev, da sleherna še tako majhna ali naključna podobnost pri povzroči razočaranje, v smislu "to pa ni tako kot v filmu". Seveda ni, saj ne more biti, saj gre za dva povsem drugačna ustvarjalna izraza. Zato se s filmom nima smisla primerjati ali boriti, ampak je bolje oditi nekam povsem drugam. In prav to je naredil Dino. Ta totalen odmik od vsega doslej videnega omogoči, da ljudje sprejmejo predstavo in pozabijo na film.
Kakšna je sicer razlika med vlogo v filmu in gledališču?
Film si lahko zavrtiš takorekoč kjerkoli in kadarkoli. Celo jaz si lahko zavrtim samo sebe. Predstavo pa lahko vidiš samo na določenih mestih in v določenem času in če nisi v pravem trenutku na pravem mestu, si za zmeraj zamudil doživetje in izkušnjo.
Kaj načrtujete v prihodnjem letu?
Zdaj pride v naše gledališče ponovno delat Sebastijan Horvat, delali bomo Grumovo Gogo, čeprav pri Sebastijanu nikoli ne veš, kje boš končal. Najbolj pa se veselim gostovanja na Japonskem konec maja, kjer bomo v Tokiu s predstavo Veter v vejah borov nastopili v enem najstarejših no gledališč na Japonskem.

description.hltext_display: NASDAQ OMX Appoints Nelson Griggs as Senior Vice President and Head of Asia Pacific for the Global Corporate Client Group
WTG: Neun-Monats-Umsatz legt um 36% zu
description.content:
WTG-CEO Edmar Allitsch.
Dies teilte die Schleifmittel-Spezialistin am Mittwoch mit. Der Umsatz nahm um 36% auf 133,6 Mio EUR zu. Der Auftragseingang sei um 81,4% geklettert, eine absolute Höhe der Bestellungen gibt WTG hier jedoch nicht an. Per Ende September 2010 habe die Book-to-Bill Ratio bei 117% gelegen, nach 87% vor Jahresfrist. Der Auftragsbestand habe sich im Vorjahresvergleich um 41% erhöht.
Bruttomarge um über 40 Prozent gesteigert
Die Anstrengungen auf der Kostenseite kommen in einer auf 40,9% verbesserten Bruttomarge zum Ausdruck; vor Jahresfrist hatte diese noch bei 34,9% gelegen. In der Folge stiegen der EBITDA auf 23,6 (VJ 7,3) Mio und der EBIT auf 15,6 (-0,8) Mio EUR. Der Reingewinn der Berichtsperiode lag bei 11,2 Mio EUR, nach einem Verlust von 2,2 Mio im Vorjahr. Die Angebotsfrist für das laufende Kaufangebot des US-Multis 3M für WTG wird voraussichtlich am 10. Januar 2011 starten, wie heute in Inseraten bekanntgegeben wurde. (awp/mc/ps/04)
• Winterthur Technologie AG

description.hltext_display: 全国中学� �駅伝 城南（男子・福岡） 力走６位 (12/20)
description.content:
第１８回全国中学校駅伝大会は１９日、山口市の山口県セミナーパーク・クロスカントリーコース（男子６区間１８キロ、女子５区間１２キロ）で行われ、男子は田奈（神奈川）が５６分４５秒、女子は富士岡（静岡）が４０分３０秒で優勝した。九州勢は男子で福岡市の城南が５７分１６秒で６位、女子の白石（佐賀）が４１分１９秒の６位と、男女ともに九州大会の覇者が入賞を果たした。男子の１区では阿久根（鹿児島）のエース坂本大志（３年）が８分５９秒の区間新記録をマークした。（同コースでの開催は８回目）
■６人全員“自己ベスト”
福岡市立城南の２年生アンカー、谷川貴俊はゴール直後にうつむいた。九州大会覇者のプライドも胸に力走したが、６位入賞。「３年生を表彰台（３位以内）に上げたかった」と不満の色をのぞかせた。
「学校の外周道路で車の間を縫うようにして走っている」という市街地の学校。不慣れなクロスカントリーコースに備えて３度の試走をしたが、その時のベストタイムを全員が更新した。西田淳一監督は「全員がベストですよ。３年生がよく頑張った」と、１区１９位から全員で追い上げた粘りをたたえた。
九州大会と同様、結束力でつかんだ入賞だ。「これが僕たちの全員駅伝です」と１区の森山青空（３年）は胸を張った。区間５位の久保和馬、同４位の谷川と、力を見せた２人の２年生が残る。来年に夢をつないだ全国６位だ。
■白石（女子・佐賀）平井けん引 ８度目で初入賞
女子の白石が悲願を達成した。８度目の挑戦で初の入賞。アンカー横石悠貴（２年）が６位でゴールに飛び込むと、待ち構えていた選手たちに歓声と笑顔が広がった。
「ずっと入賞を目標にしてきた。涙が出そう」と１区で５位と流れをつくったエース平井見季（３年）。ハイペースの展開にくらいつき、ラスト５００メートルで２人抜いてたすきをつないだ。３、４区で一つずつ順位を落としたが、最後は横石が７位から一つ順位を上げた。
昨年の１７位から大躍進。「平井は不器用だけど我慢強い。その頑張りにみんながついてきた」。元監督で陸上部を長年指導してきた門田芳彦教頭は主将も務めるエースをたたえた。１年冬に佐賀県の育成メンバーに選ばれた時には１５人中最下位のタイムだったが、翌夏の県大会では１５００メートル優勝と急成長を遂げた。
佐賀県勢としても１１年ぶりの入賞。九州大会初制覇に続き、大きな存在感を示した。
＝2010/12/20付 西日本スポーツ＝

description.hltext_display: Sarandë, vritet 39-vjeçari
[2010 어워즈] 류시원 '올해의 감독상' 수상
description.content: 20일 서울 양재동 aT센터 그랜드 컨퍼런스룸에서 개최된 2010 한국모터스포츠 어워즈(주최 지피코리아)가 열렸다. 올해의 감독상에는 EXR팀106 류시원 감독겸 선수가 수상했다. 올해의 감독상은 2010년 최고의 성적으로 가장 큰 활약과 발전을 보여준 레이싱 팀에게 수여되는 상이다.류시원 감독은 EXR팀106 레이싱팀 창단 2년 만에 가장 치열한 클래스인 제네시스쿠페 클래스에서 종합우승을 차지하며, 최고의 한해를 맞이했고 심사위원 투표결과, 최고의 레이싱팀에 선정됐다. 올해 5회째를 맞이한 2010한국모터스포츠어워즈는 200여명이 참석해 자리를 빛낸 가운데 성대하게 펼쳐졌다. 올해의 드라이버상, 신인상, 감독상 등 모두 15개 분야에서 21명의 영광의 얼굴들이 뽑혔다./지피코리아 뉴스팀 gpkorea@gpkorea.com, 사진=지피코리아 ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ [] []- Copyrights ⓒ 스포츠조선, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지 -

description.hltext_display: Euroopan lentokaaokseen odotetaan helpottavan
description.content:
Euroopan lentokaaokseen toivotaan helpotusta tänään. Lontoossa Heathrow?n kentän kiitoradat on saatu viimein kokonaan auki, ja tavoitteena on lentää noin kaksi kolmannesta kaikista vuoroista.
- Hyvä uutinen on se, että koneita nousee ja laskeutuu. Mutta matkustajien on tärkeä ymmärtää, ettei normaaliin tilanteeseen päästä aivan heti, Heathrow?n edustaja Colin Matthews sanoo.
Saksassa Frankfurtin kenttä suljettiin jälleen viime yönä useiksi tunneiksi lumisateen takia. Kentältä kerrotaan, että liikenne on kuitenkin vähitellen palaamassa normaaliksi. Peruutuksia ja pahoja viivästyksiä on silti edelleen luvassa.
Pariisissa matkustajasumaa on pyritty purkamaan lisäämällä yölentoja.
Irlannissa Dublinin lentokenttä on kiinni aamukymmeneen saakka. Dubliniin on tullut lunta viisitoista senttiä.

description.hltext_display: 中俄海军明年将在日本海军演 或出动海陆空三军
description.content:
据俄罗斯媒体19日报道，准备参加明年中俄军演磋商的俄陆军总部消息人士指出，对于明年俄中军事演习的地点，俄方有意在俄东部军区俄中边境训练场进行。据悉，届时“和平使命-2011”俄中联合军事演习双方可能将出动海陆空三军。
据俄罗斯媒体透露，本次演习俄方的演习计划基本上已制作完毕，明年初，两军将在俄罗斯进行首轮磋商。此次演习双方可能会出动陆海空三军精英部队，但均会部署在离朝鲜半岛附近的各自战区序列内。
双方作战机构磋商和布阵演习已形成基本程式，在两军旅一级地面联合出动上，无论从通讯还是从协同方面都达到一定的默契，而空军混合机群团一级出动配合更为密切。在海军方面，以“现代”级编队出动已接受过“和平使命-2005”演习的检验，而且此次海军军演将在日本海练习联合护航和打击海盗，这一演习地点的选择估计将受到广泛关注。

description.hltext_display: Ellis scores 36, Warriors beat Kings in OT
description.content:
Golden State Warriors forward Reggie Williams, left, defends against Sacramento Kings forward Donte Greene during the first quarter of an NBA basketball game in Sacramento, Calif., Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010.
SACRAMENTO, Calif.—Monta Ellis scored nine of his 36 points in overtime to lift the Golden State Warriors to a 117-109 victory over the struggling Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night.
The Warriors, who had lost 14 of their previous 16 games, rallied from a 16-point deficit in the fourth quarter to force overtime.
Reggie Williams scored 24 points, Dorell Wright had 17 and David Lee added 15 points and 12 rebounds for the Warriors. Vladimir Radmanovic also scored 15 points.
Beno Udrih scored a career-high 34 points and Carl Landry had 22 points and 10 rebounds for the Kings. Sacramento has lost six straight and 20 of 22 games.
Tyreke Evans had 15 points, 10 rebounds and seven assists for the Kings, who have the NBA's worst record (5-21).
Radmanovic sent the game into overtime with a 3-pointer at the buzzer and was promptly mobbed by teammates. The Warriors outscored Sacramento 32-18 in the fourth, taking advantage of a nearly four-minute scoring drought by the Kings to erase a 16-point deficit.
Udrih converted a three-point play for a one-point lead, but Lee came right back with a three-point play for the Warriors and Ellis made two free throws for a 113-109 advantage with 1:10 left. Ellis then drove the lane and made a difficult left-handed layup in traffic to make it a six-point game with 44 seconds remaining.
Evans scored nine points, while both Landry and Udrih had eight for the Kings, who came alive in the third quarter, outscoring the Warriors 36-21 to assume an 84-70 lead. The sloppy Warriors committed six turnovers that led to numerous easy opportunities for the Kings.
Warriors guard Stephen Curry missed his sixth straight game with an ankle injury. Starting center Andris Biedrins also has ankle problems and didn't play.
Notes: Evans missed all five shots in the first quarter and the Kings misfired on 17-of-24 shots and trailed 26-18. Despite Ellis missing 8-of-12 shots in the first half, the Warriors shot 52 percent overall. ... Lou Amundson started the game for Golden State and fouled out in the third quarter, playing just 13 minutes.

description.hltext_display: No Brasil, destaque para o relatório de inflação do BC; já nos EUA, agenda traz a última revisão do PIB do terceiro trimestre
description.author: Equipe Info
description.content:
SÃO PAULO - Mais carregada, a agenda desta quarta-feira (22) traz importantes referências, com destaque para a última revisão do PIB (Produto Interno Bruto) norte-americano referente ao terceiro trimestre e o Relatório da Inflação do Banco Central.
Brasil
No cenário doméstico, o grande destaque fica para o Relatório de Inflação, descrevendo os padrões inflacionários do País nos últimos meses e com perspectivas econômicas que são acompanhadas de perto pelo mercado. O investidor também se atentará à Sondagem do Consumidor, publicada pela FGV (Fundação Getulio Vargas).
Horário de Brasília

Cenário internacional
Nos Estados Unidos, foco para a divulgação do PIB e de seu deflator, aguardado com otimismo pelos analistas de mercado. Ainda no país, o dia conta com a publicação das vendas de casas usadas e dos estoques de petróleo.
Na Europa, a agenda traz a minuta da última reunião do BoE (Bank of England).

description.hltext_display: Britain's Cable cut from BskyB decision
description.content:
Britain’s Business Secretary Vince Cable has been stripped of his media responsibilities after saying he had declared war on media tycoon Rupert Murdoch.
Cable, the second most senior figure in the Liberal Democrat’s – the junior partner in the UK’s ruling coalition – was also caught telling undercover reporters from the Daily Telegraph he could bring down the government, using what he called the nuclear option.
The opposition called for Cable to be sacked, but he holds on to his job despite Prime Minister David Cameron making clear the comments were totally unacceptable and inappropriate.
Cable has now been cut from playing any further part in News Corporation’s bid for UK broadcaster BskyB.
Rupert Murdoch’s News Corp already has a large stake in the satellite channel but the Australian media mogul, who also owns such British newspapers as The Times and The Sun, is pushing for full control. Many fear that will result in a monopoly and increase his strangle hold on Britain’s media.
Copyright © 2010 euronews
Tags: Media, Politics, United Kingdom

description.hltext_display: Electric Eel Makes Holiday Lights Twinkle at the Living Planet Aquarium
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE The Living Planet Aquarium
SANDY, Utah, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- The Living Planet Aquarium is shocking visitors with its Christmas display which uses an Electric eel to flash the lights on its tree.
A Christmas display in the 'Journey To South America' gallery is blinking by using the energy generated by an electric eel in a nearby tank. "We took the voltage produced by the eel via stainless steel electrodes and used it to power a sequencer," said Terry Smith, Project Manager at Cache Valley Electric. "The sequencer takes the voltage the eel produces and operates circuitry that flashes the lights, fast or slow, based on the level of voltage he puts out, " said Smith. Each time the eel moves, the lights on the 5ft tall tree flash intermittently using 4 strands of holiday lights.
Electric eels live in the murky streams and ponds of the Amazon and Orinoco basins of South America. These famous freshwater predators get their name from the enormous electrical charge they can generate to stun prey and dissuade predators. Their bodies contain electric organs with about 6,000 specialized cells called electrocytes that store power like tiny batteries. When threatened or attacking prey, these cells will discharge simultaneously, emitting a burst of at least 600 volts, five times the power of a standard U.S. wall socket.
The aquarium in Sandy, just south of Salt Lake City, features the Electric eel as part of the permanent South American freshwater exhibit. "Visitors can visually and audibly experience the power of our Electric eel and get a real sense of how amazing this creature is," said Angie Hyde, Director of Public Relations & Marketing. "We thought we'd put a festive twist on it for the holidays which has been a huge hit with our members and visitors."
The Electric eel display is made possible by Bill Carnell, Terry Smith, Jim Laub and Jody Jenkins of Cache Valley Electric, and will be available to visitors through December 31, 2010.
For more information about The Living Planet Aquarium and the Electric eel display, call the aquarium at (801) 355-FISH (3474) or visit www.thelivingplanet.com.
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Comienza el sorteo de Navidad, el más popular y esperado en España
description.content:
Millones de personas en España, muchos de ellos inmigrantes latinoamericanos, siguen hoy con mucha atención el sorteo de la lotería de Navidad, muy esperado en un año marcado por la grave crisis económica que sufre el país.
Varios opearios de Loterías del Estado preparan las bolas para el sorteo extraordinario de Navidad, que hoy se celebra en el Palacio de Congresos de Madrid, y que repartirá más de 2.300 millones de euros, con un premio gordo dotado con tres millones, lo que supone que el poseedor de cada décimo se embolsará 300.000 euros. EFE
Los dos bombos en los que durante más de tres horas girarán las bolas con los 85.000 números que se sortean (desde el 00.000 hasta el 84.999) y los 1.787 premios empezaron a dar vueltas pasadas las 9.00 hora local (8.00 GMT) en el Palacio de Congresos de Madrid, donde este año se celebra el sorteo por primera vez.
El sorteo extraordinario de Navidad de la lotería española, el más popular del año, repartirá más de 2.300 millones de euros (unos 3.000 millones de dólares) entre 1.787 diferentes premios, aunque casi todos tienen depositadas sus esperanzas en el ansiado "Gordo".
El "Gordo", primer premio del sorteo, está dotado con tres millones de euros (unos cuatro millones de dólares) a cada serie, lo que supone que el portador de un décimo agraciado se embolsará 300.000 euros (unos 400.000 dólares).
De los bombos saldrá un segundo premio dotado con un millón de euros (1,3 millones de dólares) a cada serie, un tercero de 500.000 (unos 660.000 euros), además de otros premios menores.
De "cantar" los números premiados se encargarán, como es tradicional, los alumnos del Colegio de San Ildefonso de Madrid, mientras el país sigue atento la retransmisión del sorteo por la radio y la televisión.
Más de la mitad de los 36 alumnos elegidos este año para repartir la suerte son inmigrantes, siendo los ecuatorianos (10 niños) y los bolivianos (5) los más numerosos, aunque también hay un argentino, un dominicano y un venezolano, todos con el mismo deseo de hacerlo bien y no fallar. EFE

description.hltext_display: Dätwyler verlängert Grossauftrag von Nestlé
description.content: Altdorf - Die Dätwyler Gruppe hat in ihrem Konzernbereich Gummi die Zusammenarbeit mit der Nestlé-Konzerneinheit Nespresso vorzeitig bis Ende 2015 verlängert. Der neue Vertrag regle die Lieferung von Produkten mit einem Gesamtvolumen von mehr als 200 Millionen Franken, teilte die Dätwyler Holding AG am Mittwoch mit.

description.hltext_display: フォステクス、16種類のパーツを自由にカスタマイズ可能なヘッドフォン発売
description.content:
フォステクス カンパニーは、16種類のパーツを自由にカスタマイズ可能なヘッドフォン「KOTORI201」を専用Webサイトにて発売した。価格は、14,000円。
KOTORI201は、見た目の美しさと、音の美しさに拘った高音質、高解像度ヘッドフォン。 同社が長年に渡って積み重ねてきたドライバー・ユニット製造のノウハウを活用し、開発した「バイオダイナ振動板」(特許第3756259号)を採用。16種類のパーツを自由にカスタマイズでき、自分だけのデザインにカスタマイズすることができる。専用収納ケースが付属する。
また、同日、カナルタイプヘッドフォン「KOTORI101」の追加オプションとして、iPhoneやiPodなどのApple製品への操作が可能なマイク付きコントローラーも発売した。着信応答や音量調整、早送り・一時停止などの操作、音声アプリケーションなどの操作が可能。

description.hltext_display: Домашним аэропортом бюджетной "дочки" "Аэрофлота" станет Домодедово
description.content: МОСКВА, 22 дек — РИА Новости. Аэропортом базирования бюджетного перевозчика, которого к 2013 году создаст, будет Домодедово, пишет в среду газета «Ведомости», ссылаясь на проект стратегии группы «Аэрофлот» до 2025 года.

description.hltext_display: 哥伦比亚冬季遭遇洪灾 已致数百人死亡(组图)
description.content: 内容提要：近日，南美安第斯国家哥伦比亚正在经历最近50年来最难过的冬天，降雨和洪灾波及全国32个省份中的28个，全国受灾人口达到200万，数十万间房屋被损毁，大片城镇被淹，将近260人死亡，75人失踪。

description.hltext_display: Drake thanks power of the internet
description.content:
Drake has thanked the power of the internet for making him a megastar. The 'Over' rapper said he's amazed how his meteoric rise has happened largely online, and reckons he's one of the first rappers in the world to do so.
He explained to internet site Global Grind:"Initially, I was this rapper with a little bit of buzz, the internet was taking over, and I didn't know the power of it at that point. "There wasn't an artist that had been 100 per cent birthed from that outlet and I think to be discovered on MySpace, how I was found, and for it to somehow reach Lil Wayne's ears and for him to feel so confident about it and call me and to release a mixtape on the internet. "Then, again, to have an album somehow go to number one [in the US] off a mixtape using the internet as a tool was all amazing because it was all a first." Despite his praise for the internet exposing new artists, the rapper said he worries the internet is affecting the way people communicate and making people afraid to express themselves. He said: "One thing that kills me about my generation is how everyone is afraid to express themselves because of certain people. "It's become a very impersonal world because we all talk to each other without looking each other in the face or actually speaking on the phone so it's become very cruel. It's so easy to be cruel when you don't have to say it to someone." Drake's album 'Thank Me Later' is out now.

description.hltext_display: Communiqué à l'ensemble des actionnaires - Paiement du dividende
description.content:
Paiement du dividende
Communiqué à l'ensemble des Actionnaires
L'arrêt de la Cour d'appel de Paris du 8 décembre 2010 ayant confirmé l'ordonnance de référé du 8 octobre 2010 ayant limité le séquestre à opérer en vertu de l'ordonnance du 16 septembre 2010 à la somme de 1.700.000 ? au lieu de celle de 15.179.894,85 ?, ladite somme de 1.700.000 ? demeurera séquestrée entre les mains de Maître CHEVRIER de ZITTER, ès qualité, tant que le litige avec les requérants à l'origine du séquestre n'aura pas été tranché au fond. Le délibéré a été fixé au 14 janvier 2011.
Dans ce contexte et compte tenu du fait que la somme de 1.700.000 ? demeure bloquée chez Maître CHEVRIER de ZITTER, la société ACANTHE DEVELOPPEMENT a transféré le 15 décembre à BNP PARIBAS SECURITIES SERVICES une somme de 1.700.000 ? par virement bancaire, afin de lui permettre de procéder sans délai, au paiement de l'intégralité du dividende 2009, tant en numéraire qu'en en actions, dans les termes du mandat qui lui a été donné, et ce, avant le 31 décembre 2010.
Le 20 décembre, BNP PARIBAS SECURITIES SERVICES a confirmé par écrit à notre Société que le paiement du dividende (tant en numéraire qu'en actions) interviendrait le 23 décembre 2010.
Contact Investisseurs : Nicolas Boucheron, Directeur juridique
01 56 52 45 00 - contact@acanthedeveloppement.fr

description.hltext_display: LVMH提高在愛瑪仕的持股至20.21% 仍可能繼續收購
description.content: 法國第一大富豪Bernard Arnault繼續搶奪愛瑪仕家族地盤。法國第一大富豪 Bernard Arnault 繼續搶奪愛瑪仕家族地盤。 全球最大精品集團 LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA (路易威登集團) (LVMH) (MC-FR) 周二表示，對法國精品公司 Hermes International SCA (愛瑪仕) (RMS-FR) 的持股已自先前宣布的 17.1% 提升至 20.21%，且在市� �情況許可下，LVMH 可能還會進行更多收購交易。 愛瑪仕拒絕評論 LVMH 此最新舉動。愛瑪仕家族對其公司持股總共 73.4%。 LVMH 簡潔表示，目前「在愛瑪仕國際公司的持股已跨過 20% 大關，如今持股數達 21,338,675，並補充有進一步的途徑可透過權益交換（equity swap）取得 204056 份愛瑪仕股份。 自 2001 年起，擁有愛馬仕 4.9% 股份的 LVMH，今年 10 月對外公布，已持有愛瑪仕 17.1% 股份，LVMH 透過權益交換的方式，悄悄成功踏進愛瑪仕品牌，令愛瑪仕家族十分不悅。 � �據 LVMH 目前送至監管機關的文件，LVMH 旗下 5 家公司總共擁有愛瑪仕 20.21% 股權，12.73% 的投票權。LVMH Fashion Group 持股比例最多，達 10.05%。 � �據另外一份聲明，法國股市交易所監管機構 AMF (法國金融市� �監管局) 表示，LVMH 上周五已向單位知會持有的愛瑪仕股份超過 20% 強制回� �的關卡，LVMH 子公司在股市內外均進行收購股份的交易。

description.hltext_display: Объем научных разработок в Подмосковье увеличился в 2,3 раза
description.content: МОСКВА, 22 дек — РИА Новости. Объем научно-технических разработок в Подмосковье увеличился более чем в два раза за последние пять лет и в настоящее время в денежном выражении достигает более 100 миллиардов рублей в год, сообщил губернатор Подмосковья Борис Громов в интервью газете «Комсомольская правда», которое опубликовано в среду.

description.hltext_display: Nadal y Federer se exhiben contra la pobreza
description.author: AGENCIAS
description.content:
Dos genios al servicio de una buena causa. Lejos de la presión a la que habitualmente están expuestos y separados de las urgencias competitivas, Roger Federer y Rafael Nadal, el duelo con más pedigrí del tenis actual, se vieron las caras en el Hallenstadion de Zúrich en la primera de las dos citas benéficas que han acordado para este tramo final de un año intenso. Mañana, a las 19.00, sobre la pista de la Caja Mágica de Madrid, redondearán su pulso contra la pobreza. Pese al clima distentido de la cita, sin un objetivo en juego para reforzar su extenso palmarés deportivo, ambos tenistas ofrecieron golpes maestros y deleitaron al público suizo.
Fue Roger Federer el que salió ganador de la primera cita, de este 'Partido por África'. Jugaba en casa el suizo. Y, de forma protocolaria, se impuso en tres sets (4-6, 6-3 y 6-3) después de una hora y cuarenta minutos de un partido que formó parte de los actos de la Fundación Federer, dedicada a promover el acceso a la educación, al deporte y a mejorar las condiciones de vida de niños en países, de este continente, donde las carencias son notables.
Es Rafael Nadal el que maneja la ventaja en los duelos particulares entre ambos. Domina el español por 14-8 en los partidos oficiales. Una distancia reducida en noviembre pasado, en la Masters Cupo de Londres, donde el suizo se impuso por 6-3, 3-6 y 6-1. El marcador en el Hallenstadion de Zúrich no alterará esta estadística. Fue otra cosa, el fin del enfrentamiento era recaudar fondos para la fundación del suizo, que ya cuenta con un lustro de antigüedad.
Clase a raudales
Sobre la pista dura de Zúrich, ambos hicieron gala de sus virtudes. Talento puro, clase a raudales en la raqueta del helvético, ante su público. Acciones ataviadas de la elegancia del suizo, agradecidas por los presentes en el Hallenstadion. La ausencia de presión tampoco condicionó al español. Nadal mostró una concentración similar a la de las ocasiones grandes. El número uno del mundo conlleva una responsabilidad que el balear asume con compromiso y con gusto. Respondió con talento y calidad a cada propuesta de su rival.
Los dos compartieron con profesionalidad su parte en la exhibición y el espectáculo. No hubo relax, ni bromas. Ni excesos para la galería. El choque transcurrió por los cauces esperadas. Pinceladas de gran tenis sobre un guión adaptado. Nadal rompió en el noveno juego para cerrar la primera manga. Pero el suizo tomó una renta de 4-1 en el segundo e impuso el empate y una teórica emoción rota en el tramo final del enfrentamiento, completado con la victoria del jugador local, el tenista helvético.El suizo se impone al español (4-6, 6-3 y 6-3) en la primera exhibición benéfica

description.hltext_display: 英国连环杀手被判终身监禁 曾吃掉三名妓女(图)
description.content:
据英国《每日邮报》12月21日报道，一名绰号“十字弓食人者”的英国连环杀手日前向法庭认罪，承认谋杀了3名女性，并将她们肢解后吃掉，他甚至还向警察吹嘘其吃人肉的恶行。因其犯罪行为“邪恶而恐怖”，法官判处其终身监禁。
这名连环杀手名叫史蒂芬・格里菲斯，现年40岁。他在利兹刑事法庭上承认，曾经在西约克郡布拉德福附近的红灯区，杀死了3名妓女，分别是苏珊・布拉米勒斯、谢莉・阿密塔格和苏珊・鲁什沃斯。格里菲斯所住公寓的管理员无意中看到布拉米勒斯被谋杀的监控录像后，格里菲斯才被绳之以法。被捕时，格里菲斯甚至对警察说，他厌恶人类，不想再做人。
法庭听取了格里菲斯谋杀三名妓女时的细节，包括他将布拉米勒斯肢解了81块，分撒在亚耳河中。一把断刀和十字弓螺钉嵌在布拉米勒斯的大脑内。格里菲斯住所的家具和墙上，都溅上了受害者的血液，他甚至宣称生吃了布拉米勒斯的肉。
格里菲斯有过暴力史，心理健康也很脆弱。警方认为，格里菲斯的杀人行为和他的学术研究有关。格里菲斯是犯罪学博士，研究连环杀手导致其心理变态。他的谋杀手法极其残忍，用刀和电动工具在其浴室中将尸体肢解。警方不排除格里菲斯谋杀更多人的可能，他们正在寻找其他与其有关的犯罪线索。

description.hltext_display: Leclanché: Kapitalerhöhung bringt 31,3 Millionen Franken
description.content:
Leclanché-CEO Ulrich Ehmes.
Bis Abschluss der Ausübungsfrist für die Kapitalerhöhung am 21.12.2010, 12.00 Uhr, seien Bezugsrechte für 1'111'250 neue Namenaktien ausgeübt worden, teilt der Batterie-Hersteller am Mittwoch mit. Zusammen mit weiteren Titeln, die im Rahmen der Aktienplatzierung gezeichnet worden seien, werde das Unternehmen 1'118'350 neue Namenaktien zu je 28 CHF je Titel herausgeben. Der Streubesitz vergrössere sich dadurch auf rund 60 von bisher ca. 40%, heisst es weiter.
Fortsetzung der Wachstumsstrategie ermöglicht
"Mit dem erfolgreichen Abschluss der Kapitalerhöhung verfügen wir nun über die Finanzmittel, die wir brauchen, um unsere Wachstumsstrategie umzusetzen. Unser Ziel war, mit der Kapitalerhöhung 25 Mio CHF zu erlösen", wird CEO Ulrich Ehmes in der Mitteilung zitiert. "Dass es nun 31,3 Mio CHF geworden sind, ist ein schöner Erfolg." Die Produktionskapazität soll nun, wie geplant, bis 2012 auf über 1 Mio Zellen pro Jahr erweitert werden.
Handelsaufnahme voraussichtlich am 27 Dezember
Die Lieferung der neuen Aktien gegen Bezahlung des Bezugspreises werde voraussichtlich am 24.12.2010 erfolgen. Die Aufnahme des Handels der neuen und bestehenden Aktien gemäss dem Main Standard der SIX Swiss Exchange sei für den 27.12.2010 vorgesehen, heisst es weiter. (awp/mc/ps/02)
• Leclanché
Yverdon-les-Bains - Der Batterien-Hersteller Leclanché erhält vom deutschen Bundesministerium für Bildung und Forschung Fördermittel von 3,82 Mio EUR. Die Gelder seien zur Entwicklung und den Aufbau der Anlagen- und Prozesstechnologie für die industrielle Herstellung von Lithium-Ionen-Zellen im Werk im badischen Willstätt bestimmt, teilte Leclanché mit.
Yverdon - Leclanché will das Aktienkapital erhöhen um bis zu 1'512'500 neue Namenaktien zu einem Bezugspreis von 28 CHF je Aktie. Damit setze man die Kapitalmassnahme fort, die im November vorübergehend ausgesetzt worden sei. Dabei bestünden Zusagen für die Ausübung von Bezugsrechten im Umfang von rund 25 Mio CHF bzw. 59% der AK-Erhöhung.

description.hltext_display: Assis vai à Itália para negociar volta de Ronaldinho ao Grêmio
description.content:
Será de Roberto Assis o primeiro passo para que o retorno de Ronaldinho ao Olímpico deixe de ser encarado como um sonho. Após as festas de final de ano, o irmão e procurador do meia embarca para a Itália para saber se o Milan aceita liberá-lo. E, mais importante, em quais condições.
Dois detalhes podem facilitar a saída: Ronaldinho tem mais de 30 anos e já cumpriu 50% do contrato. Nessas circunstâncias, cai de forma significativa o valor da multa rescisória. O valor presumido é de R$ 20 milhões.
O Grêmio também poderá tirar proveito da pressa do Milan em se desvincular do jogador. A partir de janeiro, seis meses antes do final de seu vínculo, Ronaldinho estaria autorizado a assinar pré-contrato com qualquer outro clube. Com isso, o Milan perderia o direito à indenização. Diante disso, seria conveniente negociá-lo por preço inferior ao valor de mercado.
Mesmo que a possibilidade da volta de Ronaldinho atenda ao desejo de toda a família, Assis trata o tema de forma objetiva. Observa que o jogador tem um contrato por cumprir e seria desrespeitoso com o Milan comentar uma eventual saída sem consultar seus dirigentes.
Tão logo 2011 se inicie, como representante do irmão, Assis tentará saber quais os planos do Milan para Ronaldinho, cujo contrato se estende até junho. Viaja sem prazo definido de retorno. Leia o que diz o empresário e quanto seria o salário do craque na edição desta terça de Zero Hora.
ZERO HORA

description.hltext_display: Finding relief from our misery
description.content:
Earlier this month I became one of the recipient's of an inaugural Men's Award from the National Association of People Living With HIV-Aids at their Boy-Child Mentoring event held at the Amazing Grace Children's Home in Eikenhof, Johannesburg.
I was taken by complete surprise because I had attended the event as I normally would with all others because addressing and attempting to make a marked difference in the uninspired and poverty-stricken lives of young people is an important focus of my humble work.
Among other important objectives of this long over-due initiative is to create a platform for prominent men to dialogue with children in general and boys in particular.
This intervention was intended to "contribute in the 16 Days of Activism Against Gender-based Violence on Women and Children by educating boys about abuse".
Furthermore, it is aimed at educating the boy child on HIV and Aids and other health-related matters.
As I pronounced in my brief acceptance speech, I accepted this noble acknowledgement neither for myself nor my family, but I was profoundly privileged to receive it on behalf of millions of our people who are traumatised by this largely sexually transmitted infection.
I felt truly blessed to accept it on behalf of some of our heroes and heroines who never lived to see the glorious day when millions of those whose lives would be spared and prolonged because treatment is now accessible.
I received this certificate on behalf of children who were born with and died of HIV before they could reach puberty, such the late Nkosi Johnson and Phephile, (who was raped by her uncle because he ignorantly believed sleeping with a virgin would cure him of HIV-Aids) from the South Coast of KwaZulu-Natal.
Phephile died at the tender age of eight.
I am a simple, humble messenger toiling on behalf of the majority of South Africans and the global members of the human race who are adversely affected by the scourge of Aids that has and continues to rob them of their fathers and mothers, brothers and sisters, uncles and aunts, friends and foes alike.
I accepted this award from Napwa on behalf of all our leaders from the political, business and social sectors who hear our fading cries as we collectively strive - often with our last ounce of courage - to instil confidence in the despondent.
On a daily basis we raise our hoarse voices to bring comfort and healing to the sickly.
With every passing minute and silent prayer, we appeal to them to find solace and encouragement from our own miserable and meaningless lives.
We encourage each and every one of them to revive their inner strength and to re-ignite their will to live because there is a solemn, yet distant promise and belief that a permanent cure will be found in our lifetime.
Ukwanda kwaliwa abathakathi, ngiyabonga ma-Afrika.

description.hltext_display: Communiqué à l'ensemble des actionnaires - Paiement du dividende
description.content:
Paiement du dividende
Communiqué à l'ensemble des Actionnaires
L'arrêt de la Cour d'appel de Paris du 8 décembre 2010 ayant confirmé l'ordonnance de référé du 8 octobre 2010 ayant limité le séquestre à opérer en vertu de l'ordonnance du 16 septembre 2010 à la somme de 1.700.000 ? au lieu de celle de 15.179.894,85 ?, ladite somme de 1.700.000 ? demeurera séquestrée entre les mains de Maître CHEVRIER de ZITTER, ès qualité, tant que le litige avec les requérants à l'origine du séquestre n'aura pas été tranché au fond. Le délibéré a été fixé au 14 janvier 2011.
Dans ce contexte et compte tenu du fait que la somme de 1.700.000 ? demeure bloquée chez Maître CHEVRIER de ZITTER, la société ACANTHE DEVELOPPEMENT a transféré le 15 décembre à BNP PARIBAS SECURITIES SERVICES une somme de 1.700.000 ? par virement bancaire, afin de lui permettre de procéder sans délai, au paiement de l'intégralité du dividende 2009, tant en numéraire qu'en en actions, dans les termes du mandat qui lui a été donné, et ce, avant le 31 décembre 2010.
Le 20 décembre, BNP PARIBAS SECURITIES SERVICES a confirmé par écrit à notre Société que le paiement du dividende (tant en numéraire qu'en actions) interviendrait le 23 décembre 2010.
Contact Investisseurs : Nicolas Boucheron, Directeur juridique
01 56 52 45 00 - contact@acanthedeveloppement.fr

information contained therein.

description.hltext_display: Fler anmäler kollegan
description.content:
Publicerat: tisdag 21 december kl 06:34, , Kommentera här Antalet Lex Sarah-anmälningar om missförhållanden i äldre- och handikappomsorgen, har ökat på många håll i Skaraborg. (1:40)Antalet anmälningar om missförhållanden i äldre- och handikappomsorgen, har ökat på många håll i Skaraborg. Bra tycker chefterna, men det sätter press på personalen. Carina Ingvarsson jobbar på Tidans äldreboende. Reporter: Camilla Karlsson/Sveriges Radio Skaraborg. Dela Facebook Twitter Digg Del.icio.us Poddradio Skulle du anmäla en kollega? Rstning avslutad Visa resultat Det är bra att anmälningarna har ökat tycker cheferna inom omsorgen, men det sätter press på personalen som får ta ansvar för anmälningarna och konsekvenserna av att anmäla en kollega.
Carina Ingvarsson som jobbar på Tidans äldreboende, har aldrig själv behövt göra en anmälan men tror att det skulle vara jobbigt. Jag har aldrig varit i den situationen själv men det vore nog jobbigt.
Finns det tillfällen då du skulle avstå att anmäla? Inte om det handlar om fysiska eller psykiska övergrepp.
Fem av sex kommuner vi pratat med uppger att de haft en ökning av Lex Sarah anmälningar, och alla är de överens om att det är positivt för verksamheten. Men det sätter hög press på de anställda som kan tvingas anmäla en kollega som man sen ska se i ögonen dagen efter.
I Falköpings kommun får vi inte ens prata med de anställda inom omsorgen för kommunens biträdande omsorgschef Gunilla Belutia som tycker att frågan är för känslig.
Fler kommunerRadio Skaraborg har tittat på antalet Lex Sarah-anmälningar i kommunerna Falköping, Lidköping, Skara, Tidaholm och Mariestad och Skövde.
I Mariestad har antalet anmälningar flerdubblats sen förra året, också i Skara, Lidköping och Tidaholm syns en ökning.
UndantagEnda undantaget är Skövde där antalet Lex Sarah-anmälningar minskat under 2010.
Av de ansvariga i kommunerna som vi pratat är det ingen som ser fler anmälningar som ett tecken på sämre vård, tvärt om är det ett sätt att säkra kvalitn i verksamheten. Alla chefer och ansvariga sköterskor uppmuntrar till fler anmälningar, men de som får bära ansvaret och konsekvenserna är de anställda på golvet.
Tror ni att det finns de som avstår från att anmäla? Visst kan det vara så men jag hoppas att det inte är det, säger Carina Ingvarsson. Det kan ju finnas ett mörkertal, men ju mer medveten personalen blir desto mer rätt bli siffrorna, säger Gunilla Belutia. Camilla Karlsson Tel: 0500-444467camilla.karlsson@sr.se

description.hltext_display: ADI、RMS出力とエンベロープ出力を同時提供するRFパワー・ディテクタを発表
description.content:
Analog Devices(ADI)は、ワイヤレス、計測機器、防衛、およびその他のブロードバンド・アプリケーション向けに、高集積、高性能、RF帯の検出器「TruPwr」として「ADL5511」を発表した。すでにサンプル出荷中であり、1000個受注時の単価は7.33ドル(米国での販売価格)となっている。
同製品は、RMS(Root Mean Square value:実行値)とエンベロープ・ディテクタ(入力としてRF信号を受け、その信号の輪郭を表す出力を提供する電子回路)の2つのRF機能を1チップに組み込んだものであり、設計の簡素化と、BOM(部材費)コストの低減を実現することができる。
また、高出力アンプのPAE(電力付加効率)の改善は、ワイヤレスおよびブロードバンド機器メーカの課題となっており、次世代WiMAXやLTEなどのモバイル・システムでは、多数のサブキャリアをサポートするOFDM(直交周波数分割多重)変調では、高いピークtoアベレージ比が必要とされ、PA(パワーアンプ)の実際の送信電力は、その最大送信電力より低くなる原因となり、PAの効率が低下する。このPAの効率を改善するために、エンベロープ・ディテクタの需要が高まっており、同製品を用いることでエンベロープ・ディテクタが、入力RF信号からPA電源を変調し、RF信号の送信に必要な適切な電力をPAに送ることが可能となる。
さらに、同製品は1MHzから4GHzの周波数範囲で動作し、独自のアプローチによるフットプリントの小型化と低コストを実現した変調信号のエンベロープ(PAの送信電力)を高精度で抽出する検波器で、エンベロープ出力はIC入力信号のエンベロープに比例した電圧として提供されるほか、実効値出力は、入力電圧に対して直線で、入力信号のピークtoアベレージ比に影響を受けない電圧を出力する。
抽出されたエンベロープは、パワーアンプの線形化および効率改善に用いることができ、実効値出力はパワー測定に用いることができる。温度によるrms検出精度変動±0.25dB、温度によるエンベロープ検出精度変動±0.25dB、および40dBのダイナミック・レンジ±1dBの精度を実現しており、-40℃〜+125℃の温度範囲仕様のため、リモートラジオヘッドやパワーアンプなどの高温環境での利用も可能となっている。

description.hltext_display: Recibe el IEEG material para la elección de gobernador
逾2000名香港旅客滞留伦敦 国泰加开第四班航机
description.content:
据香港中通社报道，香港国泰航空22日表示，已经安排两班机在曼彻斯特接载数百名滞留的学生回港，并考虑加开第四班机处理其他滞留乘客。
国泰企业事务董事庄伟茵表示，已安排首批250名滞留英国的香港学生到曼彻斯特机场，乘坐首班加开航班返港。22日有4班航班由伦敦返港，国泰会加开航班，优先安排已登记的400多名滞留学生乘搭。香港特区政府驻伦敦经贸办和在当地的入境处职员会为非持有国泰机票的人士作出安排。
她估计，目前有2000多名购买了国泰机票往香港的旅客滞留在英国，但要进一步确认实际的滞留人数。
22日早一班航机由伦敦抵港，有学生乘客指，伦敦希斯罗机场附近交通十分挤塞，塞了2个多小时才到达机场。但机场只准持有确认机位的旅客进入，其他人要在外等候，安排不合理。
另有学生表示，在19日已到达希斯罗机场，一直未能登机。航空公司未有理会他们，直至港府驻伦敦人员到机场介入，航空公司才安排他们到附近一间酒店。
另外，受到欧洲大风雪影响，航空交通大混乱。香港旅游业议会表示，香港现时仍有9个欧洲旅行团滞留在欧洲。9个团涉及人数减至170人，其中4个团约100人滞留在伦敦，其余5个团分别滞留在布拉格及巴塞罗那等城市，旅行社已陆续安排团友，由滞留城市不经伦敦转机回港。
机场管理局表示，香港22日有3班来往英国伦敦航班取消，另有4班来往英国及德国的航班延误。22日早上共有5班来往香港与伦敦的航班需要取消或延误。
22日早上，在香港机场，有旅客到达机场才知所乘前往伦敦的航班取消，获安排转乘其他公司的航班。有前往伦敦渡假的市民，希望见到一个白色圣诞，不担心欧洲的风雪天气。
来自英国的消息称，英国派军队到各个机场清理积雪，协助疏导大雪造成的航班混乱，伦敦希斯罗机场第二条跑道重开。气象学家预期，欧洲西部严寒天气有望缓解。

description.hltext_display: Ministro Boudou se presenta a alcalde
description.content:
El ministro de Economía argentino, Amado Boudou, lanzó su precandidatura como candidato oficialista a la alcaldía de Buenos Aires en los comicios del año próximo, lo que según analistas podría llevarlo a dejar su cargo anticipadamente para conducir su campaña electoral.
Boudou se ha convertido en una figura de alto perfil en la administración de la presidenta Cristina Fernández desde que asumió el año pasado, liderando el canje de deuda impaga por
US$ 12.300 millones y actuando como portavoz del gobierno en cuestiones más allá de las económicas.
Varios poderosos sindicatos cercanos al gobierno, como la Confederación General del Trabajo, representada por su secretario general Hugo Moyano en el lanzamiento de la candidatura de Boudou, han manifestado su apoyo en los últimos días al ministro de Economía para que se convierta en jefe de gobierno de la ciudad de Buenos Aires, un distrito clave en manos de la oposición de centroderecha.
La confederación de partidos políticos Coalición Cívica, que presentó en la misma jornada a su candidata por Buenos Aires, la senadora María Eugenia Estenssoro, denunció penalmente a Boudou por el supuesto espionaje de correos electrónicos y archivos de funcionarios del Ministerio de Economía, lo que el ministro rechazó tajantemente.

description.hltext_display: How to find your dream job and keep it!
description.author: GEORGIA GARVEY
description.content:
For many such as Challe, the new year promises to be full of job-related agonizing, from worries over the exact wording of a cover letter to whether an industry will be safe from new layoffs. Nationally 9.8 percent of the population is jobless. But some industries - such as health care, temp jobs and computer systems design - show encouraging signs, and experts say there continue to be some ways to improve your job-search chances in any field.
The economy has been rough for many, says Roxi Pistilli, one of the owners of staffing firm The Opportunities Group. But the Chicago-based company, which recently helped place Challe in a temporary position, has seen a 15 percent to 20 percent increase in direct hiring in the past three months, Pistilli said.
"We are marginally optimistic," she said. "I feel like we're off a respirator, but we're still in intensive care."
The statistics seem to back up Pistilli's observations. Temp jobs in particular look to be doing relatively well. In November, the Bureau of Labor Statistics said temporary positions and health care added jobs. Retail jobs decreased.
Julie Monti, vice president of the temporary services division at staffing firm The Larko Group, said financial services companies are starting to hire again, and executive search firms are sending out feelers. That's a good sign, she said.
"That for us has always been an indicator" of an uptick in the economy, Monti said, while giving the caveat that there won't be immediate improvement with hiring. "There is a little bit of a lag time."
According to numbers from the Bureau of Labor Statistics, about 53,000 jobs have been created nationally in the field of computer systems design since July. Darby Scism, director of the career development center at Loyola University, says tech skills continue to help boost job candidates' appeal from "good" to "great."
"If (job-hunters) are tech savvy or have taken a few classes in technology, that is actually a really good thing," she said.
And though some may have limited success with sticking out the recession in their chosen field, Scism says she encourages students and alumni to branch out and consider alternatives.
"You need a Plan A, B and a C," she said. "Flexibility is key in the kind of market we have today."
Flexibility is exactly what 26-year-old Anna Skoglund learned. After being laid off in June, she discovered opportunities in the hospitality industry - where she'd been working to that point - might not come around as often as she'd like.
"I hadn't gotten a lot of interviews," said Skoglund. "A lot of the positions that were posted (asked for) 10 years' experience (or a) master's degree."
Now she's looking at property management and similar fields - anything with stable, 9-to-5 hours where she doesn't have to work weekends.
To find those kinds of positions, job hunters such as Skoglund and Challe find they need to be extremely plugged-in to their field and be willing to compromise. They're posting profiles on LinkedIn, getting RSS feeds with job postings and taking temporary jobs such as one The Larko Group set up for Skoglund.
Scism says those on the hunt for jobs - or those worried about keeping the jobs they have - should not be afraid to get help, either from family and friends or from professional sources, including their alma maters - where help sometimes can be free.
Slogging through the morass of job hunting can be stressful, but even those in the thick of the struggle say they're starting to see the light at the end of the economic tunnel.
"At least I've had interviews, I've had follow-ups. I think things are coming along," Skoglund said. "I just have to find the right one."
That's the same tenacity Challe said has helped her through her long search.
"It's so easy to just give up and, you know, not do anything about it," she said. "But I couldn't do that."

description.hltext_display: UsedAirplanes.com Joins the Flying.com Network of Leading Aircraft for Sale Websites
description.author: Flying Online, Inc
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Flying Online, Inc., the parent company of several high profile aviation digital properties today announced that UsedAirplanes.com has joined the Flying.com Network of leading aircraft for sale websites. These now include: Flying.com, AircraftForSale.com, UsedAircraft.com & UsedAirplanes.com.Developed in late 2007 at the request of aircraft brokers, UsedAirplanes.com was the worlds first broker-exclusive website to offer an effective and inexpensive digital marketing solution for their used airplanes and aircraft. UsedAirplanes.com exits 2010 by displaying nearly 5,000 used airplanes and aircraft for sale, from hundreds of brokers, to the thousands of visitors that frequent UsedAirplanes.com each and every day.UsedAirplanes.com is the #1 search result at every major search engine, including Google, Yahoo and MSN (Bing) for every aircraft buyer that types in the highly searched term, used airplanes. In addition, UsedAirplanes.com can be found on the first page of Google, Yahoo and Bing for hundreds of other search terms including the top search terms, used aircraft and aircraft for sale as well as specific search terms like used Cessna 172 (Source: Google, Yahoo and MSN/Bing).We are in the unique and enviable position of owning the exact domain name and website that aircraft buyers use when searching for used airplanes, said Mark J. Horne, President and CEO of Flying Online. When someone is looking for used airplanes and they find UsedAirplanes.com, they will easily remember the UsedAirplanes.com name. Name retention is the foundation for obtaining return visitors.Our SEO team will continue optimizing the website for over 2,000 search terms as well as continue posting daily aircraft, statistics, questions and answers at the many social media platforms that our team frequents on a daily basis. This includes Facebook.com, where aircraft buyers can join over 600 of our friends: (www.Facebook.com/UsedAirplanes) and Twitter.com where aircraft buyers and sellers can join the thousands of followers that follow UsedAirplanes.com, stated Horne.Since used aircraft buyers are using desktop and laptop computers, smartphones and digital tablets to find, or at least research their next purchase, the Flying.com Network is focuses its development of digital-only (new media) marketing solutions.About Flying Online, Inc.Flying Online, Inc. is the parent company of Flying.com, UsedAircraft.com, UsedAirplanes.com and AircraftforSale.com as well as several other top-level domain names and digital properties in the aviation industry. The company develops 100% digital properties for the new media world. The company is located in Tampa, FL with offices opening in Kansas and California in 2011.About UsedAirplanes.comUsedAirplanes.com is the worlds only broker-exclusive aircraft for sale website. Thousands of daily visitors frequent UsedAirplanes.com to view thousands of used airplanes and aircraft that are for sale from approximately 500 brokers around the world. UsedAirplanes.com has numerous features and benefits including a complementary brochure generator for each and every used airplane and aircraft. http://www.UsedAirplanes.comAbout UsedAircraft.comUsedAircraft.com has been serving the used aircraft market since 1996. Flying Online Inc. redesigned and relaunched UsedAircraft.com as the first ever data-transfer-conscience aircraft for sale website to meet the low data transfer speeds of the mobile audience. UsedAircraft.com will remain in the beta (testing) phase until the end of December, 2010. http://www.UsedAircraft.comAbout AircraftForSale.comAircraftForSale.com was the worlds first ever social-media-based digital aircraft for sale website to display new and used aircraft for sale. AircraftForSale.com is the most technologically advanced, user-friendly, aircraft for sale website that consistently pushes the technology envelope by developing and launching industry first innovations such as the exclusive Aircraft Performance Data button that is located next to the picture of every listing. http://www.AircraftForSale.comAbout Flying.comCreated in July 1994, Flying.com was the first general aviation portal launched online. Flying.com has been in the redevelopment stage since early 2010 and the team of Flying Online has been working with pilots, aircraft owners, CFI/CFIIs (instructors), FAA, product manufactures, online affluencers, airlines, new aircraft manufactures and digital media developers all over the world to develop the leading aviation destination for all current and future pilots and aircraft owners. The first major redesign and launch will commence in the first few weeks of February 2011. http://www.Flying.com###Flying Online, Inc. today announced that UsedAirplanes.com has joined the Flying.com Network of leading aircraft for sale websites. These now include: Flying.com, AircraftForSale.com, UsedAircraft.com & UsedAirplanes.com.
