description.hltext_display: CONCEPTRONIC RUNDET GESAMTPORTFOLIO MIT MEHR ALS 50 KABEL-PRODUKTEN WEITER AB
description.author: Veröffentlicht von Adenion
description.content: (firmenpresse) - (ddp direct) Madrid, 21. Dezember 2010. Conceptronic, einer der führenden europäischen Anbieter von Netzwerk- und Mobilitätslösungen für mittelständische Unternehmen und Endkunden, rundet sein Zubehör Angebot mit einer Vielzahl an optimierten und neuen Kabeln aus. Mit insgesamt 54 Produkten in den drei Bereichen Lounge, Connectivity und Networking bietet das Kabelsortiment von Conceptronic eine optimale und umfassende Ergänzung zu der bestehenden breiten Gesamtproduktpalette. Die Bandbreite an technischen Produkten in den privaten Haushalten steigt stetig an. Ganz besonders ist auch fest zu stellen, dass die Anzahl technisch hochwertiger Produkte mit einer Vielzahl an Ein- und Ausgängen für Audio-, Video-, aber auch Datenverbindungen enorm zunimmt. Diese Tatsache und der Umstand, dass Hersteller auf Grund des Kostendrucks vielfach die Kabel ihren Produkten nicht beilegen - ein Beispiel hierfür sind die Drucker - ergibt für den Endkunden die Notwendigkeit, Kabel separat zu kaufen. Auch wenn es viele Stimmen gibt, die behaupten, Kabel sind Kabel, können wir bei Conceptronic dieser Aussage nicht folgen. Die Käufer unserer Kabel haben i.d.R. bereits bis zu mehrere hundert EUR für ein Audio-, Video- oder IT-Produkt ausgegeben. Jetzt an einem Kabel zwei oder drei EUR zu sparen, würde im Zweifel die Nutzung dieser Produkte erheblich beeinträchtigen. Ein Kabel ist nicht nur ein Stück Metall, das zum Verbinden zweier Komponenten verwendet wird. Ein Kabel besteht zumindest aus zwei Anschlüssen, einem möglichst hochwertigen Kabel als Übertragungsmedium für das Signal und mindestens zweier Ummantelungen, die vor mechanischen und elektrischen Beeinträchtigungen schützen sollen. Wird nun an einer oder gleich mehreren Komponenten gespart, hat dies einen negativen Einfluss auf das zu übertragende Signal. Leider wird dieser Umstand viel zu häufig missachtet. Wir von Conceptronic bieten auch hier unseren Kunden Produkte mit einem optimalen Gleichgewicht in Bezug auf Preis und Qualität an, sagt Ralf Nahnsen, Sales Manager von Conceptronic. Diese Erweiterung des Sortiments erfolgt auf Grund der gestiegenen Nachfrage nach hochwertigen Komponenten und auf Wunsch unserer Kunden, die sich auch hier auf die Zuverlässigkeit von Conceptronic stützen wollen. Drucker, Media Player und Router gehören zu den Produkten, die ohne Kabel geliefert werden, und die für ihren Betrieb zusätzlich ein HDMI-, LAN-, USB- oder anderes Kabel benötigen. Die Kabel von Conceptronic können für die meisten Fabrikate auf dem Markt verwendet werden. Das Kabelangebot wurde erweitert, um die Funktionen mehrerer Geräte abdecken zu können. Connectivity Sortiment Mit insgesamt 23 Modellen ermöglicht es dieses Sortiment, die Leistung und Flexibilität von Computern oder Laptops durch deren Anschluss an verschiedene Geräte zu erweitern bzw. zu verbessern. Lounge Sortiment Dieses Sortiment basiert auf einem freundlichen, eleganten Design und bietet über 20 verschiedene Kabel für Audioverbindungen zwischen Geräten, den Anschluss von Playern an AV-Empfänger, die Verbesserung der Klangqualität und den Anschluss von Digital Kameras an Fernseher. Networking Sortiment Ein breites Angebot für die Verbindung von Geräten in verkabelten Netzwerken. Diese Kabel zeichnen sich durch Qualität und Komfort sowie maximale Leistung und Zuverlässigkeit aus. Über Conceptronic Conceptronic, die europäische Marke der 2L Alliance, ist Spezialist auf den Gebieten Mobility und Connectivity für Unternehmen und Endkunden. Der Brand Conceptronic hat sich in vergangenen zehn Jahren durch die Entwicklung innovativer Lösungen, die Umsetzung modernster Technologien und den Verkauf von Produkten im exklusiven Design, eine bedeutende Stellung im IT/CE Markt geschaffen. Lifestyle ist das zentrale Thema und spiegelt sich in allen Bereichen wieder. Heute arbeitet Conceptronic mit vielen Distributoren und Wiederverkäufern in über 30 Länder innerhalb und außerhalb Europas zusammen. Das Gesamtangebot besteht aus dem GrabnGO-Sortiment, dem Lounge-Sortiment sowie den Networking- und Connectivity-Lösungen. Weitere Informationen finden Sie auf der Webseite: www.conceptronic.net. Shortlink zu dieser Pressemitteilung: http://shortpr.com/wy64jk Permanentlink zu dieser Pressemitteilung: http://www.themenportal.de/elektronik-hardware/conceptronic-rundet-gesamtportfolio-mit-mehr-als-50-kabel-produkten-weiter-ab-63111 === CONCEPTRONIC RUNDET GESAMTPORTFOLIO MIT MEHR ALS 50 KABEL-PRODUKTEN WEITER AB (Teaserbild) === Madrid, 21. Dezember 2010. Mit insgesamt 54 Produkten in den drei Bereichen Lounge, Connectivity und Networking bietet das Kabelsortiment von Conceptronic eine optimale und umfassende Ergänzung zu der bestehenden breiten Gesamtproduktpalette. description.hltext_display: 男子“爱好”改造仿真枪 被群众举报抓获获刑罚
description.content:
天津北方网讯：天津市一男子别的不爱，偏偏喜欢上了购买、改造仿真手枪。该男子被群众举报后被抓，法庭日前判处其有期徒刑一年零六个月。
近日，河东检察院受理了这起非法持有枪支罪案件。被告人张某，男，42岁，无业，因个人喜好，近年来购买了多支仿真手枪，并在家中研究改造。今年7月1日，经群众举报，警方将张某抓获，并从其家中搜出仿真手枪9支，各类子弹三十余发。经鉴定，其中一把以火药为动力发射的自制仿64式手枪具有杀伤力，两把充气式气弹手枪具有致伤力。日前，法院以非法持有枪支罪依法判处张某有期徒刑一年零六个月。记者王学军通讯员刘钰王欣钢

description.hltext_display: Home Inns & Hotels Management Inc. Announces the Closing of US$184 Million Offering of Convertible Senior Notes
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Home Inns & Hotels Management Inc.
NEW YORK, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire-Asia/ -- Home Inns & Hotels Management Inc. (Nasdaq: HMIN) today announced the closing of its offering of US$184 million in aggregate principal amount of 2.00% convertible senior notes due 2015. The offering included the exercise by the initial purchasers of their option to purchase up to an additional US$24 million of the convertible senior notes to cover over-allotments. The notes were offered to (1) qualified institutional buyers pursuant to Rule 144A under the United States Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the "Securities Act"), and (2) investors outside the United States in compliance with Regulation S under the Securities Act.
The Company will file a shelf registration statement for resale of the notes and the Company's ordinary shares represented by the ADSs, if any, issuable upon conversion of the notes and use its commercially reasonable best efforts to cause such registration statement to become effective under the Securities Act by the 210th day after the notes are issued.
Home Inns & Hotels Management Inc. intends to use the approximately US$177,9 million of net proceeds from this offering for new business development, investments in complementary businesses and assets, strategic acquisitions and for general corporate purposes.
The notes and the ADSs into which such notes may be convertible have not been registered under the Securities Act or any state securities laws and, unless so registered, may not be offered or sold in the United States except pursuant to an exemption from the registration requirements of the Securities Act and applicable state laws.
This press release shall not constitute an offer to sell or a solicitation of an offer to purchase any of these securities, and shall not constitute an offer, solicitation or sale of the shares of notes in any state or jurisdiction in which such an offer, solicitation or sale would be unlawful.
Safe Harbor Statement

Statements that are not historical facts, including statements about the Company's beliefs and expectations, are forward-looking statements. Forward-looking statements involve inherent risks and uncertainties. A number of factors could cause actual results to differ materially from those contained in any forward-looking statement, including but not limited to the following: our anticipated growth strategies; our future business development, results of operations and financial condition; our ability to attract customers and leverage our brand; trends and competition in the lodging industry; our ability to develop new hotels at desirable locations in a timely and cost-effective manner; changes in national, regional or local economic conditions; the attractiveness of our hotels to customers and competition from other hotels; our ability to generate sufficient cash flow from operations and/or obtain outside financing; tourist behavior related to spending; local market conditions such as an oversupply of, or a reduction in demand for, hotel rooms; and our future business development, results of operations and financial condition. Further information regarding these and other risks is included in our Annual Report on Form 20-F filed on April 21, 2010 and other documents filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission. description.hltext_display: Supreme Court ruling may release Vanderhoof airport lands from provincial control
description.content:
Vanderhoof Omineca Express
The Vanderhoof airport may be legally under federal jurisdiction, after almost 40 years of answering to the provincial Agricultural Land Commission (ALC) regarding any new development.
During the last regular council meeting on December 16, council were notified of a Supreme Court ruling that has been in the news recently. On October 15 2010 (Quebec (Attorney General) v. Canadian Owners and Pilots Association, 2010 SCC 39) a court ruled that aerodromes are the responsibility of the Federal government and that the ALC has no jurisdiction over areas designated as aerodromes.
District of Vanderhoof Mayor Gerry Thiessen says if the court case holds it will be great news, as the District has been disappointed with recent decisions by the ALC about the airport lands.
“The ALC was brought in... to save agricultural land,” said Thiessen.
“But the airport has never been agricultural land - at least not since the Second World War - it’s always been an airport,” he said.
Thiessen mentioned that in a recent decision by the ALC, only 25 hectares were released for airport development which is not enough and the land would have a number of restrictions.
“The District would like a little more latitude with how we make a decision and how we develop it ...we have no intention of allowing other industries other than airport industry into that area and so we want to continue to make very very sure, that what ever goes in there is for the good of the airport,” said Thiessen.
“If the court ruling holds, it would allow us as a community to go out and make our own decisions about the airport lands ... if not the we will need to work together with ALC,” he said.
District lawyers are currently reviewing the ruling and will provide council with their opinion on the success of such a claim and how to move ahead.
TEXT

description.hltext_display: 大連玉米指定交割倉庫12月22日期貨倉單日報
...och färdtjänsts resor hotas
description.content:
Publicerat: tisdag 21 december kl 10:50, Västtrafik kan tvingas ställa in färdtjänstresor i hela Västra Götalands-regionen på julafton. Om SMHI:s prognos om snöstorm håller i sig klarar man inte av alla uppdrag enligt sin planering. (1:01)Julvädret kan komma att ställa till det i färdtjänsttrafiken. Både inställda turer och förseningar kan bli resultatet om det väntade snövädret drabbar oss, det säger Gunilla Wicktor, pressansvarig för västtrafik när det gäller anropsstyrd trafik. Reporter: Petra Dahlberg. Dela Facebook Twitter Digg Del.icio.us Poddradio Trafikverket förbereder sig för att prioritera vissa vägar på grund av saltbristen.
Ekots rapportering Senaste väderprognoserna På vår vädersida får du senaste nytt om vädret i dag och de kommande dagarna. Vad tycker du om vintern? Underbart, det ska vara kallt och mycket snö. Jobbigt, det skapar så många problem. Visa resultat Gunilla Wicktor är pressansvarig på Västtrafiks anropsstyrda trafik. Ja, det gör ju ont i hjärtat att behöva säga detta, att vi eventuellt kan behöva ställa in turer. Men vi kör så mycket vi orkar och så mycket vi kan, beroende på vädret och väglaget framförallt.
Resenärernas säkerhet kommer i första rummet. Om någon skulle bli drabbade så kommer vi att ringa upp de resenärer som är berörda, säger Gunilla Wicktor.
Om det skulle komma väldigt mycket snö natten till julafton så kan det bli så olyckligt att vi måste ringa på julafton och ställa in. Allt är just nu beroende av snöfallet, väglaget och hur snabbt man hinner röja undan på vägarna.
Vilka resor är det som kan komma att ställas in då, går det att säga? Nej, det beror ju på hur det ser ut runt om i länet. Men det kan ju vara på småvägar där trafikverket inte hinner ploga eller röja undan snön, som det kan bli problem att ta sig fram, säger Gunilla Wicktor.
För närvarande är cirka 3 000 resor beställda med färdtjänsten inför julafton i hela Västra Götaland.
Petra Dahlberg
Tel: 0500-444415petra.dahlberg@sr.se

description.hltext_display: 中高档年货礼盒个人消费为主 品种增加价格略升
description.content:
天津北方网讯：记者从市烹饪协会获悉，本市30余家餐饮企业已备足260万份年货礼盒并开始接受预订。今年年货礼盒的上市时间提前，品种也大为丰富，整体价格平均上浮约5%。
品种增加价格略升
今年本市上市的年货礼盒主要有15个系列200多种，不仅有烤鸭、传统面食、海鲜、牛羊肉、生鲜蔬菜、干(坚)果等传统品种，还新添了传统风味酱制品、特色年夜菜、年饭全家福等新品种，同时也有极品鲍鱼、精品鱼翅等高端礼盒。
从价格上看，今年年货礼盒的总体价格因原材料上涨和人力成本的提升而上升了5%左右。今年的年货礼盒最便宜的32元，出自天津烤鸭店的“天津红烧肉”，最贵的年货礼盒标价1980元，是由集贤大酒家推出的“金礼鲍翅”。四星级的天滨利园大酒店还推出了“滨海馇八鲜”礼盒，既有河海两鲜的特色，又有天津传统小咸菜的味道，价格是168元。而天津烤鸭店推出的“年饭全家福”礼盒则彻底解决了一顿丰盛的家宴，其中包括9菜1汤，只要加热，一顿丰盛的年夜饭就可上桌了。
天津肉联厂还与很多餐饮企业对接，推出了包含各种酱制品的酱货礼盒，价格是158元，这是今年年货礼盒的一大新特色，从源头上保障了肉制品的质量安全。
面食礼盒最为抢手
面食在今年的年货礼盒中要占到50%左右，狗不理、全聚德、登瀛楼、石头门槛、天滨利园大酒店等30多家餐饮企业都精心准备了各具特色的面食，价格从76元到110元不等。今年的水饺礼盒也很有特色，在年货礼盒中要占4%，比如：百饺园推出的精品水饺礼盒，有猪肉三鲜等各种馅料，标价128元；白记饺子馆则推出了包括各式水饺及烧卖的特色礼盒。
高中档礼盒个人买为主
市烹饪协会郭立久会长告诉记者，往年的情况表明，高档价位的年货礼盒主要用于馈赠亲友、孝敬老人，个人消费占主流，还有一部分是用于商务馈赠，但不占主流。两三百元的中档价位年货礼盒也是以个人消费为主流，主要是市民自用。而100元以下的低档价位年货礼盒则以单位给职工发福利为主流。
“往年很多人都是到腊月二十六七才想到买年货礼盒，但往往早已脱销。今年餐饮企业对年货礼盒启动比较早，目前各家餐饮企业已开始接受预订，提醒市民提前预订。”市烹饪协会郭立久会长说。

description.hltext_display: 梅江附近道路“气喘吁吁” 连接道路少私家车多
College Notes for Dec. 22
description.content:
Flagler College, St. Augustine, Fla.: Gabriel Labbe, Eliot; Michelle Robb, Cumberland; Matty Truax, York.
Awards
Nazareth College, Rochester, N.Y.: Jenna Howard, of Limestone and Belfast, has been selected by the American Chemical Society's Woman Chemists Committee to receive a 2011 Eli Lilly/WCC Travel Grant. The award is given to 10 outstanding female graduate and undergraduate students.
University of Maine at Farmington: The following students have been named Michael D. Wilson Research Scholars and Fellows: Hayden Golden, Westbrook; Jacob Hansen, Springvale; Drew McLaren, Harrison; Jacquelyn Murphy, Union; Kieran Nichols, Bath; John Leso, Ashley Simpson and Heustis Whiteside, all of Farmington.
Connecticut College, New London: Emma Judkins of Scarborough and Celia Whitehead of Bath have been named Winthrop Scholars, the college's highest academic honor. Winthrop Scholars are also selected for membership in the Delta of Connecticut Chapter of the Phi Beta Kappa society.
Other
Victoria Bagwell of Topsham spent the summer as an Alvan T. and Viola D. Fuller-American Cancer Society Junior Research Fellow at the Flow Cytometry Lab in the Immunopathology Department at Massachusetts General Hospital. Bagwell studies human physiology at Boston University Sargent School College of Health and Rehabilitation Sciences.

description.hltext_display: Hilton Worldwide Signe un accord pluriannuel avec Tata Consultancy Services
description.content:
TCS s'associe à Hilton Worldwide afin d'accélérer et d'améliorer la stratégie informatique de cette dernière
Hilton Worldwide, la société hôtelière mondiale numéro un, et Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), (BSE : 532540) (NSE : TCS), l'une des plus importantes sociétés de services informatiques, de conseil et de solutions métier, ont annoncé aujourd'hui un accord pluriannuel visant à accélérer et améliorer la stratégie technologique de Hilton Worldwide dans le cadre du consortium Hilton Worldwide Innovation Collaborative.
Le consortium Innovation Collaborative va développer l'infrastructure technologique de Hilton Worldwide et accélérer l'innovation à travers le portefeuille de la société, constitué de dix marques. TCS va mettre à profit son expérience étendue en termes d'initiatives de transformation et de modernisation des systèmes traditionnels pour contribuer à développer une plateforme qui permettra à Hilton Worldwide de rester au premier plan du paysage commercial et technologique.
« Notre but est de poursuivre notre solide histoire en matière d'innovation en collaborant avec les meilleurs leaders technologiques », a déclaré Robert Webb, responsable des technologies de l'informationchez Hilton Worldwide. « En tant que partenaire de notre Innovation Collaborative, TCS a démontré son engagement à nous aider à réaliser nos objectifs commerciaux et continue à fournir des services de niveau mondial. »
« Nous somme ravis d'appartenir à la vision de croissance de Hilton Worldwide », a confié N. Chandrasekaran, PDG et DG de TCS. « Cette relation confirme notre position de leader en tant que partenaire informatique de longue date le mieux équipé pour aider les grandes multinationales à transformer leurs entreprises grâce à nos capacités de services complets et notre connaissance du domaine. Nous nous engageons à promouvoir les initiatives stratégiques et transformationnelles de Hilton Worldwide par le biais de solutions technologiques les plus avancées. »
TCS est le fer de lance de la transformation et de la gestion d'un groupe central de plateformes d'applications qui fournira une gamme de produits améliorés. Pour aligner au plus près les solutions technologiques sur les besoins des entreprises et pour que Hilton Worldwide demeure le leader de l'innovation dans le secteur de l'hôtellerie, TCS gère la gamme d'applications d'entreprise dans les domaines de la gestion de l'information immobilière, la gestion des acquisitions de connaissance, l'assurance qualité, la veille stratégique, les systèmes financiers et les applications intranet.
À propos de Hilton Worldwide
Hilton Worldwide, le plus important groupe hôtelier au monde, propose toute la gamme des hébergements, depuis les hôtels et les complexes touristiques à services complets les plus luxueux jusqu'aux appartements dédiés aux longs séjours et aux hôtels de moyenne gamme. Depuis 91 ans, Hilton Worldwide propose aux voyageurs d'affaires et de loisirs le meilleur en termes d'hébergement, de service, de produits et de rapport qualité-prix. La compagnie reste fidèle à sa tradition, celle d'offrir à tous ses clients la meilleure expérience de séjour, quelle que soit la marque de produits. Ses différentes marques regroupent plus de 3 600 hôtels et 600 000 chambres dans 82 pays et incluent Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, Conrad Hotels & Resorts, Hilton Hotels & Resorts, Doubletree, Embassy Suites Hotels, Hilton Garden Inn, Hampton Hotels, Homewood Suites by Hilton, Home2 Suites by Hilton et Hilton Grand Vacations. La compagnie gère également le programme de fidélisation renommé Hilton HHonors®. Pour en savoir plus, consultez www.hiltonworldwide.com.
À propos de Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
Tata Consultancy Services est une entreprise spécialisée dans les services informatiques, les solutions métier et l'externalisation. Elle apporte des résultats concrets aux entreprises internationales en assurant un niveau de fiabilité qu'aucune autre société ne peut égaler. TCS propose un portefeuille intégré de solutions informatiques et de services informatisé, unifié par son offre de conseil. Son réseau mondial de prestation (GNDM?) est reconnu comme une référence en développement de logiciel. Branche de Tata Group, premier conglomérat industriel en Inde, TCS emploie plus de 174 000 consultants informatiques, qui comptent parmi les plus expérimentés et les mieux formés du monde, dans 42 pays. L'entreprise a réalisé un chiffre d'affaires consolidé de plus de 6,3 milliards USD pour l'année fiscale clôturée au 31 mars 2010. Elle est cotée à la bourse nationale d'Inde et à la bourse de Mumbai. Pour en savoir plus, consultez www.tcs.com.
Remarque : Ce communiqué et les autres annonces de la part de TCS sont disponibles en tant que flux RSS à l'adresse http://www.tcs.com
Flux RSS :
Site Web de TCS : http://www.tcs.com/rss_feeds/Pages/feed.aspx?f=p
Feedburner : http://feeds2.feedburner.com/tcspress
Autres contacts avec les médias de TCS :
International : pradipta.bagchi@tcs.com - Téléphone : +91 22 6778 9999
Inde : ashish.babu@tcs.com - Téléphone : + 91 22 6778 9077
États-Unis/Canada : m.mccabe@tcs.com - Téléphone : +1 646-313-4594
Europe/RU : keith.sharp@tcs.com - Téléphone : +44 02072354613
Galerie photos/multimédias disponibles : http://www.businesswire.com/cgi-bin/mmg.cgi?eid=6552071〈=fr
Le texte du communiqué issu d'une traduction ne doit d'aucune manière être considéré comme officiel. La seule version du communiqué qui fasse foi est celle du communiqué dans sa langue d'origine. La traduction devra toujours être confrontée au texte source, qui fera jurisprudence.
Hilton Worldwide

description.hltext_display: 大連黃大豆一號指定交割倉庫12月22日期貨倉單日報
神童“炒”经纪人 小祥父亲:签了合同也能解约
description.content:
天津北方网讯：本报曾报道的《四岁钢琴“神童”要“炒”经纪人》，又有最新进展。昨天，被告钢琴教师的律师向媒体公布了三组证据，欲证实涉案《演员经纪合同》有效，实际违约的是小祥(化名)一方。而小祥的父亲表示，这些证据并不影响解约。
纪老师证明已履行义务
昨天，纪老师的另一位代理人张默蕾律师给记者看了三组证据。第一组是双方签订的《演员经纪合同》，上面有小祥父母和季老师的签字。第二组证据是证明小祥父母违约，而纪老师并未违约的证据。其中，相关人员的证言表明，小祥的父亲宋先生向幼儿园老师提出，不允许纪老师接孩子。幼儿园“当班老师”当时挺为难的，不知道该怎么办。第三组证据是，纪老师给予小祥良好教育的视频证据，刻录在一张光盘里。里面有双方产生纠纷前，小祥父母明确表示，纪老师是无偿教学并表示感谢的视频资料。另外，还有小祥获得一些荣誉的视频。
张默蕾说，这些证据能证明纪老师履行了合同义务，违约的责任应该由原告方负责。
小祥老爸承认签过合同
针对被告方公布的证据，小祥的父亲宋先生表示，他们的确在合同上签字并画押，一家三口从来不否认这一点。但是，当初签订合同并不意味着在发生纠纷后不可以解除合同。在履行合同过程中，他们对纪老师的一些行为不是很满意，而且孩子的学习和精神状态也受了影响。所以，是否签订合同并且签字画押，并不是现在解除合同的障碍。
对于纪老师的证人证言，宋先生说，他不再送孩子去幼儿园，是因为从上海回来后，他曾三次送孩子到幼儿园，但纪老师都不教孩子学琴。7月20日后，幼儿园放假时要合班，新老师对小祥不是很了解，他怕发生意外。这也是他后来没送孩子去幼儿园的原因之一。
对于被告方掌握的视频证据，宋先生表示，纪老师不是无偿教琴，对纪老师感谢是因为刚开始他们的确很感谢她。后来双方出现问题，当初的感谢并不影响现在的解约。
纪老师律师
授课不属于义务教育合同有效
市律师协会未成年人保护委员会委员刘晟廷上周发表了“合同无效论”之后，纪老师表示不接受。纪老师的另一位代理人张默蕾律师强调，未成年人的法定代理人签订的合同是有效合同。那种所谓的合同无效，又要求解除的说法，实际上是自相矛盾的。因为合同当事人要求解除合同的前提是存在一份依法成立并且有效的合同。被告为原告提供的是课外辅导和钢琴技能培训，显然不属于义务教育的范畴，收费与否都不违反法律规定。张默蕾律师认为，双方签订的《演员经纪合同》不存在我国《合同法》第52条规定的合同无效的几种情形，系合法有效的合同。
刘晟廷委员
涉案合同以营利为目的合同无效
针对被告律师的观点，刘晟廷表示，我国《民法通则》第7条规定：民事活动应当尊重社会公德，不得损害社会公共利益。第58条规定：违反法律和社会公共利益的是无效民事行为，无效的民事行为从行为开始起就没有法律约束力。在本案中，作为幼儿来说，应当接受的是无经济利益的义务教育。任何与经济利益挂钩或者牵连的教育行为都是于法无据，或者说是背离我国教育基本理念的。涉案合同本身似乎仅仅是音乐教育合同，但究其本质，确实是个以营利为目的的合同。或者说，至少是一个变相营利合同，这样的合同应当是无效合同。

description.hltext_display: 高� �サッカー 九国大付 永井超え！！ (10:35)
description.content:
永井先輩を超える！ 第８９回全国高校サッカー選手権大会（３０日開幕、東京・国立競技場など）に、九州国際大付（福岡）が４年ぶりに挑む。前回出場した第８５回大会はＪ１名古屋入りを決めたＵ－２１（２１歳以下）日本代表ＦＷ永井謙佑（福岡大４年）を擁したものの、２回戦で敗れた。徹底的なＰＫの特訓を積み、福岡県予選決勝では２１－２０という歴史的なＰＫ戦の末に東福岡を下した精神力と、永井のような自由奔放な攻撃サッカーで「国立行き」を目指す。
歴史に残る一戦をものにしてつかんだ全国切符を無駄にしない。「県予選決勝のＰＫ戦は別人がやっているような不思議な感覚に包まれていた。全国ではもっと楽しくプレーし、出るからには優勝したい」。ＤＦ工藤真仁（３年）は誓った。
準決勝もＰＫ戦で勝ち抜き、決勝では２２人全員が枠内に入れ、２１人がゴール。驚異の集中力がクローズアップされたが、実はもともと勝負弱かった。昨年の全国選手権県予選準決勝では東海大五に、１月の新人戦県大会準決勝では東福岡に、それぞれＰＫ戦で敗れた。
「以前はＰＫをくじ引きのようなものと考えていた。負け続けて、実力で決まるものだと思った」と工藤。そこで春先から徹底的なＰＫ練習を繰り返した。全選手が誰一人しゃべらず、じっと見つめる本番さながらの緊張感の中で練習。８月に関西大で行った合宿では、平静を保ちづらい状況をつくるため朝練習前に抜き打ちで行うなど、大舞台でも動じない精神力を培った。
もっとも、杉山監督は選手の判断力を伸ばすために「自由主義」を掲げている。４年前はどんな場所からでもシュートを放つ永井にコーチがパスを指示すると「前を向いてゴールを狙う選手を止めたらいけない」といさめた。「寒いから」と監督や永井らが相談して練習を休んだこともあった。
今回も攻撃は基本的に選手の判断に委ねる。果敢にオーバーラップするサイドバックの工藤や、工藤とともに福岡大への進学が内定している長身ＭＦ田村友（３年）ら創造性豊かな選手がサイドアタックを仕掛ける。「決められた中で個性を発揮する、アフリカンサファリのようなチーム。４年前より、どこからでも攻められる今年の方が面白い」と杉山監督。アジア大会でも物おじしなかった先輩に続き、今冬は大暴れする。
＝2010/12/22付 西日本スポーツ＝

description.hltext_display: Aprueba el Congreso el Presupuesto de Egresos del 2011
법원 “방응모 前조선일보 사장 친일행위 인정”
description.content: [뉴스엔 김종효 기자]방우영 � �(前) 조� 일보 명예회장이 조부인 방응모 � � 조� 일보 사장의 친일행위 결� �을 취소해달라며 낸 소송에서 일부 승소했으나 사실상 패소했다.서울행� �법원 행� �11부는 12월 22일 방우영 � � 명예회장이 행� �안� �부 장관을 상대로 낸 소송에 대해 "친일행위가 대부분 인� �된다"� 밝혔다.재판부는 "방응모 � � 사장이 자� 이 운영하던 잡지 '조광'에 일� � 침략� �쟁에 동조하� 내� 일체를 강조하는 문예물 등을 게재하는 등 우리 민족에게 물심양면으로 일� �에 협� �� 것을 주문하는 논문을 게재했다"며 "방응모 � � 사장은 일� �에 � �극 협� �했다� 볼 수 있다"� 판결했다.또 "국민� �� 총동원조� 연맹, 국민총� �조� 연맹에서 발기인, 평의원 및 참사로 활동한 � �으로 미뤄 일본의 강압에 의한 것이 아니라 � �극� �으로 협� �해 활동한 것으로 보인다"� 덧붙였다.하지만 재판부는 "방응모 � � 사장이 조� 항공공업 주식회사의 설립 후 감사로 등재됐지만 실� �� �인 운영을 했다� 보기 어� �다"며 이 부분에 대한 친일 행위 결� �은 취소한다� 밝혀 원� 일부 승소판결을 내� �다.한편 방응모 � � 사장이 백범 김구, 만해 한용운 등과 지속� � 교분이 있어 친일인사가 아니라는 방우영 � � 명예회장의 주장에 대해� "일부 독립운동을 지원한 사실이 인� �되더라도 결� �이 부당하다� � 수 없다"� 못박았다.지난해 방우영 � � 명예회장은 친일반민족행위 진상규명위원회가 방응모 � � 사장을 친일반민족행위자로 결� �하며 '일� �에 � �극 협� �한 � �이 인� �된다'� 평가하자 이를 취소해달라며 소송을 냈다.방응모 � � 사장은 지난 1933년부터 1940까지 조� 일보 사장을 역임하� 잡지 '조광'의 편집인으로 활동하다 6.25� �쟁때 납북돼 1955년께 사망한 것으로 알� �졌다.김종효 phenomdark@newsen.com기사� �보 및 보도자료 newsen@newsen.comcopyrightⓒ 뉴스엔. 무단� �재 & 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: “准爸爸”缺叶酸 胎儿先天不足
description.content:
天津北方网讯：刚刚完成的《天津市妇女儿童健康行动计划2010年度工作报告》中显示，本市在对育龄人群的叶酸检测中发现异常人群男性23715人占69.13%，也就是说本市近7成育龄丈夫缺乏叶酸。妇幼专家建议，“准爸爸”也应和“准妈妈”一样从孕前就开始补充叶酸。
“准爸爸”缺叶酸
宝宝难发育
本市妇女儿童保健中心妇保科董玲主任表示，神经管缺陷是我国最常见的出生缺陷之一，是导致流产、死胎、新生儿死亡和患者终身残疾的主要原因之一。孕妇体内叶酸缺乏是导致这些情况的重要原因，补充叶酸制剂是有效预防的重要手段。第三中心医院副主任医师安惠芳告诉记者，叶酸可以促进男性精子活力，提高精子免疫力，从而保证胎儿质量。叶酸不足的精子是存在一定缺陷的，这样精子形成的胎儿先天不足难以发育起来，很容易出现胎儿先兆流产和稽流流产的状况。
符合条件农村妇女
可免费领取叶酸
本市从2009年起启动增补叶酸预防神经管缺陷项目，在为全市准备生育夫妻免费检测叶酸的基础上，还为农村欲孕妇女免费补充叶酸。进行婚姻登记时，男女双方就能免费接受叶酸检测和补充叶酸健康教育。凡是在民政局婚姻登记并准备两年内怀孕的、已结婚未生育准备近期生育的、符合计划生育政策准备生二胎及二胎以上的、既往生育过神经管缺陷胎儿等具有危险因素的本市农村妇女，均可到当地民政部门婚姻登记处免费领取叶酸。

description.hltext_display: Wuksachi Lodge Weathers High Sierra Storm in High Spirits
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Wuksachi Lodge
A series of winter storms temporarily closes Sequoia National Park while delivering over four feet of snow at the lodge for a perfect holiday backdrop
SEQUOIA NATIONAL PARK, Calif., Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- With winter storm conditions closing road access to Sequoia National Park since Sunday, the Wuksachi Lodge, in the heart of the park, has evacuated, rebooked or provided full refunds to its impacted guests, while serving those who settled in to stay and preparing for a very white Christmas when roads reopen.
To date, more than four feet of snow has fallen at Wuksachi Lodge since the storm began. The National Weather Service is forecasting that the precipitation will taper off Wednesday evening with Thursday mostly cloudy and Christmas Eve expected to be mostly sunny in the Sierra Nevada.
"The holiday season is always popular here, and this year will be spectacular," said Wuksachi Lodge General Manager Diane Mason. "It has been about 10 years since we've seen such record rainfall and road closures here."
Guests this winter can take full advantage of the amazing setting by snowshoeing, cross-country skiing, snowman building, or simply gazing upon the beauty from inside the cozy lodge.
For current road information, call the National Park Service at 559-565-3341. (Press 1 to continue to main menu and 4 for current road information.) To inquire about existing reservations or to make a reservation, call 866-786-3199 or visit http://VisitSequoia.com for up-to-date details on the closure.
About the Wuksachi Lodge
Located in the heart of Sequoia National Park on the western slope of the Central Sierra, the 102-room Wuksachi Lodge features a panoramic mountain setting, full-service restaurant, cocktail lounge, retail shop, and 1,320 square feet of dedicated meeting space. Furnishings reflect an upscale, natural decor highlighting native granite rock, oak, cedar, and hickory woods as well as modern guest amenities such as Internet access.
The Wuksachi Lodge is operated by Delaware North Companies Parks & Resorts®, one of the nation's leading hospitality management companies, under contract with the National Park Service.
About Delaware North Companies Parks & Resorts
Delaware North Companies is one of the world's leading hospitality and food service providers. Its family of companies includes Delaware North Companies Parks & Resorts, Delaware North Companies Gaming & Entertainment, Delaware North Companies Travel Hospitality Services, Delaware North Companies Sportservice, Delaware North Companies International and Delaware North Companies Boston, owner of TD Garden. Delaware North Companies is one of the largest privately held companies in the United States with revenues exceeding $2 billion annually and 50,000 associates serving half a billion customers in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, Australia and New Zealand. For more information, visit www.DelawareNorth.com.
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: '평양성' 이문식-선우선, '8살차' 뛰어넘는 과격로맨스 '화제'
description.content:
[OSEN=봉준영 기자] 배우 이문식과 선우선이 영화 ‘평양성’(감독 이준익)에서 8살 차를 뛰어넘는 과격한 로맨스를 펼쳐 화제를 모으고 있다.
영화 ‘황산벌’ 이후 8년만에 돌아온 이준익 감독의 ‘평양성’이 전작과는 다른 색다른 러브라인을 선보인다.
색다른 러브라인의 주인공은 바로 ‘황산벌 전투’ 8년 후 또 다시 전장으로 끌려온 습관성(?) 입대자 거시기(이문식 분)와 갑순(선우선). ‘황산벌’에서 ‘평양성’까지 억울한 징집인생을 살던 거시기에게 드디어 사랑이 찾아온다.
거시기는 전투 중 포로가 되어 끌려간 고구려에서 당찬 여인 갑순에게 첫눈에 반하고 그녀의 마음을 사로잡기 위해 고군분투한다. 하지만 당나라군에 의해 목숨을 잃은 가족의 복수가 유일한 삶의 목표인 갑순은 거시기의 마음을 받아들이지 않고 그를 박대하기만 한다.
갑순의 눈에 들기 위해 끊임없이 노력하는 거시기, 그리고 그를 자꾸만 밀어내려고 하는 갑순 커플의 러브 라인은 첫만남부터 결코 순탄치가 않았다. 실수로 갑순의 가슴에 손을 갖다 댄 거시기의 얼굴에 정면으로 주먹을 날린 것.
이후에도 갑순은 거시기의 애정공세를 무시로 일관하기는 예사, 온갖 독설과 욕설로 거시기를 떼놓기 위해 갖은 애를 쓰지만 더욱 적극적으로 다가오는 거시기에게 급기야 주먹과 발길질로 응수한다.
이 장면 촬영 이후 실제 거시기 이문식의 입속이 찢어지고 선우선의 주먹이 퉁퉁 부어오르는 등 부상을 당했을 정도. 전투를 방불케 할 만큼 힘들게 촬영한 과격살벌한 러브라인으로 영화 속 코믹함을 더한다.
‘황산벌’, ‘왕의 남자’와 더불어 이준익 감독에게 또 하나의 흥행 신화를 남겨줄 것으로 기대를 모으고 있는 영화 ‘평양성’은 내년 1월 27일 개봉한다.
bongjy@osen.co.kr

Der Sender musste circa eine Stunde lang den Sendebetrieb einstellen. Nach Angaben von ABC News hielt sich die offenbar geistig verwirrte Frau nach Betreten des Gebäudes von

description.hltext_display: 八旬老翁拾柴掉冰窟 民警消防战士冒险施救(图)
description.content:
天津北方网讯：21日早晨，宁河县芦台镇大尹村80岁的李卓杰到蓟运河边拾柴时，不慎掉入冰窟窿里。事发后，民警、消防战士及时到场，冒生命危险，耗时65分钟救出落水老人。
昨天8时50分，公安宁河分局大北涧沽派出所接群众报警称：一名老人掉进船沽村东侧蓟运河冰窟窿里。派出所所长单宁带领民警携带救生衣、救生圈、绳子等救生工具，快速赶到现场，发现一名老大爷泡在直径约3米的冰窟窿里，仅露出头部。时间就是生命，单宁冒着生命危险慢慢爬向老人，把救生圈扔给老人，并用绳子绑住老人的胳膊，因老人体力不支，无法继续施救，但已有效控制老人继续下沉的局面。
很快，镇南新区派出所派出3名民警到场施救、宁河巡警支队派出15名民警到场援助，民警携带救生圈、救生绳索等，顶着严寒，踩着薄冰，冒着随时落水的危险接近老人。由于冰面太薄，出现塌冰情况，多次救援未果。此时，消防宁河大队官兵相继赶到现场。消防官兵和救援民警一起借助云梯等专业装备进行施救，由于天气寒冷，老人意识模糊，身体逐渐下沉。
紧要关头，消防战士张凯冒着危险接近落水老人，接着，消防官兵赵焕文、董运起运用云梯接近老人，把被冰卡住的老人托起，民警用绳子往上拽拉老人，落水老人获救。记者吕献峰 尹娜 通讯员李建宁 马权友

description.hltext_display: China promete medidas concretas para apoyar a la eurozona, pero sin detallar
description.content:
las declaraciones bastaron para que el euro se recuperara de su mínimo en dos semanas
Isabel Ramos Jeldres
El gobierno chino lanzó ayer un salvavidas a la eurozona para que no se hunda por completo en la crisis de deuda soberana. Según funcionarios de la UE, China ofreció nuevas "medidas concertadas" y seguir comprando los bonos de los países en problemas. Tales declaraciones provocaron un alza del euro.
China apoya las medidas del Fondo Monetario Internacional (FMI), dijo el viceprimer ministro chino Wang Qishan. Además, el país "ha tomado acciones concretas para ayudar a algunos miembros de la Unión Europea para contener la crisis de deuda soberana", aseguró Wang en el inicio de Tercer Diálogo Económico y Comercial de Alto Nivel Unión Europea-China, un foro que se realizó en Beijing para discutir las relaciones económicas y comerciales.
"Los comentarios serían un buen regalo de Navidad para el euro si el apoyo asiático para la Unión Europea continúa hacia el próximo año", afirmó a Bloomberg el director ejecutivo de ventas de divisas extranjeras de Nomura Holdings, Kurt Magnus. "Hay muchas personas que buscan vender euros", acotó.
Impulsado por las declaraciones de Wang, que no entregó detalles de las medidas que ha tomado China para apoyar a Europa, el euro avanzó frente a 14 de las 16 monedas más transadas, después de que el lunes registrara un mínimo en dos semanas.
Se espera que la compra de bonos por parte de China, que posee un récord de US$ 2,65 billones (millones de millones) de reservas en moneda extranjera, aumente la confianza de los inversionistas en los activos europeos.
China mantiene la composición de sus reservas como secreto de Estado. Pero países como Grecia y Portugal creen que la nación asiática ha realizado compras significativas de su deuda soberana en medio de la crisis de la eurozona.
Socio comercial
El primer ministro chino Wen Jiabao manifestó en octubre el apoyo de su país a un euro estable, y había aclarado que no reduciría sus tenencias de bonos europeos.
Ayer, el viceprimer ministro Wang destacó que los miembros de la Unión Europea han respondido "activamente a la crisis", pero agregó que espera que "esas medidas produzcan resultados rápidamente y conduzcan a una recuperación estable de las economías europeas".
La Unión Europea es el mayor socio comercial de China, por lo que Beijing tiene un enorme interés en apoyar la estabilidad en la región. El comercio bilateral sumó
US$ 433.880 millones en los once primeros meses del año, un aumento de 33,1% respecto del mismo período de 2009, informó la oficina de Aduanas de China este mes.
El gobierno portugués dijo la semana pasada que China había realizado una "declaración clara" de apoyo financiero durante la visita del ministro de Finanzas de Portugal, Fernando Teixeira dos Santos, a Beijing.
Según el periódico local Jornal de Negocios, China estaría dispuesta a invertir entre 4 mil millones de euros
(US$ 5.300 millones) y 5 mil millones de euros en deuda del gobierno portugués en el primer trimestre del próximo año.
"Tenemos varias revisiones (de calificaciones) a fines de enero, un calendario apretado de subastas y un mes más corto debido a las festividades a principios y fines de mes. Estamos sorprendidos de que el euro no esté más bajo", aseguró a Bloomberg el estratega jefe de monedas de Westpac Banking en Sidney, Robert Rennie.

description.hltext_display: Hyundai Motor may win bidder status for construction firm
description.content:
SEOUL (AFP) - South Korea's Hyundai Motor will likely be named preferred bidder for the country's largest builder, a major shareholder of the builder said Wednesday, after rival Hyundai Group was pushed out of the race.
Nine creditors with a combined 34.88 percent stake in Hyundai Engineering and Construction will vote at an unspecified date on whether to name Hyundai Motor preferred bidder, Ryu Jae-Han, head of state-run Korea Finance Corp, told Dow Jones Newswires.
On Monday creditors walked away from an initial deal to sell their stake to the Hyundai Group, saying it did not give them enough information about how it would finance the reported 5.51 trillion won (4.9 billion dollar) cost.
When asked whether Hyundai Motor, which lost the preliminary deal in November, would be chosen as preferred bidder this time, Ryu said he "can't deny" the possibility.
"I can't deny that the current atmosphere makes it seem that way, but that's something that the creditors need to vote on. We'll have to see how the process plays out," Dow Jones quoted Ryu as saying.
If the deal goes through Hyundai Motor would become the construction company's biggest shareholder.
The takeover battle is part of a family feud over the former Hyundai empire, which was split into separate units after the death of its billionaire founder Chung Ju-Yung in 2001.
Hyundai Motor, headed by the founder's second son Chung Mong-Koo, was hived off almost a decade ago as a separate entity. With affiliate Kia Motors, it is now the world's fifth largest carmaker.
The construction firm came under creditor control in a debt-for-equity swap in 2001 amid lingering fallout from the 1997-98 Asian financial crisis.
The Hyundai Group -- which includes a shipping firm, a brokerage, a tour company that operates projects in North Korea and an elevator maker -- initially outbid Hyundai Motor for the construction firm.
The group's chairwoman Hyun Jeong-Eun is the founder Chung's daughter-in-law.
But creditors said Hyundai Group failed to submit detailed information about its financing of the acquisition, particularly a 1.2 trillion won loan obtained from French bank Natixis.
---Dow Jones Newswires contributed to this report---

description.hltext_display: [2010 어워즈] 윤영주 '올해의 오프로드상' 수상
description.content: 20일 서울 양재동 aT센터 그랜드 컨퍼런스룸에서 개최된 2010 한국모터스포츠 어워즈(주최 지피코리아)가 열렸다. 올해의 오프로드상에는 팀챔피언스 윤영주가 수상했다. 윤영주 선수는 2010 코리아랠리슈퍼스테이지 대회에서 최고 클래스인 슈퍼2000클래스에서 우승 3회를 거두며 시리즈 종합 1위를 달성했다.올해 5회째를 맞이한 2010한국모터스포츠어워즈는 200여명이 참석해 자리를 빛낸 가운데 성대하게 펼쳐졌다. 올해의 드라이버상, 신인상, 감독상 등 모두 15개 분야에서 21명의 영광의 얼굴들이 뽑혔다./지피코리아 뉴스팀 gpkorea@gpkorea.com, 사진=지피코리아 ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ ▲ [] []- Copyrights ⓒ 스포츠조선, 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지 -

description.hltext_display: Stecher vyhrĂˇl i druhĂ˝ zĂˇvod SP v Ramsau, SlavĂ­k zĂ­skal bod
description.content:
Třiatřicetiletý Stecher dnes dokonale využil skokanskou část, která mu vyšla ze všech nejlépe. V desetikilometrovém běhu si postupně vytvořil až půlminutový náskok, takže mohl klidně v závěru zvolnit.
Druhého Němce Tina Edelmanna porazil dvojnásobný olympijský vítěz ze závodu družstev o 8,6 sekundy, třetí byl další německý reprezentant Eric Frenzel. Průběžné vedení v SP si udržel dnes čtvrtý Jason Lamy Chappuis z Francie.
Slavík si v běhu o něco polepšil ze 34. pozice, jež mu patřila po skoku. Na Stechera ztratil půldruhé minuty. Miroslav Dvořák byl šestačtyřicátý, Petr Kutal pětapadesátý a Lukáš Jančík předposlední osmapadesátý.
SP v severské kombinaci v Ramsau (Rakousko):
1. Stecher (Rak.) 24:22,3, 2. Edelmann -8,6, 3. Frenzel (oba Něm.) -10,2, 4. Lamy Chappuis (Fr.) -12,4, 5. Rydzek (Něm.) -17,3, 6. Watabe (Jap.) -17,6, 7. Denifl (Rak.) -18,1, 8. Fletcher (USA) -19,0, 9. Hurschler (Švýc.) -20,2, 10. Kokslien (Nor.) -20,8, ...30. Slavík -1:33,4, 46. Dvořák -2:40,9, 55. Kutal -3:52,9, 58. Jančík (všichni ČR) -4:50,1.
Průběžné pořadí SP (po 6 z 13 závodů): 1. Lamy Chappuis 435 b., 2. Stecher 386, 3. Kokslien 355, 4. Frenzel 294, 5. Gottwald (Rak.) 260, 6. Edelmann 252, ...20. Dvořák 64, 29. Slavík 40, 38. Churavý (ČR) 16.

description.hltext_display: Consumidores pedirán a Industria que la luz no suba más del 2%
description.content:
El Consejo de Consumidores y Usuarios (CCU) pedirá hoy al Ministerio de Industria, Turismo y Comercio que los incrementos globales de la tarifa eléctrica de último recurso (TUR) para el año 2011 no superen el 2%.
Esta organización instará al Ministerio a revisar los criterios que fijan los costes eléctricos para garantizar que éstos se adecuen a los costes de producción.
Ante los rumores de que el próximo mes de enero las tarifas eléctricas se incrementarán en torno al 10% para los consumidores, el Consejo de Consumidores y Usuarios, presidido por Francisca Sauquillo, ha indicado que "es inaceptable un incremento de la Tarifa de Último Recurso (TUR), que afecta a la mayoría de los hogares españoles, que supere el índice de precios al consumo".

description.hltext_display: QuÃ©bec City
description.content:
Bonhomme -- the mascot of Québec's annual Winter Carnival -- standing in front of Québec City. (©Quebec City Tourism/Xavier Dachez)
Recently Featured Destinations
Learn More About Québec City
More from Frommer's
Best Hawaiian Sights: 9 Favorite Moments
10 Best Mediterranean Cruise Ports
Win a Trip for 2 to US Virgin Islands
7 Tips for a Smarter Flight
Eat, Pray, and Love Across Italy
Few municipalities are as breathtaking on approach as Québec City. Situated along the majestic St. Lawrence River, much of the oldest part of the city -- Vieux-Québec -- sits atop Cap Diamant, a rock bluff that once provided military defense. Fortress walls still encase the upper portion of the old city, and the soaring Château Frontenac, a hotel with castle-like turrets, dominates the landscape. Hauntingly evocative of a coastal town in the motherland of France, the tableau is as romantic as any in Europe.
Québec City is the soul of New France and holds that history dear. It was the first significant settlement in Canada, founded in 1608, 400 years ago, by Samuel de Champlain. Much of 2007 was spent sprucing up the city for its 400th-anniversary celebrations in 2008, adding more access to the waterfront and an entirely new pavilion called Espace 400e that opened in spring 2008 to be the central location for celebrations throughout the year. After 2008, it will become a Parks Canada discovery center.
The city is almost entirely French in feeling, spirit, and language, and 95% of the population is Francophone, or French-speaking. But many people do know some English, especially those who work in hotels, restaurants, and shops, and thousands of resident college students study English as a second language. Although it is often more difficult in Québec City than in Montréal to get by without French, the average Québécois goes out of his or her way to communicate -- in halting English, sign language, simplified French, or a combination of all three. Most of the Québécois are uncommonly gracious, even with the city being the capital of the politically prickly Québec province.
Because of its beauty, history, and unique stature as the only walled city north of Mexico, the historic district of Québec City was named a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1985 -- the only area so designated in North America.
Ile d'Orléans, an agricultural and resort island within sight of Vieux-Québec, is less than a half-hour from downtown and an easy day- or overnight-trip. Consider, too, a trip along the northern coast of the St. Lawrence past the shrine of Ste-Anne-de-Beaupré, the waterfalls near Mont Ste-Anne, and on to pastoral Charlevoix and the Saguenay River, where whales come to play.

description.hltext_display: BJP should not forget it has skeletons in its cupboard: Sibal
description.content:
Stepping up his attack on the BJP over the telecom policy pursued by its govt in 1999, Telecom Minister Kapil Sibal has said the opposition party should not forget that they have skeletons in their cupboard. :namespace prefix = "o" ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" / Referring to his charge that the country had lost Rs 1.43 lakh crore during the NDA rule due to the changes it made in the telecom policy, Sibal said, "This is not to take revenge but to tell them that please look inwards before you start attacking institutions and destroying that very substratum of Parliamentary democracy". :namespace prefix = "o" ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" / Sibal had on Tuesday claimed that the government "actually" lost Rs 1.43 lakh crore in revenue in 1999 because of the then BJP-led NDA regime shifting to revenue share system from fixed license fee for telecom operations.
Asked whether his charge would be investigated, he said, "They have a lot of skeletons in their cupboard which is why I mentioned it (loss of Rs 1.43 lakh crore)".
He said he was only trying to highlight the issue of corruption which has become a "societal issue". "Corruption is an issue in this country and it reflects in every layer of the society. The media is also not far away from it. The political class is not far away from it. The professional class is not far away from it. This is a societal issue which needs to be addressed holistically," he said in
BJP has dismissed Sibal's charges, saying the minister was "defending the indefensible" in the 2G spectrum scam.
(DD-22.12)

description.hltext_display: Wetsvoorstel maakt werk UWV eenvoudiger
description.content:
De Eerste Kamer heeft het wetsvoorstel 'Wet harmonisatie en vereenvoudiging socialezekerheidswetgeving’ aangenomen. De wet zorgt voor vereenvoudiging en harmonisatie op het gebied van premieheffing voor werknemersverzekeringen en arbeidsongeschiktheidsregelingen.
Lagere kosten
De hoofddoelen van de wet zijn vereenvoudiging van de uitvoering door het Uitvoeringsinstituut werknemersverzekeringen (UWV), snellere uitkeringsvaststelling en een een duidelijker stelsel voor verzekerden. Ook levert het een verlaging van de administratieve lasten op.
Wajong
Het gaat om wijzigingen in de Ziektewet (ZW), de Wet werk en inkomen naar arbeidsvermogen (Wet WIA), de Wet op de arbeidsongeschiktheidsverzekering (WAO), de Wet arbeidsongeschiktheidsverzekering zelfstandigen (WAZ), de Wet werk en arbeidsondersteuning jonggehandicapten (Wet Wajong) en de Wet financiering sociale verzekeringen (Wfsv). Wanneer de wet precies in werking treedt, is nog niet bekend.

description.hltext_display: Bakeries Claim a Growing Niche in China – NYTimes
description.author: Bill Bishop
description.content:
Chinese are increasingly consuming sweets like cupcakes and cakes, so long as the sweetness is reduced significantly for the Chinese palate. And they are willing to pay top Renminbi for high quality creations, as evidenced by the success of my spouse’s growing CCSweets business.
From the New York Times article:
“The retail value of baked goods like bread, pastries and cakes sold in China has risen to an estimated 7.8 billion renminbi, or $1.2 billion, this year from 3.7 billion renminbi in 2000, according to data from Euromonitor International, a market researcher. Revenue could grow to 11.1 billion renminbi by 2015.
Per-capita consumption of bakery products in China stood at 4.1 kilograms, or 9 pounds, in 2009, nearly double the 2.1 kilograms per capita 10 years earlier. This compares with 36.4 kilograms per capita in Britain and 25.4 kilograms per capita in the United States, but the upward trend is in place.
“Young Chinese city dwellers influenced by Western culture increasingly favor bread as a morning staple over traditional breakfast foods” like rice porridge, says Anastasia Alieva, a food analyst at Euromonitor.
The rising demand, mainly in China’s major cities, has offered great business opportunities for foreign bakery chains, many of which have quickly expanded, gaining ground on large Chinese bakery companies like Christine and Holiland. The South Korean chain Paris Baguette now has 37 stores in China while the Taiwanese chain 85°C Bakery Cafe has about 145.

description.hltext_display: FEATURE: Beefed-up Haneda airport may help Tokyo artisans leap beyond sea
Mourinho impõe lei do silêncio a si mesmo no Real Madrid
description.content:
O técnico do Real Madrid, José Mourinho, é conhecido não apenas pelos bons times que costuma montar, mas também pelas declarações polêmicas. Mas, em tempos de atrito com a diretoria do clube, o português parece estar disposto a evitar dar declarações.
Sem explicar o motivo, ele impôs a si mesmo a "lei do silêncio": decidiu não comparecer à entrevista coletiva antes da partida com o Levante, marcada para esta quarta pela Copa do Rei.
O assistente Aitor Karanka, ex-jogador do clube, será o responsável por falar aos jornalistas antes da partida, diz o site do jornal Marca.
A reportagem especula que atritos entre Mourinho e a direção do Real possam ter motivado a decisão, lembrando que, após o jogo com o Sevilla, o português havia pedido ao clube para "defender mais os interesses do Real Madrid ante os árbitros".

description.hltext_display: IWF verkauft 400 Tonnen Gold
description.content:
a / AWashington - Der Internationale Währungsfonds hat den angekündigten Verkauf von gut 400 Tonnen Gold abgeschlossen. Warum der IWF das Edelmetall verkaufte.
Die Verkäufe seien zu Marktpreisen vollzogen worden, teilte der IWF am Dienstagabend mit. Im September 2009 hatte der Fonds den Verkauf von insgesamt 403,3 Tonnen aus seinen Goldbeständen angekündigt. Dies entspricht rund einem Achtel seiner Bestände.
Mit dem Programm soll die Kreditvergabekapazität für arme Länder erweitert werden. Zunächst hatte der IWF das Gold direkt an Notenbanken verkauft. Indien, Mauritius und Sri Lanka hatten dem IWF gut 200 Tonnen abgekauft. Die restlichen Verkäufe sollten zeitlich gestreckt über die Märkte erfolgen. Der Goldpreis ist binnen eines Jahres um gut 28 Prozent auf zuletzt rund 1389,55 Dollar je Feinunze (rund 31,1 Gramm) gestiegen. Der Rekord von 1430,95 Dollar vom 7. Dezember bleibt somit in Reichweite.

description.content:
MILANO (MF-DJ)--Abertis sta progettando di vendere la sua partecipazione
in Atlantia e nella portoghese Brisa per finanziare i suoi investimenti
futuri.
Abertis, si legge nell'edizione online di Expansion, detiene una

La partecipazione della societa' spagnola in Atlantia era valutata lunedi'
607,5 mln euro, mentre quella in Brisa 471 mln.

description.hltext_display: Hilton Worldwide Signe un accord pluriannuel avec Tata Consultancy Services
description.content:
TCS s'associe à Hilton Worldwide afin d'accélérer et d'améliorer la stratégie informatique de cette dernière
Hilton Worldwide, la société hôtelière mondiale numéro un, et Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), (BSE : 532540) (NSE : TCS), l'une des plus importantes sociétés de services informatiques, de conseil et de solutions métier, ont annoncé aujourd'hui un accord pluriannuel visant à accélérer et améliorer la stratégie technologique de Hilton Worldwide dans le cadre du consortium Hilton Worldwide Innovation Collaborative.
Le consortium Innovation Collaborative va développer l'infrastructure technologique de Hilton Worldwide et accélérer l'innovation à travers le portefeuille de la société, constitué de dix marques. TCS va mettre à profit son expérience étendue en termes d'initiatives de transformation et de modernisation des systèmes traditionnels pour contribuer à développer une plateforme qui permettra à Hilton Worldwide de rester au premier plan du paysage commercial et technologique.
« Notre but est de poursuivre notre solide histoire en matière d'innovation en collaborant avec les meilleurs leaders technologiques », a déclaré Robert Webb, responsable des technologies de l'informationchez Hilton Worldwide. « En tant que partenaire de notre Innovation Collaborative, TCS a démontré son engagement à nous aider à réaliser nos objectifs commerciaux et continue à fournir des services de niveau mondial. »
« Nous somme ravis d'appartenir à la vision de croissance de Hilton Worldwide », a confié N. Chandrasekaran, PDG et DG de TCS. « Cette relation confirme notre position de leader en tant que partenaire informatique de longue date le mieux équipé pour aider les grandes multinationales à transformer leurs entreprises grâce à nos capacités de services complets et notre connaissance du domaine. Nous nous engageons à promouvoir les initiatives stratégiques et transformationnelles de Hilton Worldwide par le biais de solutions technologiques les plus avancées. »
TCS est le fer de lance de la transformation et de la gestion d'un groupe central de plateformes d'applications qui fournira une gamme de produits améliorés. Pour aligner au plus près les solutions technologiques sur les besoins des entreprises et pour que Hilton Worldwide demeure le leader de l'innovation dans le secteur de l'hôtellerie, TCS gère la gamme d'applications d'entreprise dans les domaines de la gestion de l'information immobilière, la gestion des acquisitions de connaissance, l'assurance qualité, la veille stratégique, les systèmes financiers et les applications intranet.
À propos de Hilton Worldwide
Hilton Worldwide, le plus important groupe hôtelier au monde, propose toute la gamme des hébergements, depuis les hôtels et les complexes touristiques à services complets les plus luxueux jusqu'aux appartements dédiés aux longs séjours et aux hôtels de moyenne gamme. Depuis 91 ans, Hilton Worldwide propose aux voyageurs d'affaires et de loisirs le meilleur en termes d'hébergement, de service, de produits et de rapport qualité-prix. La compagnie reste fidèle à sa tradition, celle d'offrir à tous ses clients la meilleure expérience de séjour, quelle que soit la marque de produits. Ses différentes marques regroupent plus de 3 600 hôtels et 600 000 chambres dans 82 pays et incluent Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, Conrad Hotels & Resorts, Hilton Hotels & Resorts, Doubletree, Embassy Suites Hotels, Hilton Garden Inn, Hampton Hotels, Homewood Suites by Hilton, Home2 Suites by Hilton et Hilton Grand Vacations. La compagnie gère également le programme de fidélisation renommé Hilton HHonors®. Pour en savoir plus, consultez www.hiltonworldwide.com.
À propos de Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
Tata Consultancy Services est une entreprise spécialisée dans les services informatiques, les solutions métier et l'externalisation. Elle apporte des résultats concrets aux entreprises internationales en assurant un niveau de fiabilité qu'aucune autre société ne peut égaler. TCS propose un portefeuille intégré de solutions informatiques et de services informatisé, unifié par son offre de conseil. Son réseau mondial de prestation (GNDM?) est reconnu comme une référence en développement de logiciel. Branche de Tata Group, premier conglomérat industriel en Inde, TCS emploie plus de 174 000 consultants informatiques, qui comptent parmi les plus expérimentés et les mieux formés du monde, dans 42 pays. L'entreprise a réalisé un chiffre d'affaires consolidé de plus de 6,3 milliards USD pour l'année fiscale clôturée au 31 mars 2010. Elle est cotée à la bourse nationale d'Inde et à la bourse de Mumbai. Pour en savoir plus, consultez www.tcs.com.

description.hltext_display: Nombran Comisión Especial para Seguimiento a La Parota
Air travelers surrender to hassles
description.content:
NEW YORK Robyn Burford was aggravated when security inspectors at the Portland, Ore., airport demanded she hand over her two glitter-filled souvenirs. The snow globes might contain explosive nitroglycerin, an officer informed her.
The Houston teen did what thousands of other travelers are doing when confronted with pat-downs, body scanners and the other indignities of air travel this holiday season.
She bit her tongue and obeyed.
As the Christmas travel week arrives, it appears Americans are getting used to flying under the specter of terrorism and the new inconveniences the government deems necessary to combat it. Most people surrender to body scans and invasive pat-downs with little fuss. Resignation has replaced fear.
"I think we're actually getting used to the fact that we have to go through so much to go places," Burford said.
Even when the Newark, N.J., airport, one of the country's biggest, closed a terminal containing a "suspicious package" on Monday, most travelers shrugged off the two-hour disruption.
Holiday air travel is up
2.8 percent this year, says the AAA motorists' club, which surveys Americans about their travel plans. That's about the same as the increase in the number of people who are driving, which suggests that U.S. travelers are undeterred by airport security measures introduced after a Nigerian was arrested on charges of trying to blow up a Detroit-bound airliner on Christmas Day 2009 with explosives hidden in his underwear.
The Transportation Security Administration has installed 483 full-body image scanners at 78 airports, and plans to have 1,000 in place by the end of 2011. In late October, the agency announced a new, more invasive pat-down procedure in which inspectors touch the inside of passengers' legs, the groin area and along the buttocks.
Outrage over the screenings grew in November. Hundreds of thousands of people viewed a cell phone video in which a California man resisted a scan and groin check at the San Diego airport with the words, "If you touch my junk, I'll have you arrested." (2 of 2)Some travelers tried to organize a boycott of the body scanners ahead of Thanksgiving, but the movement fizzled, said Airports Council International-North America, which represents airport managers. There were no signs of a revolt this time, either, the organization said. A Washington Post-ABC News poll last month found that 64 percent of Americans support the use of body scanners. The random telephone poll of 514 people had a margin of error of
5 percentage points.
Lucas Wiseman got the pat-down treatment for the first time this week in Dallas and said it was "a little over the top, a little invasive."
"It felt more like a rubdown than a pat-down, to be honest," the 32-year-old said. He said he understands the need for security but that next time he'll ask for the frisking to be done in a private room instead of in front of other passengers.
Cooperation grows
Shama Chopra, a Montreal woman who was on the Christmas flight with the Nigerian suspect, is now so concerned about safety that she and her husband, Raman Chopra, avoid flying together. They take separate flights to keep their children from turning into "instant orphans" if something happened, Raman Chopra said.
Aside from the screening measures, the TSA says it is using bomb-sniffing dogs, explosive detectors and "behavior detection officers" trained in spotting suspicious travelers. The agency's Secure Flight Program compares passenger manifests with government databases to spot possible attackers before they even arrive at the airport.
The complications have deterred at least some of the 92.3 million people traveling over the holidays from taking a plane. Mike Higgins of Oklahoma City said long security lines and air travel delays are part of the reason he and his wife are driving 1,100 miles to Las Vegas for Christmas.
But those who have switched from air to car travel because of security are in the minority, AAA spokeswoman Nancy White said. There has been no "significant hike" in motorists because of airport security or fears of a terrorist attack, she said.
Chris Soulia, the president of the American Federation of Government Employees Local 1234, a union that represents 1,800 TSA agents in several Western states, said officers are seeing more cooperation from passengers in recent months.
"The passengers are getting used to the new screening procedures, probably because we've had so much coverage in the press," he said. He added that people haven't made a fuss about the imaging machines.

description.hltext_display: 平房一间 不挂牌匾 隐蔽“黑网吧”专赚孩子钱
description.content:
天津北方网讯：没有任何标志，平时大门反锁，天津大学家属院内竟有这样一个“黑网吧”专供孩子上网。一名14岁男孩半年内就在此花费数千元。昨天，工商南开分局等执法部门已责令其停业。
家长报料
儿子为上网
偷拿数千元
“如果不是发现家里一次性少了2500块钱，我们也不会追问孩子。这‘黑网吧’真是太害人了。”日前，家住南开区的谢女士向本报“小崔暗访工作室”讲述了自己孩子的遭遇。谢女士说，前一段时间，她就曾经感觉自己钱包里的钱莫名地少了。由于每次数额都不大，就以为自己记错了，并没太在意。可上周，她突然发现家里少了2500元，于是对14岁的儿子几番追问，儿子承认了这些钱是他拿走的，都用于到天大家属院附近的一家“网吧”上网以及购买里面的小食品。儿子还说自己到这家“网吧”上网有半年了，之前的几次，钱也是他拿的。更令谢女士担心的是，交谈中，儿子还透露，在这家“网吧”上网时，看到有孩子登录“成人网站”，且这家“网吧”只向孩子开放。气愤不已的谢女士来到这家“网吧”，发现所谓的“网吧”只是一间平房，根本就是一家“黑网吧”。
记者暗访
掀开布帘发现秘密“黑网吧”已停业
按照读者提供的信息，记者来到这间平房外看到，关闭的塑钢大门上没有牌匾，也没有任何和上网有关的字样。不知情的人会认为这只是普通住家。记者尝试拉门，却发现大门紧锁。透过玻璃窗向内望，除了各种饮料小食品外，根本看不到有电脑。
此时，两名十来岁的男孩走来。记者上前询问这里是不是可以上网，两名男孩异口同声地说：“是呀，一个小时2块钱，我们常来。”两名男孩敲了敲大门上的玻璃，一名40多岁的妇女从一间挂着布帘的房间走出来。也许是因为“熟客”的关系，妇女才将门打开，让两名男孩进入。
几分钟后，记者也敲响了玻璃。见是陌生人，中年妇女站在门后询问有什么事。记者说要买饮料，中年妇女在确定记者只有一个人后，才将房门打开。室内，一扇落地布帘将里屋遮得严严实实，里面传来枪战游戏的声音。记者趁中年妇女回身找钱的空隙，撩开了布帘，只见室内摆放有十多台老式电脑。刚刚进屋的两名男孩正坐在电脑旁“激战”着。
昨天下午，记者跟随执法人员来到现场。鉴于这里违法进行网络经营，执法人员已经责令其停止营业。截至发稿时，此事还在进一步调查处理中。
专家说法
儿童沉迷网络危害大于成人
“沉迷网络游戏对青少年的危害，要远远大于成年人。”解放军二五四医院心理学专家孙燕萍主任表示。儿童分辨是非和自控能力比成人差，长期上网成瘾不仅会患上“互联网成瘾综合征”，还会引发青少年人际关系障碍，患上网络孤独症。由于青少年常玩的网络游戏大多以“攻击、战斗、竞争”为主。长期沉溺会展现给青少年一个尔虞我诈、弱肉强食和勾心斗角的世界，这容易使他们模糊道德认知，淡化游戏虚拟与生活现实的差异，甚至走上违法犯罪道路。像这名14岁的少年为上网偷拿家长的钱，就是典型案例。

description.hltext_display: 也应孕前补叶酸 “准爸爸”缺叶酸胎儿先天不足
description.content:
天津北方网讯：刚刚完成的《天津市妇女儿童健康行动计划2010年度工作报告》中显示，本市在对育龄人群的叶酸检测中发现异常人群男性23715人占69.13%，也就是说本市近7成育龄丈夫缺乏叶酸。妇幼专家建议，“准爸爸”也应和“准妈妈”一样从孕前就开始补充叶酸。
“准爸爸”缺叶酸
宝宝难发育
本市妇女儿童保健中心妇保科董玲主任表示，神经管缺陷是我国最常见的出生缺陷之一，是导致流产、死胎、新生儿死亡和患者终身残疾的主要原因之一。孕妇体内叶酸缺乏是导致这些情况的重要原因，补充叶酸制剂是有效预防的重要手段。第三中心医院副主任医师安惠芳告诉记者，叶酸可以促进男性精子活力，提高精子免疫力，从而保证胎儿质量。叶酸不足的精子是存在一定缺陷的，这样精子形成的胎儿先天不足难以发育起来，很容易出现胎儿先兆流产和稽流流产的状况。
符合条件农村妇女
可免费领取叶酸
本市从2009年起启动增补叶酸预防神经管缺陷项目，在为全市准备生育夫妻免费检测叶酸的基础上，还为农村欲孕妇女免费补充叶酸。进行婚姻登记时，男女双方就能免费接受叶酸检测和补充叶酸健康教育。凡是在民政局婚姻登记并准备两年内怀孕的、已结婚未生育准备近期生育的、符合计划生育政策准备生二胎及二胎以上的、既往生育过神经管缺陷胎儿等具有危险因素的本市农村妇女，均可到当地民政部门婚姻登记处免费领取叶酸。

description.hltext_display: 日本警察枪杀中国人案审理陷混乱 法庭明年宣判
description.content:
据日本新华侨报网报道，2006年6月23日，日本?心鞠鼐?员平田学在盘问中国研修生罗成时遇到抵抗，于是开枪将其射杀，罗成死时年仅38岁。之后，此案引发广泛关注。
2010年10月的公开审理中，检方应被害中国男子家属的要求，以“特别公务员暴行凌虐致死罪”将?心鞠鼐?察本部巡查长・平田学告上法庭，而平田学则陈述了开枪的正当性，主张自己无罪。最终审理没有得出最终定论。
据来自日本《下野新闻》的消息，12月21日，此案的第4公开审理在宇都宫地方法院开庭。检方相关人员指出“平田学开枪时不符合枪械使用条件，因此不能认定其是正当防卫”，要求法庭判处其4年有期徒刑。而辩方则继续坚持主张“当时开枪是符合法律的正当防卫要求的，因此无罪”。据悉，最终判决预计将在2011年2月10日得出。
案件庭审争论的焦点依旧是围绕平田学开枪时候的事实关系认识的不同，以及开枪行为是否符合《警察职务执行法》，是否属于正当防卫。
检方指出“按照当时的情况，平田学完全可以使用警棍来应对，应该采用鸣枪示警。开枪射击完全是没有必要的举措”。并且指出当时平田学与死者罗成的距离仅有两米，“开枪行为显示平田学当时是具有攻击意图的”，检方还举证，通过罗成头顶部有伤口这一事实说明了在受到枪击之前，罗成“双手举着石头”，强调其并没有对平田学生命造成任何具体的威胁。
法庭上，受害人罗成的律师也陈述了意见，请求法庭对平田学被告判处5年有期徒刑。
而平田学的辩护方则指出“当时罗成反抗行为激烈，并且距平田学距离很近，存在一下子将石头扔过来威胁平田学生命的危险”。而参照日本法律以及警察厅的规定，当时符合“可以不事先鸣枪示警而直接采取措施，为了逮捕嫌疑人可以开枪”的相关条文规定，而平田学开枪射击其大腿部位也符合“对必要性进行合理判断后不得不采取的措施”。
2006年6月23日下午5时许，日本?心鞠芈拐泳?察署平田学在西方町真名子路上巡逻时，发现两名中国男子形迹可疑。当平田学上前盘问并欲以“妨碍执行公务嫌疑”逮捕其时，中国研修生罗成试图逃跑，且为了阻止平田学追赶，罗成举起路边石灯笼的顶盖欲砸向平田学。平田学在向其发出警告后开枪，击中罗成腹部，罗成被送往医院后不久不治身亡。

description.hltext_display: The Parent Coaching Institute Receives Grant to Support Families in Need at the YWCA
description.author: The Parent Coaching Institute
description.content: --(PR.com)-- The Norcliffe Foundation has awarded The Parent Coaching Institute a $5,000 grant to support a group of parents identified as in need by the Eastside King County YWCA. These parents will receive parent coaching services through March 2011 from a PCI Certified Parent Coach®.Gina deCampo, Assistant Director of Family Support at the YWCA, had tears in her eyes when she explained the success of The PCIs parent coaching services. Feedback on The PCIs previous group coaching at the YWCA from the parents served was much more positive than she anticipated, with an evaluation showing that parents made significant progress becoming more patient with their children and learning parenting techniques that reduced their own stress while meeting their childrens developmental needs in calm and appropriate ways. The PCI plans to conduct pre/post surveys and an independent evaluation of the parent coaching services being provided to these families.The Norcliffe Foundation grant makes it possible to continue this innovative model of training highly qualified group coaches while serving families in need through pro bono parent coaching services. The Parent Coaching Institute, founded in 2000 by internationally known education expert, speaker and author Gloria DeGaetano, CEO, is giving shape to a burgeoning industry and creating new business and career opportunities for its graduates.There has never been a greater need or a better time for parent coaches, says DeGaetano. Families are struggling to cope with the stresses of our increasingly complex society, and the parent coaching model is proving to be a very effective way to help families flourish.Using evidence-based strategies and a well-researched framework for communication and analysis, PCI Certified Parent Coaches® work with families to help them evaluate their frame of reference and create awareness of new possibilities. In addition to working with parents directly, parent coaches offer their services to agencies, schools and businesses.Our coaches work from the heart and are highly skilled, says DeGaetano. The PCI attracts some of the best and brightest professionals in the nation, including teachers, social workers, counselors and other professionals who want to make a difference in the world. Were very proud of our graduates and are excited about the possibilities that await them and the families they help.The PCIs acclaimed distance-learning training program, offered in affiliation with Seattle Pacific University, is currently accepting applications for its 2011 Spring Quarter. For more information, visit www.ThePCI.org.About The Parent Coaching InstituteThe Parent Coaching Institute (The PCI) is the leading non-profit organization dedicated to advancing the parent coaching profession. Founded in 2000 by Gloria DeGaetano, it was the originator of the parent coaching industry, and it continues to set the highest national standards for Parent Coach Certification®. The PCI is headquartered in Bellevue, Washington. For more information, please visit www.ThePCI.org, or call (888) 599-4447.ContactsThe Parent Coaching Institute(425) 401-1519info@thepci.org###The Parent Coaching Institute (The PCI) has been awarded a grant from The Norcliffe Foundation to continue its groundbreaking parent coaching services at the YWCA through March 2011.
